analyzed: carakasaṃhitā
sūtrasthāna
atha atas dīrghaṃjīvitīyam adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
guṇatraya vibhedena mūrti trayam upaiyuṣe
trayī bhuve trinetrāya trilokī pataye namaḥ
sarasvatyai namaḥ yasyāḥ prasādāt puṇya karmabhiḥ
buddhi darpaṇa saṃkrāntam jagat adhyakṣam īkṣyate
brahma dakṣa aśvi deva īśa bharadvāja punarvasu
hutāśa veśa caraka prabhṛtibhyaḥ namaḥ namaḥ
pātañjala mahābhāṣya caraka pratisaṃskṛtaiḥ
manaḥ vāc kāya doṣāṇām hartre ahi pataye namaḥ
kriyate cakradattena ṭīkā āyurvedadīpikā

original: sabhyāḥ sadguruvāksudhāsrutiparisphītaśrutīn asmi vo nālaṃ toṣayituṃ payodapayasā nāmbhonidhis tṛpyati /

original: vyākhyābhāsarasaprakāśanam idaṃ tv asmin yadi prāpyate kvāpi kvāpi kaṇo guṇasya tadasau karṇe kṣaṇaṃ dhīyatām // 6

iha hi dharma artha kāma mokṣa paripanthi roga upaśamāya brahma prabhṛtibhiḥ praṇītā āyurveda tantreṣu ati vistara tvena

original: samprati vartamānālpāyurmedhasāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ na samyagarthādhigamaḥ tadanadhigamācca
analyzed: samprati vartamāna alpa āyuḥ medhasām puruṣāṇām na samyak artha adhigamaḥ tad anadhigamāt ca

āyurveda tantram praṇetum ārabdhavān
tasmin ca śloka nidāna vimāna śārīra indriya cikitsita kalpa siddhi sthāna ātmake abhidhātavye nikhila tantra pradhāna arthāḥ abhidhāya
ktāḥ ityādi vākya abhidhāyakena darśitam mantavyam

original: atha manyase āptaprayojanābhidhānametadato'tra yathārthatvaṃ nanu bho kathamayaṃ

original: naivaṃ nahi sāmānyena prayojanasaṃdehaḥ prayojanaviśeṣārthinaṃ tathā pravartayati

original: prayojanābhidhāyivākye tu svalpaprayatnabodhye prayojanasāmānyasaṃdehādeva pravṛttirupapannā na punaranekasaṃvatsarakleśabodhye śāstre // 13

original: granthādau maṅgalasevānirastāntarāyāṇāṃ granthakartṛśrotḥṇām avighneneṣṭalābho bhavatīti yuktaṃ maṅgalopādānam // 16

original: athaśabdasya maṅgalatve smṛtir oṃkāraś cāthaśabdaśca dvāv etau brahmaṇaḥ purā // 17

original: vakṣyati hi adhikṛtyeyamadhyāyanāmasaṃjñā pratiṣṭhitā iti nāmasaṃjñā yogarūḍhasaṃjñetyarthaḥ // 39

original: kriyāyogavirahe upasargāḥ kriyāyoge iti niyamād āṅa upasargatvaṃ na syāt tataścānupasargeṇāṅā vyavadhānād ver upasargasya prayogo na syāt //

analyzed: pratyakṣa aviṣaya tvāt anvaya vyatirekābhyām tu sarva padārtha avadhāraṇam duṣkaram eva yata

original: sarvatantrāṇāṃ sarvakarmaṇāṃ tantraśabdaḥ karmavacano'pyasti yaduktaṃ vastistantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāmityarthaḥ // 43]
analyzed: sarva tantrāṇām sarva karmaṇām tantra śabdaḥ karma vacanaḥ api asti yat uktam vastiḥ tantrāṇām karmaṇām iti arthaḥ

original: tacchrutvā vāyorvidavaco marīciruvāca yadyapyevam etat kimarthasyāsya vacane vijñāne vā sāmarthyamasti bhiṣagvidyāyāṃ bhiṣagvidyām adhikṛtyeyaṃ  #
analyzed: tat śrutvā vāyorvida vacaḥ marīciḥ uvāca yadi api evam etat kim arthasya asya vacane vijñāne vā sāmarthyam asti bhiṣaj vidyāyām bhiṣaj vidyām adhikṛtya iyam
kathā pravṛttā iti

original: vāyorvida uvāca bhiṣak pavanam atibalam atiparuṣam atiśīghrakāriṇam ātyayikaṃ cen
analyzed: vāyorvidaḥ uvāca bhiṣak pavanam atibalam ati paruṣam ati śīghrakāriṇam ātyayikam ced

original: nānuniśāmyet sahasā prakupitam atiprayataḥ kathamagre'bhirakṣitumabhidhāsyati prāgevainam
analyzed: na anuniśāmyet sahasā prakupitam ati prayataḥ katham agre abhirakṣitum abhidhāsyati prāk eva enam

original: atyayabhayāt vāyoryathārthā stutir api bhavatyārogyāya balavarṇavivṛddhaye varcasvitvāyopacayāya
analyzed: atyaya bhayāt vāyoḥ yathārthā stutiḥ api bhavati ārogyāya bala varṇa vivṛddhaye varcasvi tvāya upacayāya

original: marīciruvāca agnireva śarīre pittāntargataḥ kupitākupitaḥ śubhāśubhāni karoti tadyathā
analyzed: marīciḥ uvāca agniḥ eva śarīre pitta antargataḥ kupita akupitaḥ śubha aśubhāni karoti tat yathā

original: paktimapaktiṃ darśanamadarśanaṃ mātrāmātratvam ūṣmaṇaḥ prakṛtivikṛtivarṇau śauryaṃ
analyzed: paktim apaktim darśanam adarśanam mātra amātra tvam ūṣmaṇaḥ prakṛti vikṛti varṇau śauryam

original: bhayaṃ krodhaṃ harṣaṃ mohaṃ prasādam ityevamādīni cāparāṇi dvaṃdvānīti // Car_1,12.11

analyzed: sadbhāvam darśayati na tu pittāt abhedam pitte na agnimāndyasya grahaṇī adhyāye vakṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: paktimapaktimiti avikṛtivikṛtibhedena pācakasyāgneḥ karma darśanādarśane netragatasyālocakasya
analyzed: paktim apaktim iti avikṛti vikṛti bhedena pācakasya agneḥ karma darśana adarśane netra gatasya ālocakasya

analyzed: ūṣmaṇaḥ mātrā mātra tvam varṇa bhedau ca tvac gatasya bhrājakasya bhaya śaurya ādayaḥ hṛdaya sthasya

original: sādhakasya rañjakasya tu bahiḥsphuṭakāryādarśanād udāharaṇaṃ na kṛtam // 2]

original: tacchrutvā marīcivacaḥ kāpya uvāca soma eva śarīre śleṣmāntargataḥ kupitākupitaḥ

original: śubhāśubhāni karoti tadyathā dārḍhyaṃ śaithilyamupacayaṃ kārśyam utsāhamālasyaṃ vṛṣatāṃ

original: klībatāṃ jñānamajñānaṃ buddhiṃ mohamevamādīni cāparāṇi dvaṃdvānīti // Car_1,12.12
analyzed: klība tām jñānam ajñānam buddhim moham evamādīni ca aparāṇi dvaṃdvāni iti

original: tacchrutvā kāpyavaco bhagavān punarvasurātreya uvāca sarva eva bhavantaḥ samyag āhur
analyzed: tat śrutvā kāpya vacaḥ bhagavān punarvasuḥ ātreyaḥ uvāca sarve eva bhavantaḥ samyak āhuḥ

original: anyatraikāntikavacanāt sarva eva khalu vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ prakṛtibhūtāḥ puruṣamavyāpannendriyaṃ

original: balavarṇasukhopapannam āyuṣā mahatopapādayanti samyagevācaritā dharmārthakāmā iva

tat ātreya vacaḥ śrutvā sarve eva anumenire
ṛṣayaḥ abhinananduḥ ca yathā indra vacanam surāḥ

original: guṇāḥ ṣaḍ dvividho hetur vividhaṃ karma yat punaḥ /

original: eka eva rasa ityuvāca bhadrakāpyaḥ yaṃ pañcānām indriyārthānām anyatamaṃ jihvāvaiṣayikaṃ bhāvamācakṣate kuśalāḥ sa punarudakādananya iti /

sapta rasāḥ iti nimiḥ vaidehaḥ madhura amla lavaṇa kaṭu tikta kaṣāya kṣārāḥ
aṣṭau rasāḥ iti baḍiśaḥ dhāmārgavaḥ madhura amla lavaṇa kaṭu tikta kaṣāya kṣāra avyaktāḥ

original: aparisaṃkhyeyā rasā iti kāṅkāyano vāhlīkabhiṣak āśrayaguṇakarmasaṃsvādaviśeṣāṇām aparisaṃkhyeyatvāt // Car_1,26.8

ekaḥ eva ityādi
indriya arthānām iti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī

original: anyatamam iti ekam anyaśabdo hy ayamekavacanaḥ yathānyo dakṣiṇena gato 'nya uttareṇa eka ityarthaḥ tam appratyayaśca svārthikaḥ // 3

jihvā vaiṣayikam iti jihvā grāhyam
rasa abhāvaḥ api jihvayā gūhyate atas āha bhāvam iti

original: udakādananya iti rasodakayor ekatvakhyāpanārthaṃ pūrvapakṣatvād aduṣṭam // 6

original: hi rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātram ityādivacanena guṇāvyatiriktaṃ dravyamiti bruvate // 8

chedanīyaḥ iti apatarpaṇa kārakaḥ
upaśamanīyaḥ iti bṛṃhaṇaḥ

original: sādhāraṇa ityāgneyasaumyasāmānyād ubhayor api laṅghanabṛṃhaṇayoḥ kartā parasparavirodhādakartā vā // 11

original: svāduriti abhīṣṭaḥ hita iti āyatāv anapakārī // 12
analyzed: svāduḥ iti abhīṣṭaḥ hitaḥ iti āyatau anapakārī

original: āśrīyata ityāśrayo dravyaṃ guṇāḥ snigdhagurvādayaḥ karma dhātuvardhanakṣapaṇādi saṃsvādaḥ rasānām avāntarabhedaḥ eṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ bhedānām ityarthaḥ
analyzed: āśrīyate iti āśrayaḥ dravyam guṇāḥ snigdha guru ādayaḥ karma dhātu vardhana kṣapaṇa ādi saṃsvādaḥ rasānām avāntarabhedaḥ eṣām viśeṣāṇām bhedānām iti arthaḥ

original: tatra dravyabhedād ādhārabhedenāśritasyāpi rasasya bhedo bhavati āśrayo hi kāraṇaṃ kāraṇabhedācca kāryabhedo 'vaśyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ // 14
analyzed: tatra dravya bhedāt ādhāra bhedena āśritasya api rasasya bhedaḥ bhavati āśrayaḥ hi kāraṇam kāraṇa bhedāt ca kārya bhedaḥ avaśyam bhavati iti arthaḥ
guru ādi guṇa bhedaḥ tathā karma bhedāḥ ca rasa kṛtāḥ eva

original: tataś ca kāryabhedādavaśyaṃ kāraṇabheda iti pūrvapakṣābhiprāyaḥ // 16
analyzed: tatas ca kārya bhedāt avaśyam kāraṇa bhedaḥ iti pūrvapakṣa abhiprāyaḥ

original: saṃsvādabhedastu ekasyām api madhurajātāv ikṣukṣīraguḍādigataḥ pratyakṣameva bhedo
analyzed: saṃsvāda bhedaḥ tu ekasyām api madhura jātau ikṣu kṣīra guḍa ādi gataḥ pratyakṣam eva

original: dṛśyate sa tu saṃsvādabhedaḥ svasaṃvedya eva yaduktam ikṣukṣīraguḍādīnāṃ mādhuryasyāntaraṃ mahat // 17
analyzed: dṛśyate sa tu saṃsvāda bhedaḥ sva saṃvedyaḥ eva yat uktam ikṣu kṣīra guḍa ādīnām mādhuryasya antaram mahat
bhedaḥ tathā api nā ākhyātum sarasvatyā api śakyate iti

original: ṣaḍeva rasā ityuvāca bhagavānātreyaḥ punarvasuḥ madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyāḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṭ eva rasāḥ iti uvāca bhagavān ātreyaḥ punarvasuḥ madhura amla lavaṇa kaṭu tikta kaṣāyāḥ

original: teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ yonirudakaṃ chedanopaśamane dve karmaṇī tayor miśrībhāvāt sādhāraṇatvaṃ
analyzed: teṣām ṣaṇṇām rasānām yoniḥ udakam chedana upaśamane dve karmaṇī tayoḥ miśrībhāvāt sādhāraṇa tvam

original: svādvasvādutā bhaktiḥ hitāhitau prabhāvau pañcamahābhūtavikārās tv āśrayāḥ prakṛtivikṛtivicāradeśakālavaśāḥ
analyzed: svādu asvādu tā bhaktiḥ hita ahitau prabhāvau pañca mahābhūta vikārāḥ tu āśrayāḥ prakṛti vikṛti vicāra deśa kāla vaśāḥ

original: teṣvāśrayeṣu dravyasaṃjñakeṣu guṇā gurulaghuśītoṣṇasnigdharūkṣādyāḥ kṣaraṇāt kṣāraḥ
analyzed: teṣu āśrayeṣu dravya saṃjñakeṣu guṇāḥ guru laghu śīta uṣṇa snigdha rūkṣa ādyāḥ kṣaraṇāt kṣāraḥ

original: nāsau rasaḥ dravyaṃ tadanekarasasamutpannam anekarasaṃ kaṭukalavaṇabhūyiṣṭham anekendriyārthasamanvitaṃ
analyzed: na asau rasaḥ dravyam tat aneka rasa samutpannam aneka rasam kaṭuka lavaṇa bhūyiṣṭham aneka indriya artha samanvitam

original: karaṇābhinirvṛttam avyaktībhāvastu khalu rasānāṃ prakṛtau bhavatyanurase 'nurasasamanvite
analyzed: karaṇa abhinirvṛttam avyaktībhāvaḥ tu khalu rasānām prakṛtau bhavati anurase anurasa samanvite

original: vā dravye aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ punas teṣām āśrayādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvānna
analyzed: vā dravye aparisaṃkhyeya tvam punar teṣām āśraya ādīnām bhāvānām viśeṣa aparisaṃkhyeya tvāt na

original: yuktam ekaiko 'pi hy eṣām āśrayādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ viśeṣān āśrayate viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt
analyzed: yuktam ekaikaḥ api hi eṣām āśraya ādīnām bhāvānām viśeṣān āśrayate viśeṣa a parisaṃkhyeya tvāt

original: na ca tasmād anyatvam upapadyate parasārasaṃsṛṣṭabhūyiṣṭhatvānna caiṣām abhinirvṛtter
analyzed: na ca tasmāt anya tvam upapadyate para sāra saṃsṛṣṭa bhūyiṣṭha tvāt na ca eṣām abhinirvṛtteḥ

original: guṇaprakṛtīnām aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ bhavati tasmānna saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ rasānāṃ karmopadiśanti buddhimantaḥ /
analyzed: guṇa prakṛtīnām aparisaṃkhyeya tvam bhavati tasmāt na saṃsṛṣṭānām rasānām karma upadiśanti buddhimantaḥ

original: taccaiva kāraṇamapekṣamāṇāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ paraspareṇāsaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ lakṣaṇapṛthaktvam upadekṣyāmaḥ // Car_1,26.9
analyzed: tat ca eva kāraṇam apekṣamāṇāḥ ṣaṇṇām rasānām paraspareṇa asaṃsṛṣṭānām lakṣaṇa pṛthaktvam upadekṣyāmaḥ
siddhāntam punarvasu vacanena āha ṣaṣ eva ityādi

original: yoniḥ ādhārakāraṇaṃ kāryakāraṇayośca bhedāt siddha udakādrasabhedaḥ pratyakṣa eveti bhāvaḥ // 3
analyzed: yoniḥ ādhāra kāraṇam kārya kāraṇayoḥ ca bhedāt siddhaḥ udakāt rasa bhedaḥ pratyakṣaḥ eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: kṣitivyatiriktam udakameva yathā rasayonistathā rasanārtho rasastasya ityādau vivṛtameva dīrghaṃjīvitīye // 4
analyzed: kṣiti vyatiriktam udakam eva yathā rasa yoniḥ tathā rasana arthaḥ rasaḥ tasya ityādau vivṛtam eva dīrghaṃjīvitīye

original: tayormiśrībhāvāditi karmaṇor amūrtayor miśrībhāvānupapattau tadādhārayor dravyayor miśrībhāvāditi boddhavyam // 5
analyzed: tayoḥ miśrībhāvāt iti karmaṇoḥ amūrtayoḥ miśrībhāva anupapattau tad ādhārayoḥ dravyayoḥ miśrībhāvāt iti boddhavyam
sādhāraṇam iti sādhāraṇa kārya yogi tvam
bhaktiḥ icchā iti arthaḥ

original: tena yo yamicchati sa tasya svādurasvāduritara iti puruṣāpekṣau dharmau na rasabhedakāryāv ityarthaḥ // 8
analyzed: tena yaḥ yam icchati sa tasya svāduḥ asvāduḥ itaraḥ iti puruṣa apekṣau dharmau na rasa bheda kāryau iti arthaḥ

original: pañcamahābhūtetyādau tuśabdo 'vadhāraṇe tena āśrayā eva na rasā ityarthaḥ // 9

original: kṣaraṇaṃ ca kṣārasya pānīyayuktasyādhogamanena vadanti hi laukikāḥ kṣāraṃ srāvayāmaḥ iti śāstraṃ ca chittvā chittvāśayāt kṣāraḥ kṣaratvāt kṣārayatyadhaḥ  #

iti

prakṛtau ityādi

ye api tatra api yukti saṃyoga parimāṇa saṃskāra abhyāsāḥ atyartha cikitsā upayoginaḥ api na

original: te pārthivādidravyāṇāṃ śabdādivat sāṃsiddhikāḥ kiṃ tarhy ādheyāḥ ata iha naisargikaguṇakathane noktāḥ // 6
analyzed: te pārthiva ādi dravyāṇām śabda ādi vat sāṃsiddhikāḥ kim tarhi ādheyāḥ atas iha naisargika guṇa kathane na uktāḥ
uktam iti apāmārga taṇḍulīye
etat ca prādhānyāt ucyate tena bṛṃhaṇa ādi api boddhavyam
tatra dravyāṇi guru khara kaṭhina manda sthira viśada sāndra sthūla gandha guṇa bahulāni pārthivāni
tāni upacaya saṃghāta gaurava sthairya karāṇi drava snigdha śīta manda mṛdu picchila rasa guṇa bahulāni
āpyāni tāni upakleda sneha bandha viṣyanda mārdava prahlāda karāṇi uṣṇa tīkṣṇa sūkṣma laghu rūkṣa viśada rūpa guṇa bahulāni
āgneyāni tāni dāha pāka prabhā prakāśa varṇa karāṇi laghu śīta rūkṣa khara viśada sūkṣma sparśa guṇa bahulāni
vāyavyāni tāni raukṣya glāni vicāra vaiśadya lāghava karāṇi mṛdu laghu sūkṣma ślakṣṇa śabda guṇa bahulāni
ākāśa ātmakāni tāni mārdava sauṣirya lāghava karāṇi

original: bahulaśabdo gurvādibhiḥ pratyekaṃ sambadhyate kiṃvā gandhenaiva yato gandhaguṇabahulā
analyzed: bahula śabdaḥ guru ādibhiḥ pratyekam sambadhyate kiṃvā gandhena eva yatas gandha guṇa bahulā

original: pṛthivyeva bhavati ata eva dravyāntaralakṣaṇe 'pi vaiśeṣikaguṇo 'nta eva paṭhyate
analyzed: pṛthivī eva bhavati atas eva dravya antara lakṣaṇe api vaiśeṣika guṇaḥ antaḥ eva paṭhyate

original: rasaguṇabahulāni ityādi tena tatrāpi rasādibhir eva bahulaśabdo yojyaḥ // 1
analyzed: rasa guṇa bahulāni ityādi tena tatra api rasa ādibhiḥ eva bahula śabdaḥ yojyaḥ
sarva kārya dravyāṇām pāñcabhautika tve api pṛthivī ādi utkarṣeṇa pārthiva tva ādi jñeyam
saṃghātaḥ kāṭhinyam sthairyam avicālyam
bandhanam paraspara yojanam prahlādaḥ śarīra indriya tarpaṇam
sūkṣmam sūkṣma srotaḥ anusāri

original: prabhā varṇaprakāśinī dīptiḥ yaduktaṃ varṇamākrāmati chāyā prabhā varṇaprakāśikā ityādi // 6
analyzed: prabhā varṇa prakāśinī dīptiḥ yat uktam varṇam ākrāmati chāyā prabhā varṇa prakāśikā ityādi
vicaraṇam vicāraḥ gatiḥ iti arthaḥ
sauṣiryam randhra bahula tā

original: atrākāśabāhulyaṃ dravyasya pṛthivyādibhūtāntarālpatvena bhūrivyaktākāśatvena ca jñeyaṃ yadeva bhūriśuṣiraṃ tannābhasaṃ kiṃvā ākāśaguṇabahulatvena  #
analyzed: atra ākāśa bāhulyam dravyasya pṛthivī ādi bhūta antara alpatvena bhūri vyakta ākāśa tvena ca jñeyam yat eva bhūri śuṣiram tat nābhasam kiṃvā ākāśa guṇa bahulatvena
nābhasam dravyam iti ucyate

original: anenopadeśena nānauṣadhibhūtaṃ jagati kiṃcid dravyam upalabhyate tāṃ tāṃ yuktim arthaṃ ca taṃ tam abhipretya // Car_1,26.12
analyzed: anena upadeśena nānā oṣadhi bhūtam jagati kiṃcid dravyam upalabhyate tām tām yuktim artham ca tam tam abhipretya

original: aneneti pratiniyatadravyaguṇopadeśena yat pārthivādi dravyaṃ yadguṇaṃ tadguṇe dehe saṃpādye tad bheṣajaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ // 1
analyzed: anena iti pratiniyata dravya guṇa upadeśena yat pārthiva ādi dravyam yad guṇam tad guṇe dehe saṃpādye tat bheṣajam bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: tacca pārthivādi dravyaṃ na sarvathā na ca sarvasmin vyādhau bheṣajamityāha tāṃ tāṃ yuktim ityādi // 2
analyzed: tat ca pārthiva ādi dravyam na sarvathā na ca sarvasmin vyādhau bheṣajam iti āha tām tām yuktim ityādi

original: yuktim iti upāyam arthamiti prayojanam abhipretyeti adhikṛtya tena kenacidupāyena kvacit prayojane kiṃcid dravyamauṣadhaṃ bhavati na sarvatra
analyzed: yuktim iti upāyam artham iti prayojanam abhipretya iti adhikṛtya tena kenacid upāyena kvacid prayojane kiṃcid dravyam auṣadham bhavati na sarvatra

original: tena yaducyate vairodhikānāṃ sarvadāpathyatvena nānauṣadhaṃ dravyam iti vaco virodhi
analyzed: tena yat ucyate vairodhikānām sarvadā apathya tvena na anauṣadham dravyam iti vacaḥ virodhi

original: tanna bhavati vairodhikāni hi saṃyogasaṃskāradeśakālādyapekṣāṇi bhavanti vairodhikasaṃyogādyabhāve
analyzed: tat na bhavati vairodhikāni hi saṃyoga saṃskāra deśa kāla ādi apekṣāṇi bhavanti vairodhika saṃyoga ādi abhāve
tu pathyāni api kvacid syuḥ

original: yānyapi sarvadāpi svabhāvādeva viṣamandakādīnyapathyāni tānyapy upāyayuktāni kvacit pathyāni bhavanti yathā udare viṣasya tilaṃ dadyāt ityādi
analyzed: yāni api sarvadā api svabhāvāt eva viṣa mandaka ādīni apathyāni tāni api upāya yuktāni kvacid pathyāni bhavanti yathā udare viṣasya tilam dadyāt ityādi

original: yattu tṛṇapāṃśuprabhṛtīni nopayujyante ato na tāni bheṣajānītyucyate tanna teṣāmapi bheṣajasvedādyupāyatvena bheṣajatvāt // 6]
analyzed: yat tu tṛṇa pāṃśu prabhṛtīni na upayujyante atas na tāni bheṣajāni iti ucyate tat na teṣām api bheṣaja sveda ādi upāya tvena bheṣaja tvāt

original: na tu kevalaṃ guṇaprabhāvādeva dravyāṇi kārmukāṇi bhavanti dravyāṇi hi dravyaprabhāvād
analyzed: na tu kevalam guṇa prabhāvāt eva dravyāṇi kārmukāṇi bhavanti dravyāṇi hi dravya prabhāvāt

original: guṇaprabhāvād dravyaguṇaprabhāvāc ca tasmiṃstasmin kāle tattadadhikaraṇam āsādya
analyzed: guṇa prabhāvāt dravya guṇa prabhāvāt ca tasmin tasmin kāle tat tat adhikaraṇam āsādya

original: tāṃ tāṃ ca yuktimarthaṃ ca taṃ tamabhipretya yat kurvanti tat karma yena kurvanti
analyzed: tām tām ca yuktim artham ca tam tam abhipretya yat kurvanti tat karma yena kurvanti

original: tadvīryaṃ yatra kurvanti tadadhikaraṇaṃ yadā kurvanti sa kālaḥ yathā kurvanti sa
analyzed: tat vīryam yatra kurvanti tat adhikaraṇam yadā kurvanti sa kālaḥ yathā kurvanti sa

original: upāyaḥ yat sādhayanti tat phalam // Car_1,26.13
analyzed: upāyaḥ yat sādhayanti tat phalam

original: pārthivādidravyāṇāṃ gurukharādiguṇayogād bheṣajatvam uktaṃ tena guṇaprabhāvādeva bheṣajaṃ syāditi śaṅkāṃ nirasyann āha na tu kevalam ityādi
analyzed: pārthiva ādi dravyāṇām guru khara ādi guṇa yogāt bheṣaja tvam uktam tena guṇa prabhāvāt eva bheṣajam syāt iti śaṅkām nirasyan āha na tu kevalam ityādi

original: dravyaprabhāvād yathā dantyā virecakatvaṃ tathā maṇīnāṃ viṣādihantṛtvam ityādi // 2
analyzed: dravya prabhāvāt yathā dantyāḥ virecaka tvam tathā maṇīnām viṣa ādi hantṛ tvam ityādi

original: guṇaprabhāvādyathā jvare tiktako rasaḥ śīte 'gnir ityādi // 3
analyzed: guṇa prabhāvāt yathā jvare tiktakaḥ rasaḥ śīte agniḥ ityādi

original: dravyaguṇaprabhāvād yathā kṛṣṇājinasyoparīti atrāpi kṛṣṇatvaṃ guṇo'jinaṃ ca dravyamabhipretaṃ
analyzed: dravya guṇa prabhāvāt yathā kṛṣṇājinasya upari iti atra api kṛṣṇa tvam guṇaḥ ajinam ca dravyam abhipretam

original: yathā vā maṇḍalair jātarūpasya tasyā eva payaḥ śṛtam tatra maṇḍalaguṇayuktasyaiva
analyzed: yathā vā maṇḍalaiḥ jātarūpasya tasyāḥ eva payaḥ śṛtam tatra maṇḍala guṇa yuktasya eva
jātarūpasya kārmuka tvam
katham kurvanti iti āha tasmin tasmin ityādi

original: tāṃ tāṃ yuktimāsādyeti tāṃ tāṃ yojanāṃ prāpya // 6
analyzed: tām tām yuktim āsādya iti tām tām yojanām prāpya

original: yat kurvantītyādāv udāharaṇaṃ yathā śirovirecanadravyāṇi yacchirovirecanaṃ kurvanti
analyzed: yat kurvanti ityādau udāharaṇam yathā śirovirecana dravyāṇi yat śirovirecanam kurvanti

original: tac chirovirecanaṃ karma yenoṣṇatvādikāraṇena śirovirecanaṃ kurvanti tadvīryaṃ vīryaṃ
analyzed: tat śirovirecanam karma yena uṣṇa tva ādi kāraṇena śirovirecanam kurvanti tad vīryam vīryam

original: śaktiḥ sā ca dravyasya guṇasya vā yatra śirovirecanaṃ kurvanti tadadhikaraṇaṃ śiraḥ
analyzed: śaktiḥ sā ca dravyasya guṇasya vā yatra śirovirecanam kurvanti tad adhikaraṇam śiraḥ

analyzed: na anyatra adhikaraṇe śirovirecana dravyam prabhavati iti arthaḥ yadā iti vasanta ādau śiraḥ gaurava ādi yukte

analyzed: ca kāle etena akāle śīte śirovirecanam stabdha tvāt na kārmukam kiṃtu sva kāle eva yathā

original: yena prakāreṇa pradhamanāvapīḍanādinā tathā prasāritāṅgamuttānaṃ śayane saṃstarāstṛte // 7

original: īṣat pralambaśirasaṃ saṃveśya cāvṛtekṣaṇam ityādinā vidhinā kurvanti sa upāyaḥ yat sādhayanti śirogauravaśūlādyuparamaṃ tat phalaṃ phalam uddeśyam
analyzed: īṣat pralamba śirasam saṃveśya ca āvṛta īkṣaṇam ityādinā vidhinā kurvanti saḥ upāyaḥ yat sādhayanti śiraḥ gaurava śūla ādi uparamam tat phalam phalam uddeśyam

original: karma kāryaṃ sādhanam uddeśyaṃ phalaṃ sādhyaṃ yathā yāganiṣpādyo dharmaḥ kāryatayā karma tajjanyastu svargādir uddeśyaḥ phalam evaṃ vamanādiṣvapi  #
analyzed: karma kāryam sādhanam uddeśyam phalam sādhyam yathā yāga niṣpādyaḥ dharmaḥ kāryatayā karma tad janyaḥ tu svarga ādiḥ uddeśyaḥ phalam evam vamana ādiṣu api

analyzed: madhuraḥ ityādi deśa prabhāvāt yathā himavati drākṣā dāḍima ādīni madhurāṇi bhavanti anyatra amlāni ityādi

original: kālaprabhāvādyathā bālāmraṃ sakaṣāyaṃ taruṇamamlaṃ pakvaṃ madhuraṃ tathā hemante
analyzed: kāla prabhāvāt yathā bāla āmram sakaṣāyam taruṇam amlam pakvam madhuram tathā hemante

original: agnisaṃyogādayo ye 'nye rasahetavas te 'pi kāle dravye vāntarbhāvanīyāḥ // 3]

analyzed: tatra svādoḥ amla ādi yogāt pañca śeṣaiḥ iti ādi tvena upayuktāt anyaiḥ tena amlasya lavaṇa ādi yogāt

analyzed: catvāri evam lavaṇasya kaṭu ādi yogāt trīṇi kaṭukasya tikta kaṣāya yogāt dve tiktasya

pṛthak amla ādi yuktasya yogaḥ śeṣaiḥ pṛthak bhavet

analyzed: madhurasya tathā amlasya lavaṇasya kaṭoḥ tathā
tri rasāni yathā saṃkhyam dravyāṇi uktāni viṃśatiḥ

original: madhurasyāmlādirasacatuṣṭayena pṛthag ityekaikaśo yuktasya śeṣairlavaṇādibhir yogo
analyzed: madhurasya amla ādi rasa catuṣṭayena pṛthak iti ekaikaśas yuktasya śeṣaiḥ lavaṇa ādibhiḥ yogaḥ

original: bhavati tatra madhurasyāmlayuktasya śeṣalavaṇādiyogāc catvāri tathā madhurasya lavaṇayuktasya
analyzed: bhavati tatra madhurasya amla yuktasya śeṣa lavaṇa ādi yogāt catvāri tathā madhurasya lavaṇa yuktasya

analyzed: kaṭu ādi yogāt trīṇi tathā kaṭu yuktasya tikta ādi yogāt dve tathā tikta yuktasya kaṣāya yogāt

original: evamamlasyādisthitasya lavaṇayuktasya kaṭvādiyogāt trīṇi tathā kaṭukayuktasya śeṣābhyāṃ yogād dve evaṃ tiktayuktasya kaṣāyayogād ekam evam  #
analyzed: evam amlasya ādi sthitasya lavaṇa yuktasya kaṭu ādi yogāt trīṇi tathā kaṭuka yuktasya śeṣābhyām yogāt dve evam tikta yuktasya kaṣāya yogāt ekam evam

analyzed: anena eva nyāyena lavaṇasya trīṇi kaṭoḥ ca ekam eva evam militvā tri rasāni viṃśatiḥ

analyzed: yuktau śeṣaiḥ pṛthak yogam yātaḥ svādu ūṣaṇau tathā

original: catūrase svādvamlāv ādisthitau lavaṇādibhir ekaikaśyena yuktau śeṣaiḥ kaṭvādibhir yogāt ṣaḍ bhavanti // 1
analyzed: catūrase svādu amlau ādi sthitau lavaṇa ādibhiḥ ekaikaśyena yuktau śeṣaiḥ kaṭu ādibhiḥ yogāt ṣaṭ bhavanti  /

original: svādulavaṇau sahitau ādisthitau kaṭvādibhiriti kaṭutiktābhyāṃ pṛthagyuktau śeṣair iti tiktakaṣāyābhyāṃ teneha bahuvacanaṃ jātau boddhavyam  #

evam trīṇi

original: amlalavaṇau saṃyuktau kaṭunā sahitau śeṣābhyāṃ yogād dve tathāmlalavaṇau tiktayuktau śeṣayogād ekam // 5
analyzed: amla lavaṇau saṃyuktau kaṭunā sahitau śeṣābhyām yogāt dve tathā amla lavaṇau tikta yuktau śeṣa yogāt ekam
amla kaṭū tathā iti anena amla kaṭu tikta kaṣāya rūpam ekam

evam pañcadaśa catūrasāni
ṣaḍ tu pañca rasāni āhuḥ ekaikasya apavarjanāt

original: ṣaṭ caivaikarasāni syur ekaṃ ṣaḍrasameva tu /
analyzed: ṣaṭ ca eva eka rasāni syuḥ ekam ṣaṣ rasam eva tu

original: atra ca rasānāṃ guṇatvenaikasmin dravye samavāyo yogaśabdenocyate // 2]
analyzed: atra ca rasānām guṇa tvena ekasmin dravye samavāyaḥ yoga śabdena ucyate
iti triṣaṣṭiḥ dravyāṇām nirdiṣṭāḥ rasa saṃkhyayā
triṣaṣṭiḥ syāt tu asaṃkhyeyā rasa anurasa kalpanāt

original: rasāstaratamābhyāṃ tāṃ saṃkhyām atipatanti hi // Car_1,26.23
analyzed: rasāḥ taratamābhyām tām saṃkhyām atipatanti hi

original: rasasaṃsargasya prakārāntareṇāsaṃkhyeyatām āha triṣaṣṭiḥ syād ityādi // 1
analyzed: rasa saṃsargasya prakāra antareṇa asaṃkhyeya tām āha triṣaṣṭiḥ syāt ityādi
anurasaḥ agre vakṣyamāṇaḥ

original: atra ca triṣaṣṭyātmakarase rasānurasakalpanā nāsti kevale madhurādau tadabhāvāt tena yathāsambhavaṃ saptapañcāśatsaṃyogaviṣayaṃ rasānurasakalpanaṃ  #
analyzed: atra ca triṣaṣṭi ātmaka rase rasa anurasa kalpanā na asti kevale madhura ādau tad abhāvāt tena yathāsambhavam saptapañcāśat saṃyoga viṣayam rasa anurasa kalpanam
jñeyam

original: prakārāntareṇāpy asaṃkhyeyatām āha rasās taratamābhyām ityādi // 5
analyzed: prakāra antareṇa api asaṃkhyeya tām āha rasāḥ taratamābhyām ityādi

original: kiṃvā rasānurasatvenaiva yāsaṃkhyeyatā tatraivāyaṃ hetuḥ rasās taratamābhyāmityādiḥ // 7]

rasānām tatra yogya tvāt kalpitāḥ rasa cintakaiḥ

original: evamasaṃkhyeyatve'pi triṣaṣṭividhaiva kalpanā cikitsāvyavahārārtham ihācāryaiḥ kalpitetyāha saṃyogā ityādi // 1
analyzed: evam asaṃkhyeya tve api triṣaṣṭividhā eva kalpanā cikitsā vyavahāra artham iha ācāryaiḥ kalpitā iti āha saṃyogāḥ ityādi

original: tatra yogyatvād iti tatra svasthāturahitacikitsāprayoge 'natisaṃkṣepavistararūpatayā hitatvād ityarthaḥ // 2]
analyzed: tatra yogya tvāt iti tatra svastha ātura hita cikitsā prayoge anatisaṃkṣepa vistara rūpatayā hita tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: kvacideko rasaḥ kalpyaḥ saṃyuktāś ca rasāḥ kvacit /
analyzed: kvacid ekaḥ rasaḥ kalpyaḥ saṃyuktāḥ ca rasāḥ kvacid
doṣa auṣadha ādīn saṃcintya bhiṣajā siddhim icchatā

original: rasān ekaikaśo vāpi kalpayanti gadān prati // Car_1,26.26

atra ādi grahaṇāt deśa kāla bala ādīnām anuktānām grahaṇam

analyzed: etat eva saṃyukta asaṃyukta rasa kalpanam bhinna rasa dravya melakāt vā aneka rasa eka dravya prayogāt ekarasa dravya prayogāt vā bhavati iti darśayan āha dravyāṇi ityādi

original: dvirasādīni utpattisiddhadvirasatrirasādīni dvirasaṃ yathā kaṣāyamadhuro mudgaḥ trirasaṃ yathā madhurāmlakaṣāyaṃ ca viṣṭambhi guru śītalam
analyzed: dvi rasa ādīni utpatti siddha dvi rasa tri rasa ādīni dvi rasam yathā kaṣāya madhuraḥ mudgaḥ tri rasam yathā madhura amla kaṣāyam ca viṣṭambhi guru śītalam

original: pittaśleṣmaharaṃ bhavyam ityādi catūrasas tilaḥ yad uktaṃ snigdhoṣṇamadhuras tiktaḥ

original: vyaktaṣaḍrasaṃ tu dravyam ihānuktaṃ viṣaṃ tv avyaktaṣaḍrasasaṃyuktaṃ hārīte tv eṇamāṃsaṃ

original: gadān pratīti prādhānyena tena svasthavṛtte 'pi boddhavyaṃ kiṃvā dvirasādibhedo gada
analyzed: gadān prati iti prādhānyena tena svastha vṛtte api boddhavyam kiṃvā dvi rasa ādi bhedaḥ gada

original: eva svasthe tu sarvarasaprayoga eva yaduktaṃ samasarvarasaṃ sātmyaṃ samadhātoḥ praśasyate iti // 8

original: evaṃ ca vyākhyāne sati kvacideko rasa ityādinā samamasya na paunaruktyam // 9

original: darśayati ata evānyācāryāntarābhiprāyeṇa kalpayantītyuktaṃ tena na paunaruktyam // 10]

original: atra rasavikalpajñānādeva vyādhihetudravyajñānaṃ kṛtsnamavaruddhaṃ rasajñānenaiva prāyaḥ sakaladravyaguṇasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt // 2
analyzed: atra rasa vikalpa jñānāt eva vyādhi hetu dravya jñānam kṛtsnam avaruddham rasa jñānena eva prāyas sakala dravya guṇasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt

original: doṣavikalpajñānācca liṅgajñānaṃ yāvaddhi liṅgaṃ tat sarvaṃ doṣavikalpasambaddham // 3

original: rasadoṣavikalpajñānāt tu bheṣajajñānaṃ yato rasataḥ svarūpajñānaṃ bheṣajadravyasya doṣataśca bheṣajaprayogaviṣayavijñānam // 4
analyzed: rasa doṣa vikalpa jñānāt tu bheṣaja jñānam yatas rasataḥ svarūpa jñānam bheṣaja dravyasya doṣataḥ ca bheṣaja prayoga viṣaya vijñānam

original: kiṃvā rasavikalpāc ca tathā doṣavikalpāc ca hetvādijñānaṃ pṛthageva vaktavyaṃ rasabhedāddhi tatkāryaṃ liṅgamapi jñāyate hetubheṣajavijñānaṃ  #

iti arthaḥ

original: pṛthaktvaṃ tu idaṃ dravyaṃ paṭalakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭāt pṛthag ityādikā buddhiryato bhavati tat pṛthaktvaṃ bhavati // 22
analyzed: pṛthaktvam tu idam dravyam paṭa lakṣaṇam ghaṭāt pṛthak iti ādikā buddhiḥ yatas bhavati tat pṛthaktvam bhavati
tat ca ācāryaḥ traividhyena āha pṛthaktvam ityādi

original: tatra yat sarvathāsaṃyujyamānayoriva meruhimācalayoḥ pṛthaktvam etadasaṃyoga ityanenoktam // 24
analyzed: tatra yat sarvathā asaṃyujyamānayoḥ iva meru himācalayoḥ pṛthaktvam etad asaṃyogaḥ iti anena uktam

original: tathā saṃyujyamānānāmapi pṛthaktvaṃ vijātīyānāṃ mahiṣavarāhādīnāṃ tadāha vailakṣaṇyamityādi // 25
analyzed: tathā saṃyujyamānānām api pṛthaktvam vijātīyānām mahiṣa varāha ādīnām tat āha vailakṣaṇyam ityādi
viśiṣṭa lakṣaṇa yuktatva lakṣitam vijātīyānām pṛthaktvam iti arthaḥ

original: tathaikajātīyānāmapy avilakṣaṇānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ pṛthaktvaṃ bhavatītyāha anekateti // 27
analyzed: tathā eka jātīyānām api avilakṣaṇānām māṣāṇām pṛthaktvam bhavati iti āha anekatā iti

original: ekajātīyeṣu hi saṃyukteṣu na vailakṣaṇyaṃ nāpyasaṃyogaḥ atha cānekatā pṛthaktvarūpā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ // 28
analyzed: eka jātīyeṣu hi saṃyukteṣu na vailakṣaṇyam na api asaṃyogaḥ atha ca anekatā pṛthaktva rūpā bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: kiṃvā pṛthaktvaṃ guṇāntaramicchan lokavyavahārārtham asaṃyogavailakṣaṇyānekatārūpameva yathodāhṛtaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ darśayati // 29
analyzed: kiṃvā pṛthaktvam guṇa antaram icchan lokavyavahāra artham asaṃyoga vailakṣaṇya anekatā rūpam eva yathā udāhṛtam pṛthaktvam darśayati
mānam prastha āḍhaka ādi tulā ādi meyam

original: karaṇaṃ guṇāntarādhāyakatvaṃ saṃskaraṇamityarthaḥ yadvakṣyati saṃskāro hi guṇāntarādhānamucyate iti // 30
analyzed: karaṇam guṇa antara ādhāyaka tvam saṃskaraṇam iti arthaḥ yat vakṣyati saṃskāraḥ hi guṇa antara ādhānam ucyate iti
bhāvasya ṣaṣṭika ādeḥ vyāyāma ādeḥ ca abhyasanam abhyāsaḥ

original: abhyasanameva lokaprasiddhābhyāṃ paryāyābhyāṃ vivṛṇoti śīlanaṃ satatakriyeti yaṃ lokāḥ śīlanasatatakriyābhyām abhidadhati so 'bhyāsa iti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: abhyasanam eva loka prasiddhābhyām paryāyābhyām vivṛṇoti śīlanam satata kriyā iti yam lokāḥ śīlana satata kriyābhyām abhidadhati saḥ abhyāsaḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: ayaṃ ca saṃyogasaṃskāraviśeṣarūpo 'pi viśeṣeṇa cikitsopayuktatvāt pṛthagucyate // 33
analyzed: ayam ca saṃyoga saṃskāra viśeṣa rūpaḥ api viśeṣeṇa cikitsā upayukta tvāt pṛthak ucyate

original: na yathāvat pravartata iti vacanena śabdādiṣu ca gurvādiṣu ca parādīnāmaprādhānyaṃ sūcayati // 34]
analyzed: na yathāvat pravartate iti vacanena śabda ādiṣu ca guru ādiṣu ca para ādīnām aprādhānyam sūcayati
guṇāḥ guṇa āśrayāḥ na uktāḥ tasmāt rasa guṇān bhiṣak
vidyāt dravya guṇān kartuḥ abhiprāyāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ

original: samprati rasānāṃ parasparasaṃyogo guṇa uktaḥ tathāgre ca snigdhatvādirguṇo vācyaḥ sa ca guṇarūparase na sambhavatīti yathā rasānāṃ guṇanirdeśo  #
analyzed: samprati rasānām paraspara saṃyogaḥ guṇaḥ uktaḥ tathā agre ca snigdha tva ādiḥ guṇaḥ vācyaḥ sa ca guṇa rūpa rase na sambhavati iti yathā rasānām guṇa nirdeśaḥ
boddhavyaḥ tat āha guṇāḥ ityādi

original: guṇā guṇāśrayā noktā iti dīrghaṃjīvitīye samavāyī tu niśceṣṭaḥ kāraṇaṃ guṇaḥ ityanena // 2
analyzed: guṇāḥ guṇa āśrayāḥ na uktāḥ iti dīrghaṃjīvitīye samavāyī tu niśceṣṭaḥ kāraṇam guṇaḥ iti anena

original: rasaguṇāniti rase snigdhādīn guṇān nirdiṣṭān tad rasādhāradravyaguṇān eva vidyāt // 3
analyzed: rasa guṇān iti rase snigdha ādīn guṇān nirdiṣṭān tat rasa ādhāra dravyaguṇān eva vidyāt

original: nanu yadi dravyaguṇā eva te tat kimiti rasaguṇatvenocyanta ityāha karturityādi karturiti tantrakartuḥ // 4
analyzed: nanu yadi dravya guṇāḥ eva te tat kim iti rasa guṇa tvena ucyante iti āha kartuḥ ityādi kartuḥ iti tantra kartuḥ

original: abhiprāyā iti tatra tatropacāreṇa tathā sāmānyaśabdādiprayogeṇa tantrakaraṇabuddhayaḥ
analyzed: abhiprāyāḥ iti tatra tatra upacāreṇa tathā sāmānya śabda ādi prayogeṇa tantra karaṇa buddhayaḥ

original: sāmānyaśabdopacārādiprayogaś ca prakaraṇādivaśād eva sphuṭatvāt tathā prayojanavaśāc ca kriyate // 5
analyzed: sāmānya śabda upacāra ādi prayogaḥ ca prakaraṇa ādi vaśāt eva sphuṭa tvāt tathā prayojana vaśāt ca kriyate

original: tacca prakaraṇādi ataśca prakṛtaṃ buddhvā ityādau darśayiṣyāmaḥ // 6
analyzed: tat ca prakaraṇa ādi atas ca prakṛtam buddhvā ityādau darśayiṣyāmaḥ

original: iha ca dravyaguṇānāṃ raseṣu yadupacaraṇaṃ tasyāyamabhiprāyo yat madhurādinirdeśenaiva
analyzed: iha ca dravya guṇānām raseṣu yat upacaraṇam tasya ayam abhiprāyaḥ yat madhura ādi nirdeśena eva

original: snigdhaśītādiguṇā api prāyo madhurādyavyabhicāriṇo dravye nirdiṣṭā bhavantīti na
analyzed: snigdha śīta ādi guṇāḥ api prāyas madhura ādi avyabhicāriṇaḥ dravye nirdiṣṭāḥ bhavanti iti na

original: madhuratvaṃ nirdiśya snigdhatvādipratipādanaṃ punaḥ pṛthak kriyata iti // 7]
analyzed: madhura tvam nirdiśya snigdha tva ādi pratipādanam punar pṛthak kriyate iti
atas ca prakṛtam buddhvā deśa kāla antarāṇi ca
tantra kartuḥ abhiprāyān upāyān ca artham ādiśet

original: abhiprāyapṛthaktve sati yathā grantho boddhavyas tadāha ataś cetyādi // 1
analyzed: abhiprāya pṛthaktve sati yathā granthaḥ boddhavyaḥ tat āha atas ca ityādi

original: tatra prakṛtaṃ buddhvā yathā kṣārāḥ kṣīraṃ phalaṃ puṣpam ityatrodbhidagaṇasya prakṛtatvāt kṣīramiti snuhyādikṣīram eva kṣīraśabdena vadet //
analyzed: tatra prakṛtam buddhvā yathā kṣārāḥ kṣīram phalam puṣpam iti atra udbhida gaṇasya prakṛta tvāt kṣīram iti snuhī ādi kṣīram eva kṣīra śabdena vadet

original: deśāntaraṃ buddhveti yathā śirasi śodhane 'bhidhīyamāne krimivyādhau iti tacchirogatakrimivyādhāv eva bhavati // 3
analyzed: deśa antaram buddhvā iti yathā śirasi śodhane abhidhīyamāne krimi vyādhau iti tat śiraḥ gata krimi vyādhau eva bhavati

original: kālāntare yathā vamanakāle 'bhihitaṃ pratigrahāṃś copahārayed iti tatra pratigrahaśabdena pātramucyate na tu grahaṇaṃ pratigrahaḥ // 4
analyzed: kāla antare yathā vamana kāle abhihitam pratigrahān ca upahārayet iti tatra pratigraha śabdena pātram ucyate na tu grahaṇam pratigrahaḥ

original: tantrakartur abhiprāyān iti yathoktaṃ raseṣu guṇāropaṇe tad boddhavyam // 5
analyzed: tantra kartuḥ abhiprāyān iti yathā uktam raseṣu guṇa āropaṇe tat boddhavyam
upāyān iti śāstra upāyān tantra yukti rūpān
artham abhidheyam

original: yadyapi prakṛtādayo 'pi tantrakartur abhiprāyā eva tathāpi yatra prakṛtatvādi na sphuṭaṃ pratīyate tatra tantrakartur abhiprāyatvena boddhavyam
analyzed: yadi api prakṛta ādayaḥ api tantra kartuḥ abhiprāyāḥ eva tathā api yatra prakṛta tva ādi na sphuṭam pratīyate tatra tantra kartuḥ abhiprāya tvena boddhavyam
ṣaṣ vibhaktīḥ pravakṣyāmi rasānām atas uttaram

original: ṣaṭ pañcabhūtaprabhavāḥ saṃkhyātāśca yathā rasāḥ // Car_1,26.38
analyzed: ṣaṭ pañcabhūta prabhavāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ ca yathā rasāḥ
ṣaṣ vibhaktīḥ iti madhura ādi ṣaṣ vibhāgān iti arthaḥ

original: ṣaṭ pañcabhūtaprabhavā iti pañcabhūtaprabhavāḥ santo yathoktena prakāreṇa somaguṇātirekāt ityādinā yathā ṣaṭ saṃkhyātāḥ ṣaṭsaṃkhyāparicchinnā  #
analyzed: ṣaṭ pañcabhūta prabhavāḥ iti pañcabhūta prabhavāḥ santaḥ yathā uktena prakāreṇa soma guṇa atirekāt ityādinā yathā ṣaṭ saṃkhyātāḥ ṣaṣ saṃkhyā paricchinnā  /
bhavanti tathā vakṣyāmi iti yojanā

original: saumyāḥ khalvāpo'ntarikṣaprabhavāḥ prakṛtiśītā laghvyaś cāvyaktarasāśca tāstvantarikṣādbhraśyamānā
analyzed: saumyāḥ khalu āpaḥ antarikṣa prabhavāḥ prakṛti śītāḥ laghvyaḥ ca avyakta rasāḥ ca tāḥ tu antarikṣāt bhraśyamānā

original: bhraṣṭāśca pañcamahāguṇasamanvitā jaṅgamasthāvarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrtīr abhiprīṇayanti
analyzed: bhraṣṭāḥ ca pañca mahāguṇa samanvitāḥ jaṅgama sthāvarāṇām bhūtānām mūrtīḥ abhiprīṇayanti

original: tāsu mūrtiṣu ṣaḍ abhimūrchanti rasāḥ // Car_1,26.39
analyzed: tāsu mūrtiṣu ṣaṭ abhimūrchanti rasāḥ

original: samprati rasānām ādikāraṇameva tāvad āha saumyā ityādi // 1
analyzed: samprati rasānām ādi kāraṇam eva tāvat āha saumyāḥ ityādi
saumyāḥ soma devatākāḥ

original: bhraśyamānā iti vadatā bhūmisambandhavyatirekeṇāntarīkṣeritaiḥ pṛthivyādiparamāṇvādibhiḥ sambandho rasārambhako bhavatīti darśyate // 3
analyzed: bhraśyamānāḥ iti vadatā bhūmi sambandha vyatirekeṇa antarīkṣa īritaiḥ pṛthivī ādi paramāṇu ādibhiḥ sambandhaḥ rasa ārambhakaḥ bhavati iti darśyate  /
mūrtīḥ iti vyaktīḥ
abhiprīṇayanti iti tarpayanti kiṃvā janayanti
abhimūrchanti rasāḥ iti vyaktim yānti

original: atra cāntarīkṣamudakaṃ rasakāraṇatve pradhānatvāduktaṃ tena kṣitistham api sthāvarajaṅgamotpattau rasakāraṇaṃ bhavatyeva // 7]
analyzed: atra ca āntarīkṣam udakam rasa kāraṇa tve pradhāna tvāt uktam tena kṣiti stham api sthāvara jaṅgama utpattau rasa kāraṇam bhavati eva

original: teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ somaguṇātirekānmadhuro rasaḥ pṛthivyagnibhūyiṣṭhatvādamlaḥ salilāgnibhūyiṣṭhatvāl
analyzed: teṣām ṣaṇṇām rasānām soma guṇa atirekāt madhuraḥ rasaḥ pṛthivī agni bhūyiṣṭha tvāt amlaḥ salila agni bhūyiṣṭha tvāt

original: lavaṇaḥ vāyvagnibhūyiṣṭhatvātkaṭukaḥ vāyvākāśātiriktatvāt tiktaḥ pavanapṛthivīvyatirekāt kaṣāya iti /
analyzed: lavaṇaḥ vāyu agni bhūyiṣṭha tvāt kaṭukaḥ vāyu ākāśa atirikta tvāt tiktaḥ pavana pṛthivī vyatirekāt kaṣāyaḥ iti

original: evameṣāṃ rasānāṃ ṣaṭtvam upapannaṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣān mahābhūtānāṃ bhūtānāmiva sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ
analyzed: evam eṣām rasānām ṣaṭtvam upapannam nyūna atireka viśeṣāt mahābhūtānām bhūtānām iva sthāvara jaṅgamānām

original: nānāvarṇākṛtiviśeṣāḥ ṣaḍṛtukatvācca kālasyopapanno mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣaḥ // Car_1,26.40
analyzed: nānā varṇa ākṛti viśeṣāḥ ṣaḍṛtuka tvāt ca kālasya upapannaḥ mahābhūtānām nyūna atireka viśeṣaḥ

original: somaguṇātirekāditi atirekaśabdena sarveṣveva raseṣu sarvabhūtasāṃnidhyam asti kvacit
analyzed: soma guṇa atirekāt iti atireka śabdena sarveṣu eva raseṣu sarva bhūta sāṃnidhyam asti kvacid

original: tu kasyacid bhūtaguṇasyātirekād rasaviśeṣe bhavatīti darśayati etacca madhuraṃ prati
analyzed: tu kasyacid bhūta guṇasya atirekāt rasa viśeṣe bhavati iti darśayati etat ca madhuram prati

original: abguṇātiriktatvaṃ viśeṣotpattau kāraṇatvena jñeyaṃ yaccādhārakāraṇatvam apāṃ tat
analyzed: abguṇa atirikta tvam viśeṣa utpattau kāraṇa tvena jñeyam yat ca ādhāra kāraṇatvam apām tat
sarva sādhāraṇam
evam lavaṇe api apām kāraṇa tvam jñeyam

original: lavaṇastu suśrute pṛthivyagnyatirekāt paṭhitaḥ asmiṃś ca virodhe kāryavirodho nāstyeva // 3
analyzed: lavaṇaḥ tu suśrute pṛthivī agni atirekāt paṭhitaḥ asmin ca virodhe kārya virodhaḥ na asti eva

original: nanu uṣṇaśītābhyāmagnisalilābhyāṃ kṛtasya lavaṇasyāpy uṣṇaśītatvena bhavitavyaṃ tal
analyzed: nanu uṣṇa śītābhyām agni salilābhyām kṛtasya lavaṇasya api uṣṇa śīta tvena bhavitavyam tat

original: lavaṇaṃ katham uṣṇaṃ bhavati naivaṃ yato bhūtānām ayaṃ svabhāvo yat kenacit prakāreṇa
analyzed: lavaṇam katham uṣṇam bhavati na evam yatas bhūtānām ayam svabhāvaḥ yat kenacid prakāreṇa

original: saṃniviṣṭāḥ kaṃcid guṇam ārabhante na sarvam // 4
analyzed: saṃniviṣṭāḥ kaṃcid guṇam ārabhante na sarvam

original: yathā makuṣṭhake 'dbhir madhuro rasaḥ kriyate na snehaḥ tathā saindhave vahnināpi noṣṇatvam ārabhyate // 5
analyzed: yathā makuṣṭhake adbhiḥ madhuraḥ rasaḥ kriyate na snehaḥ tathā saindhave vahninā api na uṣṇa tvam ārabhyate

original: ayaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ saṃniveśo 'dṛṣṭaprabhāvakṛta eva sa ca saṃniveśaḥ kāryadarśanenonneyaḥ // 6
analyzed: ayam ca bhūtānām saṃniveśaḥ adṛṣṭa prabhāva kṛtaḥ eva sa ca saṃniveśaḥ kārya darśanena unneyaḥ

original: tena yatra kāryaṃ dṛśyate tatra kalpyate yathā lavaṇe uṣṇatvād agnir viṣyanditvācca jalamanumīyate // 7
analyzed: tena yatra kāryam dṛśyate tatra kalpyate yathā lavaṇe uṣṇa tvāt agniḥ viṣyandi tvāt ca jalam anumīyate
āgama vedanīyaḥ ca ayam arthaḥ na atra asmadvidhānām kalpanāḥ prasaranti

original: etena yaducyate toyavat pṛthivyādayo'pi kimiti pṛthagrasāntaraṃ na kurvanti tathā
analyzed: etena yat ucyate toya vat pṛthivī ādayaḥ api kim iti pṛthak rasa antaram na kurvanti tathā

original: toyavātādisaṃyogādibhyaḥ kimiti rasāntarāṇi notpadyanta iti tadapi bhūtasvabhāvāparyanuyogād eva pratyuktam // 9
analyzed: toya vāta ādi saṃyoga ādibhyaḥ kim iti rasa antarāṇi na utpadyante iti tat api bhūta svabhāvā paryanuyogāt eva pratyuktam

original: iha ca kāraṇatvaṃ bhūtānāṃ rasasya madhuratvādiviśeṣa eva nimittakāraṇarūpam ucyate tena nīrasānām api hi dahanādīnāṃ kāraṇatvamupapannam eva  #
analyzed: iha ca kāraṇa tvam bhūtānām rasasya madhura tva ādi viśeṣaḥ eva nimitta kāraṇa rūpam ucyate tena nīrasānām api hi dahana ādīnām kāraṇa tvam upapannam eva
vyutpāditam
rasa bhedam dṛṣṭāntena sādhayan āha evam ityādi

original: rasānāṃ ṣaṭtvaṃ mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣāt somaguṇātirekapṛthivyagnyatirekādeḥ ṣaḍutpādakāraṇādupapannaṃ ṣaḍbhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ ṣaṭ kāryāṇi  #
analyzed: rasānām ṣaṭtvam mahābhūtānām nyūna atireka viśeṣāt soma guṇa atireka pṛthivī agni atireka ādeḥ ṣaṣ utpāda kāraṇāt upapannam ṣaḍbhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ ṣaḍ kāryāṇi
bhavanti iti yuktam eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: bhūtānāṃ yathā nānāvarṇākṛtiviśeṣā mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣāt tathā rasānām apīti // 13
analyzed: bhūtānām yathā nānā varṇa ākṛti viśeṣāḥ mahābhūtānām nyūna atireka viśeṣāt tathā rasānām api iti

original: bhūtānāṃ yathoktānām atirekaviśeṣahetum āha ṣaḍṛtukatvād ityādi // 14
analyzed: bhūtānām yathā uktānām atireka viśeṣa hetum āha ṣaḍṛtuka tvāt ityādi

original: ṣaḍṛtukatvena kālo nānāhemantādirūpatayā kaṃcidbhūtaviśeṣaṃ kvacidvardhayati sa cātmakāryaṃ
analyzed: ṣaḍṛtuka tvena kālaḥ nānā hemanta ādi rūpatayā kaṃcid bhūta viśeṣam kvacid vardhayati sa ca ātma kāryam

original: rasaṃ puṣṭaṃ karoti yathā hemantakāle somaguṇātireko bhavati śiśire vāyvākāśātirekaḥ
analyzed: rasam puṣṭam karoti yathā hemanta kāle soma guṇa atirekaḥ bhavati śiśire vāyu ākāśa atirekaḥ

original: evaṃ tasyāśitīyoktarasotpādakrameṇa vasantādāv api bhūtotkarṣo jñeyaḥ ṣaḍṛtukācceti
analyzed: evam tasyāśitīya ukta rasa utpāda krameṇa vasanta ādau api bhūta utkarṣaḥ jñeyaḥ ṣaḍṛtukāt ca iti

original: cakāreṇāhorātrakṛto 'pi bhūtotkarṣo jñeyaḥ tathādṛṣṭakṛtaś ca tena hemantādāv api
analyzed: cakāreṇa ahar rātra kṛtaḥ api bhūta utkarṣaḥ jñeyaḥ tathā adṛṣṭa kṛtaḥ ca tena hemanta ādau api
rasa antara utpādaḥ kvacid vastuni upapannaḥ bhavati

original: yadyapi ca ṛtubhede'pi bhūtotkarṣaviśeṣa eva kāraṇaṃ yaduktaṃ tāv etāv arkavāyū ityādi

original: kiṃca pṛthivīsomaguṇātirekān madhuraḥ pāko bhavati vāyvagnyākāśātirekācca kaṭur bhavatīti
analyzed: kiṃca pṛthivī soma guṇa atirekāt madhuraḥ pākaḥ bhavati vāyu agni ākāśa atirekāt ca kaṭuḥ bhavati iti

original: pakṣe yadā vyāmiśraguṇātirekatā bhavati tadā somāgnyātmakasyāmlasyotpādaḥ kathaṃ
analyzed: pakṣe yadā vyāmiśra guṇa atirekatā bhavati tadā soma agni ātmakasya amlasya utpādaḥ katham
pratikṣepaṇīyaḥ

original: athavā tantrakārayoḥ kim anayor anena vacanamātravirodhena kartavyaṃ yato yadamlapākaṃ
analyzed: athavā tantra kārayoḥ kim anayoḥ anena vacana mātra virodhena kartavyam yatas yat amla pākam

original: carako brūte tatsuśrutena vīryoṣṇam iti kṛtvā samādhīyate tena na kaścid dravyaguṇe virodhaḥ // 14
analyzed: carakaḥ brūte tat suśrutena vīrya uṣṇam iti kṛtvā samādhīyate tena na kaścid dravya guṇe virodhaḥ

original: yattu suśrute'mlapākanirāsārthaṃ dūṣaṇam ucyate pittaṃ hi vidagdhamamlatāmupaiti ityādinā tadanabhyupagamādeva nirastam // 15
analyzed: yat tu suśrute amla pāka nirāsa artham dūṣaṇam ucyate pittam hi vidagdham amla tām upaiti ityādinā tad anabhyupagamāt eva nirastam

original: nanu lavaṇasya madhurapākitve pittaraktādikartṛtvamanupapannaṃ tathā tiktakaṣāyayoḥ
analyzed: nanu lavaṇasya madhura pāki tve pitta rakta ādi kartṛ tvam anupapannam tathā tikta kaṣāyayoḥ

original: kaṭupākitve pittahantṛtvamanupapannaṃ naivaṃ satyapi lavaṇasya madhurapākitve tatra
analyzed: kaṭu pāki tve pitta hantṛ tvam anupapannam na evam sati api lavaṇasya madhura pāki tve tatra

original: lavaṇarasa uṣṇaṃ ca vīryaṃ yadasti tena tat pittaraktādikārakaṃ vipākastu tatra pittaraktaharaṇalakṣaṇe
analyzed: lavaṇa rase uṣṇam ca vīryam yat asti tena tat pitta rakta ādi kārakam vipākaḥ tu tatra pitta rakta haraṇa lakṣaṇe

original: kārye bādhitaḥ san sṛṣṭaviṇmūtra ityādinā lakṣaṇena lakṣyata eva // 16
analyzed: kārye bādhitaḥ san sṛṣṭa viṣ mūtraḥ ityādinā lakṣaṇena lakṣyate eva

original: etena yaducyate lavaṇe madhuro vipākaścedrasavīryābhyāṃ bādhitaḥ san svakāryakaro na bhavati tatkiṃ tenopadiṣṭeneti tannirastaṃ bhavati //
analyzed: etena yat ucyate lavaṇe madhuraḥ vipākaḥ ced rasa vīryābhyām bādhitaḥ san sva kārya karaḥ na bhavati tat kim tena upadiṣṭena iti tat nirastam bhavati

original: yato'styeva sṛṣṭaviṇmūtratādinā tatra lavaṇe madhuravipākitvaṃ lakṣaṇīyam // 18
analyzed: yatas asti eva sṛṣṭa viṣ mūtra tā ādinā tatra lavaṇe madhura vipāki tvam lakṣaṇīyam
anayā diśā tikta kaṣāyayoḥ api pūrvapakṣa parihāraḥ

original: anye tv etaddoṣabhayāl lavaṇo'pyamlaṃ pacyata iti vyākhyānayanti lavaṇastathetyatra tathāśabdena viprakṛṣṭasyāmlamityasya karṣaṇāditi // 20
analyzed: anye tu etad doṣa bhayāt lavaṇaḥ api amlam pacyate iti vyākhyānayanti lavaṇaḥ tathā iti atra tathāśabdena viprakṛṣṭasya amlam ityasya karṣaṇāt iti

original: tanna kaṭvādīnāṃ kaṭurvipāko'mlo'mlasya śeṣayor madhuraḥ iti jatūkarṇavacanāt // 21
analyzed: tat na kaṭu ādīnām kaṭuḥ vipākaḥ amlaḥ amlasya śeṣayoḥ madhuraḥ iti jatūkarṇa vacanāt

original: naca vācyaṃ kasmāt traya eva vipākā bhavanti na punastiktādayo'pīti yato bhūtasvabhāva evaiṣaḥ yena madhurādayas traya eva bhavanti bhūtasvabhāvāś  #
analyzed: na ca vācyam kasmāt trayaḥ eva vipākāḥ bhavanti na punar tikta ādayaḥ api iti yatas bhūta svabhāvaḥ eva eṣaḥ yena madhura ādayaḥ trayaḥ eva bhavanti bhūta svabhāvāḥ
ca a paryanuyojyāḥ

original: nanu yaśca rasaviparītaḥ pāko yathā lavaṇasya madhuraḥ tiktakaṣāyayoś ca kaṭuḥ sa
analyzed: nanu yaḥ ca rasa viparītaḥ pākaḥ yathā lavaṇasya madhuraḥ tikta kaṣāyayoḥ ca kaṭuḥ sa

original: ucyatāṃ yastu samānaguṇo madhurasya madhuro'mlasyāmlaḥ kaṭukasya vā kaṭukaḥ tatkathane
analyzed: ucyatām yaḥ tu samāna guṇaḥ madhurasya madhuraḥ amlasya amlaḥ kaṭukasya vā kaṭukaḥ tad kathane

original: kiṃ prayojanaṃ yato rasaguṇair eva tatra vipākaguṇo'pi jñāsyate // 23
analyzed: kim prayojanam yatas rasa guṇaiḥ eva tatra vipāka guṇaḥ api jñāsyate

original: naivaṃ yena lavaṇādivad visadṛśarasāntarotpādaśaṅkānirārāsārtham api tatrānuguṇo'pi
analyzed: na evam yena lavaṇa ādi vat api tatra anuguṇaḥ api

original: vipāko vaktavya eva vipākajaśca rasa āhārapariṇāmānte bhavati prākṛtastu raso vipākaviruddhaḥ
analyzed: vipākaḥ vaktavyaḥ eva vipāka jaḥ ca rasaḥ āhāra pariṇāma ante bhavati prākṛtaḥ tu rasaḥ vipāka viruddhaḥ

original: pariṇāmakālaṃ varjayitvā jñeyaḥ tena pippalyāḥ kaṭukarasatvam ādau kaṇṭhasthaśleṣmakṣapaṇamukhaśodhanādikartṛtvena
saprayojanaṃ madhuravipākatvaṃ tu pariṇāmena vṛṣyatvādijñāpanena saprayojanam // 24
analyzed: sa prayojanam madhura vipāka tvam tu pariṇāmena vṛṣya tva ādi jñāpanena sa prayojanam

original: tathā yatra vipākasya rasāḥ samānaguṇatayānuguṇā bhavanti tatra balavat kāryaṃ bhavati viparyaye tu durbalam iti jñeyam // 25
analyzed: tathā yatra vipākasya rasāḥ samāna guṇatayā anuguṇāḥ bhavanti tatra balavat kāryam bhavati viparyaye tu durbalam iti jñeyam  /

original: etacca pākatrayaṃ dravyaniyataṃ tena grahaṇyadhyāye vakṣyamāṇāhārāvasthāpākādbhinnam
analyzed: etat ca pāka trayam dravya niyatam tena grahaṇī adhyāye vakṣyamāṇa āhāra avasthā pākāt bhinnam

original: eva tatra hy aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāmeva rasānām avasthāvaśāt trayaḥ pākā vācyāḥ annasya
analyzed: eva tatra hi aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām eva rasānām avasthā vaśāt trayaḥ pākāḥ vācyāḥ annasya
bhukta mātrasya ṣaṣ rasasya prapākataḥ ityādinā granthena
vīryam aṣṭavidham kecid kecid dvividham āsthitāḥ

original: śītoṣṇamiti vīryaṃ tu kriyate yena yā kriyā /
analyzed: śīta uṣṇam iti vīryam tu kriyate yena yā kriyā

original: nāvīryaṃ kurute kiṃcit sarvā vīryakṛtā kriyā // Car_1,26.65
analyzed: na avīryam kurute kiṃcid sarvā vīrya kṛtā kriyā
ekīya matena vīrya lakṣaṇam āha mṛdu ityādi
etat ca ekīya mata dvayam pāribhāṣikīm vīrya saṃjñām puraskṛtya pravṛttam

original: vaidyake hi rasavipākaprabhāvavyatirikte prabhūtakāryakāriṇi guṇe vīryamiti saṃjñā
analyzed: vaidyake hi rasa vipāka prabhāva vyatirikte prabhūta kārya kāriṇi guṇe vīryam iti saṃjñā

original: tenāṣṭavidhavīryavādimate picchilaviśadādayo guṇā na rasādiviparītaṃ kāryaṃ prāyaḥ
analyzed: tena aṣṭavidha vīrya vādi mate picchila viśada ādayaḥ guṇāḥ na rasa ādi viparītam kāryam prāyas

original: kurvanti tena teṣāṃ rasādyupadeśenaiva grahaṇaṃ mṛdvādīnāṃ tu rasādyabhibhāvakatvamasti
analyzed: kurvanti tena teṣām rasa ādi upadeśena eva grahaṇam mṛdu ādīnām tu rasa ādi abhibhāvaka tvam asti

original: yathā pippalyāṃ kaṭurasakāryaṃ pittakopanamabhibhūya tadgate mṛduśītavīrye pittameva
analyzed: yathā pippalyām kaṭu rasa kāryam pitta kopanam abhibhūya tad gate mṛdu śīta vīrye pittam eva

original: śamayatīti tathā kaṣāye tiktānurase mahati pañcamūle tatkāryaṃ vātakopanam abhibhūyoṣṇena
analyzed: śamayati iti tathā kaṣāye tikta anurase mahati pañcamūle tat kāryam vāta kopanam abhibhūya uṣṇena

original: vīryeṇa tadviruddhaṃ vātaśamanameva kriyate tathā madhure'pīkṣau śītavīryatvena vātavṛddhir ityādi // 3
analyzed: vīryeṇa tad viruddham vāta śamanam eva kriyate tathā madhure api ikṣau śīta vīrya tvena vāta vṛddhiḥ ityādi

original: yaduktaṃ suśrute etāni khalu vīryāṇi svabalaguṇotkarṣād rasam abhibhūyātmakarma darśayanti ityādi // 4
analyzed: yat uktam suśrute etāni khalu vīryāṇi sva bala guṇa utkarṣāt rasam abhibhūya ātma karma darśayanti ityādi

original: śītoṣṇavīryavādimataṃ tv agnīṣomīyatvāj jagataḥ śītoṣṇayoreva prādhānyājjñeyam // 5
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa vīrya vādi matam tu agnīṣomīyatvāt jagataḥ śīta uṣṇayoḥ eva prādhānyāt jñeyam  /
uktam ca
nānā ātmakam api dravyam agnīṣomau mahā balau
vyakta avyaktam jagat iva na atikrāmati jātucit vā

original: etacca matadvayam apyācāryasya paribhāṣāsiddhamanumatameva yenottaratra rasavīryavipākānāṃ sāmānyaṃ yatra lakṣyate ityādau pāribhāṣikam eva  #
analyzed: etat ca mata dvayam api ācāryasya paribhāṣā siddham anumatam eva yena uttaratra rasa vīrya vipākānām sāmānyam yatra lakṣyate iti ādau pāribhāṣikam eva
vīryam nirdekṣyati

original: pāribhāṣikavīryasaṃjñāparityāgena tu śaktiparyāyasya vīryasya lakṣaṇamāha vīryaṃ tv ityādi // 8
analyzed: pāribhāṣika vīrya saṃjñā parityāgena tu śakti paryāyasya vīryasya lakṣaṇam āha vīryam tu ityādi
vīryam iti śaktiḥ

original: yeneti rasena vā vipākena vā prabhāvena vā gurvādiparādibhirvā guṇairyā kriyā tarpaṇahlādanaśamanādirūpā kriyate tasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ tad rasādi  #
analyzed: yena iti rasena vā vipākena vā prabhāvena vā guru ādi para ādibhiḥ vā guṇaiḥ yā kriyā tarpaṇa hlādana śamana ādi rūpā kriyate tasyām kriyāyām tat rasa ādi
vīryam

original: ata evoktaṃ suśrute yena kurvanti tadvīryam iti // 11
analyzed: atas eva uktam suśrute yena kurvanti tat vīryam iti

original: atraiva lokaprasiddhām upapattim āha nāvīryam ityādi // 12
analyzed: atra eva loka prasiddhām upapattim āha na avīryam ityādi
avīryam aśaktam iti arthaḥ
vīrya kṛtā iti vīryavatā kṛtā vīrya kṛtā
rasaḥ nipāte dravyāṇām vipākaḥ karma niṣṭhayā
vīryam yāvat adhīvāsāt nipātāt ca upalabhyate

original: rasādīnāmekadravyaniviṣṭānāṃ bhedena nārthaṃ lakṣaṇamāha raso nipāta ityādi // 1
analyzed: rasa ādīnām eka dravya niviṣṭānām bhedena na artham lakṣaṇam āha rasaḥ nipāte ityādi
nipāte iti rasanā yoge

original: karmaniṣṭhayeti karmaṇo niṣṭhā niṣpattiḥ karmaniṣṭhā kriyāparisamāptiḥ rasopayoge
analyzed: karma niṣṭhayā iti karmaṇaḥ niṣṭhā niṣpattiḥ karma niṣṭhā kriyā parisamāptiḥ rasa upayoge

original: sati yo 'ntyāhārapariṇāmakṛtaḥ karmaviśeṣaḥ kaphaśukrābhivṛddhyādilakṣaṇaḥ tena vipāko niścīyate // 3
analyzed: sati yaḥ antya āhāra pariṇāma kṛtaḥ karma viśeṣaḥ kapha śukra abhivṛddhi ādi lakṣaṇaḥ tena vipākaḥ niścīyate  /

original: adhīvāsaḥ sahāvasthānaṃ yāvad adhīvāsāditi yāvaccharīranivāsāt etacca vipākātpūrvaṃ nipātāccordhvaṃ jñeyam // 4
analyzed: adhīvāsaḥ saha avasthānam yāvat adhīvāsāt iti yāvat śarīra nivāsāt etat ca vipākāt pūrvam nipātāt ca ūrdhvam jñeyam

original: nipātācceti śarīrasaṃyogamātrāt tena kiṃcid vīryam adhīvāsād upalabhyate yathānūpamāṃsāder
analyzed: nipātāt ca iti śarīra saṃyoga mātrāt tena kiṃcid vīryam adhīvāsāt upalabhyate yathā ānūpa māṃsa ādeḥ

original: uṣṇatvaṃ kiṃcic ca nipātādeva labhyate yathā marīcādīnāṃ tīkṣṇatvādi kiṃcic ca nipātādhīvāsābhyāṃ
analyzed: uṣṇa tvam kiṃcid ca nipātāt eva labhyate yathā marīca ādīnām tīkṣṇa tva ādi kiṃcid ca nipāta adhīvāsābhyām
yathā marīca ādīnām eva

original: etena rasaḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva vipākastu nityaparokṣaḥ tatkāryeṇānumīyate vīryaṃ tu kiṃcidanumānena
analyzed: etena rasaḥ pratyakṣeṇa eva vipākaḥ tu nitya parokṣaḥ tad kāryeṇa anumīyate vīryam tu kiṃcid anumānena

original: yathā saindhavagataṃ śaityam ānūpamāṃsagataṃ vā auṣṇyaṃ kiṃcic ca vīryaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva
analyzed: yathā saindhava gatam śaityam ānūpa māṃsa gatam vā auṣṇyam kiṃcid ca vīryam pratyakṣeṇa eva

original: yathā rājikāgatam auṣṇyaṃ ghrāṇena picchilaviśadasnigdharūkṣādayaḥ cakṣuḥsparśanābhyāṃ
analyzed: yathā rājikā gatam auṣṇyam ghrāṇena picchila viśada snigdha rūkṣa ādayaḥ cakṣuḥ sparśanābhyām
niścīyante iti vākya arthaḥ

original: etacca vīryaṃ sahajaṃ kṛtrimaṃ ca jñeyam // 7
analyzed: etat ca vīryam sahajam kṛtrimam ca jñeyam

original: etacca yathāsambhavaṃ gurulaghvādiṣu vīryeṣu lakṣaṇaṃ jñeyam // 8
analyzed: etat ca yathāsambhavam guru laghu ādiṣu vīryeṣu lakṣaṇam jñeyam
dravyāṇām iti upayujyamāna dravyāṇām
tat ca vīrya lakṣaṇam pāribhāṣika vīrya viṣayam eva
rasa vīrya vipākānām sāmānyam yatra lakṣyate

original: viśeṣaḥ karmaṇāṃ caiva prabhāvastasya sa smṛtaḥ // Car_1,26.67
analyzed: viśeṣaḥ karmaṇām ca eva prabhāvaḥ tasya sa smṛtaḥ
prabhāva lakṣaṇam āha rasa vīrya ityādi
sāmānyam iti tulya tā
viśeṣaḥ karmaṇām iti dantī ādi āśrayāṇām virecana tva ādīnām

original: sāmānyaṃ lakṣyata ityanena rasādikāryatvena yannāvadhārayituṃ śakyate kāryaṃ tat
analyzed: sāmānyam lakṣyate iti anena rasa ādi kāryatvena yat na avadhārayitum śakyate kāryam tat

original: prabhāvakṛtam iti sūcayati ata evoktaṃprabhāvo 'cintya ucyate rasavīryavipākakāryatayācintya ityarthaḥ // 3]
analyzed: prabhāva kṛtam iti sūcayati atas eva uktam prabhāvaḥ acintyaḥ ucyate rasa vīrya vipāka kārya tayā acintyaḥ iti arthaḥ
tadvat dantī prabhāvāt tu virecayati mānavam
viṣam viṣa ghnam uktam yat prabhāvaḥ tatra kāraṇam
ūrdhva ānulomikam yat ca tad prabhāva prabhāvitam
maṇīnām dhāraṇīyānām karma yat vividha ātmakam

original: tat prabhāvakṛtaṃ teṣāṃ prabhāvo'cintya ucyate // Car_1,26.70
analyzed: tat prabhāva kṛtam teṣām prabhāvaḥ acintyaḥ ucyate
samyak vipāka vīryāṇi prabhāvaḥ ca api udāhṛtaḥ

original: kiṃcidrasena kurute karma vīryeṇa cāparam // Car_1,26.71
analyzed: kiṃcid rasena kurute karma vīryeṇa ca aparam

original: dravyaṃ guṇena pākena prabhāveṇa ca kiṃcana /
analyzed: dravyam guṇena pākena prabhāveṇa ca kiṃcana
rasam vipākaḥ tau vīryam prabhāvaḥ tān apohati
bala sāmye rasa ādīnām iti naisargikam balam

original: asyaiva durabhigamatvād udāharaṇāni bahūnyāha kaṭuka ityādinā // 1
analyzed: asya eva durabhigama tvāt udāharaṇāni bahūni āha kaṭukaḥ ityādinā
tadvat iti citraka samāna guṇā
viṣa ghnam uktam iti tasmāt daṃṣṭrāviṣam maulam ityādinā

original: ūrdhvānulomikamiti yugapad ubhayabhāgaharaṃ kiṃvā ūrdhvaharaṃ tathānulomaharaṃ ca // 4
analyzed: ūrdhva ānulomikam iti yugapad ubhaya bhāga haram kiṃvā ūrdhva haram tathā anuloma haram ca
karma yat vividha ātmakam iti viṣa haraṇa śūla haraṇa ādi

original: etaccodāharaṇamātraṃ tena jīvanamedhyādidravyasya rasādyacintyaṃ sarvaṃ prabhāva iti jñeyam // 6
analyzed: etat ca udāharaṇa mātram tena jīvana medhya ādi dravyasya rasa ādi acintyam sarvam prabhāvaḥ iti jñeyam

original: prabhāvaśceha dravyaśaktir abhipretā sā ca dravyāṇāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ dantītvādiyuktā
analyzed: prabhāvaḥ ca iha dravya śaktiḥ abhipretā sā ca dravyāṇām sāmānya viśeṣaḥ dantī tva ādi yuktā

original: vyaktireva yataḥ śaktirhi svarūpameva bhāvānāṃ nātiriktaṃ kiṃciddharmāntaram evaṃ
analyzed: vyaktiḥ eva yatas śaktiḥ hi svarūpam eva bhāvānām na atiriktam kiṃcid dharma antaram evam

original: pradeśāntaroktaguṇaprabhāvādiṣvapi vācyam yathoktaṃ dravyāṇi hi dravyaprabhāvādguṇaprabhāvām ityādi // 7
analyzed: pradeśa antara ukta guṇa prabhāva ādiṣu api vācyam yathā uktam dravyāṇi hi dravya prabhāvāt guṇa prabhāvām ityādi

original: na ca vācyaṃ dantyādiḥ svarūpata eva virecayati tena kimiti jalādyupahatā dantī na
analyzed: na ca vācyam dantī ādiḥ svarūpataḥ eva virecayati tena kim iti jala ādi upahatā dantī na

original: naiyāyikaśaktivāde yā ca viṣasya viṣaghnatve upapattir uktā ūrdhvādhogāmitvavirodhalakṣaṇā sāntarbhāgatvāt prabhāvād eva bhavati // 9
analyzed: naiyāyika śakti vāde yā ca viṣasya viṣa ghna tve upapattiḥ uktā ūrdhva adhas gāmi tva virodha lakṣaṇā sā antar bhāga tvāt prabhāvāt eva bhavati
evam ūrdhva ānulomika tva ādau pārthiva tva ādi kathane api vācyam
ṣaṇṇām rasānām vijñānam upadekṣyāmi atas param

original: śarīradhātuvirodhaṃ kurvantīti vairodhikāḥ lakṣyate vairodhikamaneneti lakṣaṇaṃ vairodhikābhidhāyako grantha eva // 2
analyzed: śarīra dhātu virodham kurvanti iti vairodhikāḥ lakṣyate vairodhikam anena iti lakṣaṇam vairodhika abhidhāyakaḥ granthaḥ eva

original: dehadhātupratyanīkabhūtānīti dehadhātūnāṃ rasādīnāṃ vātādīnāṃ ca prakṛtisthānāṃ pratyanīkasvarūpāṇi // 1
analyzed: deha dhātu pratyanīka bhūtāni iti deha dhātūnām rasa ādīnām vāta ādīnām ca prakṛti sthānām pratyanīka svarūpāṇi

original: virodhamāpadyanta iti dehadhātūnāṃ virodhamācaranti dūṣayantīti yāvat // 2

original: matsyapayasos tu yadyapi sahopayogo viruddhatvenoktaḥ tathāpyasau guṇaviruddhatvena kathita iti guṇavirodhakasyaivodāharaṇam /

original: virodhaśca viruddhaguṇatve satyapi kvacid eva dravyaprabhāvād bhavati tena ṣaḍrasāhāropayoge madhurāmlayor viruddhaśītoṣṇavīryayor virodho

analyzed: tatra bhūmi viruddham yathā tat eva bhasma pāṃśu paridhvastam kiṃvā yat kiṃcid agocara bhṛtam tat deśa viruddham śarīra viruddham yathā uṣṇa ārtasya madhu

original: tanniśamyātreyavacanamanu bhadrakāpyo 'gniveśam uvāca sarvāneva matsyān payasā sahābhyavahared

analyzed: prāyas bhūmau carati tam ced payasā saha abhyavaharet niḥsaṃśayam śoṇita jānām vibandha jānām
ca vyādhīnām anyatamam athavā maraṇam prāpnuyāt iti

original: grāmyānūpaudakapiśitāni ca madhutilaguḍapayomāṣamūlakabisair virūḍhadhānyairvā naikadhyamadyāt tanmūlaṃ hi bādhiryāndhyavepathujāḍyakalamūkatāmaiṇmiṇyam  #
analyzed: grāmya ānūpa audaka piśitāni ca madhu tila guḍa payaḥ māṣa mūlaka bisaiḥ virūḍha dhānyaiḥ vā na aikadhyam adyāt tad mūlam hi bādhirya āndhya vepathu jāḍya kala mūka tā maiṇmiṇyam
athavā maraṇam āpnoti

original: na pauṣkaraṃ rohiṇīkaṃ śākaṃ kapotān vā sarṣapatailabhraṣṭān madhupayobhyāṃ sahābhyavaharet

original: tadeva nikucaṃ pakvaṃ na māṣasūpaguḍasarpirbhiḥ sahopayojyaṃ vairodhikatvāt /

original: cānyāni dravyāṇi sarvaṃ cāmlaṃ dravamadravaṃ ca payasā saha viruddham /

original: padmottarikāśākaṃ śārkaro maireyo madhu ca sahopayuktaṃ viruddhaṃ vātaṃ cātikopayati /

pāyasaḥ mantha anupānaḥ viruddhaḥ śleṣmāṇam ca atikopayati

original: mayūramāṃsam eraṇḍasīsakāvasaktam eraṇḍāgnipluṣṭam eraṇḍatailayuktaṃ sadyo vyāpādayati /

original: matsyanistālanasiddhāḥ pippalyastathā kākamācī madhu ca maraṇāya /
analyzed: matsya nistālana siddhāḥ pippalyaḥ tathā kākamācī madhu ca maraṇāya

analyzed: madhu ca uṣṇam uṣṇa ārtasya ca madhu maraṇāya

analyzed: madhu sarpiṣī samadhṛte ca antarikṣam samadhṛtam madhu puṣkara bījam madhu pītvā uṣṇa udakam

original: bhallātakoṣṇodakaṃ takrasiddhaḥ kampillakaḥ paryuṣitā kākamācī aṅgāraśūlyo bhāsaśceti viruddhāni /
analyzed: bhallātaka uṣṇa udakam takra siddhaḥ kampillakaḥ paryuṣitā kākamācī aṅgāraśūlyaḥ bhāsaḥ ca iti viruddhāni
iti etat yathāpraśnam abhinirdiṣṭam bhavati iti
grāmya piśita ādīni madhu ādīnām anyatareṇa api viruddhāni
kala mūka tā iti kala mūka tā avyakta vacanatā

original: pauṣkarādīnāṃ madhupayobhyāṃ sahābhyavahāro viruddhaḥ pauṣkaraṃ puṣkaratratrarūpaṃ śākaṃ rohiṇī kaṭurohiṇī // 3
analyzed: pauṣkara ādīnām madhu payobhyām saha abhyavahāraḥ viruddhaḥ pauṣkaram śākam rohiṇī kaṭurohiṇī

vairodhika tvāt iti anena prakaraṇa labdhasya api vairodhika tvasya punar abhidhānam sāmānya ukta ṣāṇḍhya ādi vyādhi kartṛ tā upadarśana artham
evam anyatra api sāmānye api vairodhika tva mātra abhidhāne vaktavyam

original: tathāmletyādau amlagrahaṇena labdhānāpy amlāmrātakādīnām abhidhānaṃ viśeṣavirodhasūcanārtham // 6
analyzed: tathā amla ityādau amla grahaṇena amla āmrātaka ādīnām abhidhānam viśeṣa virodha sūcana artham

original: bhavati hi prakaraṇād ekadeśe 'pi sarvavyapadeśaḥ yathā sarvān bhojayediti kiṃvā
analyzed: bhavati hi prakaraṇāt eka deśe api sarva vyapadeśaḥ yathā sarvān bhojayet iti kiṃvā

original: payaseti tṛtīyayeva sahārthe labdhe punaḥ sahetyabhidhānaṃ kevalāmlādiyuktasyaiva
analyzed: payasā iti tṛtīyayā iva saha arthe labdhe punar saha iti abhidhānam kevala amla ādi yuktasya eva

original: virodhitopadarśanārthaṃ tena amlapayaḥsaṃyoge guḍādisaṃyoge sati viruddhatvaṃ na dugdhāmrādīnām // 8
analyzed: virodhita upadarśana artham tena amla payaḥ saṃyoge guḍa ādi saṃyoge sati viruddha tvam na dugdha āmra ādīnām

original: vātaṃ cātikopayatīti vacanena pittakaphāv alpaṃ kopayatīti bodhayati evaṃ pittaṃ cātikopayati kaphaṃ cātikopayatītyetayorapi vācyam // 12
analyzed: vātam ca atikopayati iti vacanena pitta kaphau alpam kopayati iti bodhayati evam pittam ca atikopayati kapham ca atikopayati iti etayoḥ api vācyam

original: balākā vāruṇyā saha viruddhā tathā kulmāṣaiśca balākā viruddhā // 14
analyzed: balākā vāruṇyā saha viruddhā tathā kulmāṣaiḥ ca balākā viruddhā

original: eraṇḍasīsakāvasaktamiti eraṇḍakāṣṭhāvasaktaṃ sīsako hi bhaṭitrakaraṇakāṣṭham ucyate // 15
analyzed: eraṇḍa sīsaka avasaktam iti eraṇḍa kāṣṭha avasaktam sīsakaḥ hi bhaṭitra karaṇa kāṣṭham ucyate
tat eva iti hāridraka māṃsam

original: matsyā nistālyante pacyante yasmin tanmatsyanistālanaṃ kiṃvā nistālanaṃ vasā jatūkarṇe'pyuktaṃ matsyavasā siddhāḥ pippalyaḥ iti // 17
analyzed: matsyāḥ nistālyante pacyante yasmin tat matsya nistālanam kiṃvā nistālanam vasā jatūkarṇe api uktam matsya vasā siddhāḥ pippalyaḥ iti
kākamācī madhu ca iti saṃyoga viruddham

original: yat kiṃcid doṣamāsrāvya na nirharati kāyataḥ /
analyzed: yat kiṃcid doṣam āsrāvya na nirharati kāyataḥ
āhāra jātam tat sarvam ahitāya upapadyate
anukta vairodhika saṃgraha artham āha yat kiṃcid ityādi
āhriyate iti āhāraḥ bheṣajam api
doṣam āsrāvya iti doṣān utkliṣṭa rūpān janayitvā na nirharati iti

original: anena vamanavirecanadravyāṇi nirākaroti tāni hi doṣānāsrāvya nirharanti // 4]
analyzed: anena vamana virecana dravyāṇi nirākaroti tāni hi doṣān āsrāvya nirharanti

original: viruddhaṃ tacca na hitaṃ hṛtsampadvidhibhiśca yat // Car_1,26.87
analyzed: viruddham tat ca na hitam hṛd sampad vidhibhiḥ ca yat
viruddham deśataḥ tāvat rūkṣa tīkṣṇa ādi dhanvani
ānūpe snigdha śīta ādi bheṣajam yat niṣevyate

original: śīte kāle tathoṣṇe ca kaṭukoṣṇādisevanam // Car_1,26.89
analyzed: śīte kāle tathā uṣṇe ca kaṭuka uṣṇa ādi sevanam
viruddham anale tadvat anna pānam caturvidhe
madhu sarpiḥ samadhṛtam mātrayā tat virudhyate
kaṭuka uṣṇa ādi sātmyasya svādu śīta ādi sevanam

original: yattatsātmyaviruddhaṃ tu viruddhaṃ tv anilādibhiḥ // Car_1,26.91
analyzed: yat tat sātmya viruddham tu viruddham tu anila ādibhiḥ
yā samāna guṇa abhyāsa viruddhā anna auṣadha kriyā
saṃskārataḥ viruddham tat yat bhojyam viṣa vat bhavet
eraṇḍa sīsaka āsaktam śikhi māṃsam yathā eva hi

original: viruddhaṃ vīryato jñeyaṃ vīryataḥ śītalātmakam // Car_1,26.93
analyzed: viruddham vīryataḥ jñeyam vīryataḥ śītala ātmakam
tat saṃyojya uṣṇa vīryeṇa dravyeṇa saha sevyate
krūra koṣṭhasya ca ati alpam manda vīryam abhedanam

original: mṛdukoṣṭhasya guru ca bhedanīyaṃ tathā bahu /
analyzed: mṛdu koṣṭhasya guru ca bhedanīyam tathā bahu
etat koṣṭha viruddham tu viruddham syāt avasthayā
śrama vyavāya vyāyāma saktasya anila kopanam
nidrā alasasya alasasya bhojanam śleṣma kopanam
yat ca an utsṛjya viṣ mūtram bhuṅkte yaḥ ca abubhukṣitaḥ
tat ca krama viruddham syāt yat ca atikṣudh vaśa anugaḥ
parihāra viruddham tu varāha ādīn niṣevya yat

original: sevetoṣṇaṃ ghṛtādīṃśca pītvā śītaṃ niṣevate // Car_1,26.98
analyzed: seveta uṣṇam ghṛta ādīn ca pītvā śītam niṣevate
viruddham pākataḥ ca api duṣṭa durdāru sādhitam
apakva taṇḍula atyartha pakva dagdham ca yat bhavet

original: saṃyogato viruddhaṃ tadyathāmlaṃ payasā saha // Car_1,26.99
analyzed: saṃyogataḥ viruddham tat yathā amlam payasā saha
amanorucitam yat ca hṛd viruddham tat ucyate

original: sampadviruddhaṃ tadvidyād asaṃjātarasaṃ tu yat // Car_1,26.100
analyzed: sampad viruddham tat vidyāt asaṃjāta rasam tu yat
atikrānta rasam vā api vipanna rasam eva vā

original: jñeyaṃ vidhiviruddhaṃ tu bhujyate nibhṛte na yat /
analyzed: jñeyam vidhi viruddham tu bhujyate nibhṛte na yat
tat evaṃvidham annam syāt viruddham upayojitam

original: yaccāpi deśakālāgnītyādigranthaṃ kecit paṭhanti sa ca vyakta eva // 1]
analyzed: yat ca api deśa kālāgni ityādi grantham kecid paṭhanti sa ca vyaktaḥ eva
ṣāṇḍhya āndhya vīsarpa dakodarāṇām visphoṭaka unmāda bhagaṃdarāṇām
mūrchā mada ādhmāna galagrahāṇām pāṇḍu āmayasya āma viṣasya ca eva
kilāsa kuṣṭha grahaṇī gadānām śotha amlapitta jvara pīnasānām

original: saṃtānadoṣasya tathaiva mṛtyor viruddhamannaṃ pravadanti hetum // Car_1,26.103
analyzed: saṃtāna doṣasya tathā eva mṛtyoḥ viruddham annam pravadanti hetum
ṣāṇḍhyam napuṃsaka tā
saṃtāna doṣaḥ mṛta vatsa tva ādiḥ

original: etacca vairodhikakathanaṃ viśeṣavacanena bādhyate tena laśunasya kṣīreṇa pānaṃ kvacin na virodhi yaduktaṃ sādhayecchuddhaśuṣkasya laśunasya  #
analyzed: etat ca vairodhika kathanam viśeṣa vacanena bādhyate tena laśunasya kṣīreṇa pānam kvacid na virodhi yat uktam sādhayet śuddha śuṣkasya laśunasya
catuṣpalam

original: kṣīrodake'ṣṭaguṇite kṣīraśeṣaṃ ca pāyayet tathā mūlakasvarasaṃ kṣīram ityādiprayogeṣūnneyam // 4
analyzed: kṣīra udake aṣṭa guṇite kṣīra śeṣam ca pāyayet tathā mūlaka svarasam kṣīram ityādi prayogeṣu unneyam

original: kiṃvā anekadravyasaṃyogād atra virodhinām avirodhaḥ virodhimātrasaṃyoga eva virodhī bhavati // 5
analyzed: kiṃvā aneka dravya saṃyogāt atra virodhinām avirodhaḥ virodhi mātra saṃyogaḥ eva virodhī bhavati

original: yattu madhuna uṣṇena vamanena saṃyuktasya satyapi madanaphalādidravyasaṃyoge 'virodhārthamuktam
analyzed: yat tu madhunaḥ uṣṇena vamanena saṃyuktasya sati api madana phala ādi dravya saṃyoge avirodha artham uktam
apakva gamana ādi tat madhunaḥ dravya antara saṃyoge api uṣṇa sambandha tve virodhi tva upadarśana artham
yatas viṣa anvayam madhu viṣasya ca uṣṇa virodhi

original: laśunādīnāṃ tu dravyāntarāsaṃyoge satyeva melako viruddha iti śāstravacanādunnīyate // 7]
analyzed: laśuna ādīnām tu dravya antara asaṃyoge sati eva melakaḥ viruddhaḥ iti śāstra vacanāt unnīyate

original: eṣāṃ khalvapareṣāṃ ca vairodhikanimittānāṃ vyādhīnāmime bhāvāḥ pratikārā bhavanti /
analyzed: eṣām khalu apareṣām ca vairodhika nimittānām vyādhīnām ime bhāvāḥ pratikārāḥ bhavanti

original: tadyathā vamanaṃ virecanaṃ ca tadvirodhināṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ saṃśamanārtham upayogaḥ tathāvidhaiśca dravyaiḥ pūrvam abhisaṃskāraḥ śarīrasyeti //
analyzed: tat yathā vamanam virecanam ca tad virodhinām ca dravyāṇām saṃśamana artham upayogaḥ tathāvidhaiḥ ca dravyaiḥ pūrvam abhisaṃskāraḥ śarīrasya iti
viruddha aśana jān rogān pratihanti vivecanam

original: vamanaṃ śamanaṃ caiva pūrvaṃ vā hitasevanam // Car_1,26.105
analyzed: vamanam śamanam ca eva pūrvam vā hita sevanam
sātmyataḥ alpatayā vā api dīpta agneḥ taruṇasya ca
snigdha vyāyāma balinām viruddham vitatham bhavet
tad virodhinām iti ṣāṇḍhya ādi harāṇām
tathāvidhaiḥ iti viruddha āhāra ja vyādhi viruddhaiḥ
abhisaṃskāraḥ iti satata upayogena śarīra bhāvanam
kiṃvā tathāvidhaiḥ iti rasāyana prayogaiḥ
etat ca anāgatābādhacikitsitam jñeyam
matiḥ āsīt mahā ṛṣīṇām yā yā rasa viniścaye
dravyāṇi guṇa karmabhyām dravya saṃkhyā rasa āśrayā
kāraṇam rasa saṃkhyāyāḥ rasa anurasa lakṣaṇam

original: parādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ ca lakṣaṇāni pṛthakpṛthak // Car_1,26.108
analyzed: para ādīnām guṇānām ca lakṣaṇāni pṛthak pṛthak

original: pañcātmakānāṃ ṣaṭtvaṃ ca rasānāṃ yena hetunā /
analyzed: pañca ātmakānām ṣaṭtvam ca rasānām yena hetunā
ūrdhva anuloma bhājaḥ ca yad guṇa atiśayāt rasāḥ

original: ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ ṣaṭtve ca savibhaktā vibhaktayaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṇṇām rasānām ṣaṭtve ca savibhaktāḥ vibhaktayaḥ
uddeśaḥ ca apavādaḥ ca dravyāṇām guṇa karmaṇi
pravara avara madhya tvam rasānām gaurava ādiṣu
pāka prabhāvayoḥ liṅgam vīrya saṃkhyā viniścayaḥ
ṣaṇṇām āsvādyamānānām rasānām yat sva lakṣaṇam

original: yadyadvirudhyate yasmādyena yatkāri caiva yat // Car_1,26.112
analyzed: yat yat virudhyate yasmāt yena yat kāri ca eva yat
vairodhika nimittānām vyādhīnām auṣadham ca yat
ātreyabhadrakāpyīye tat sarvam avadat muniḥ

original: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte ślokasthāne ātreyabhadrakāpyīyo nāma ṣaḍviṃśo'dhyāyaḥ // Car_1,26.114
analyzed: iti agniveśa kṛte tantre caraka pratisaṃskṛte śloka sthāne ātreyabhadrakāpyīyaḥ nāma ṣaḍviṃśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: saṃgrahe dravyasaṃkhyā rasāśrayā iti bhedaścaiṣām ityādinā rasasaṃkhyā hi paramārthato dravyasaṃkhyaiva nirguṇatvād rasānām iti bhāvaḥ // 1
analyzed: saṃgrahe dravya saṃkhyā rasa āśrayā iti bhedaḥ ca eṣām ityādinā rasa saṃkhyā hi paramārthataḥ dravya saṃkhyā eva nirguṇa tvāt rasānām iti bhāvaḥ

original: kāraṇaṃ rasasaṃkhyāyā iti rasānāṃ tatra yogyatvād ityādinā vibhaktayo bhedaḥ tatra madhura ityādinā // 2
analyzed: kāraṇam rasa saṃkhyāyāḥ iti rasānām tatra yogya tvāt ityādinā vibhaktayaḥ bhedaḥ tatra madhuraḥ ityādinā

original: uddeśo dravyāṇāṃ śītaṃ vīryeṇa ityādinā apavādo dravyāṇāṃ madhuraṃ kiṃcit ityādinā // 3] ************************************************************
analyzed: uddeśaḥ dravyāṇām śītam vīryeṇa ityādinā apavādaḥ dravyāṇām madhuram kiṃcid ityādinā
carakasaṃhitā
sūtrasthāna
atha atas annapānavidhim adhyāyam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
iti ha sma āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ

original: samprati sāmānyenoktānāṃ guṇakarmabhyāṃ prativyaktyanuktānāṃ prativyaktiprāya upayogidravyasya viśiṣṭaguṇakarmakathanārtham annapānavidhir
analyzed: samprati sāmānyena uktānām guṇa karmabhyām prati vyakti anuktānām prati vyakti prāyas upayogi dravyasya viśiṣṭa guṇa karma kathana artham anna pāna vidhiḥ
atra utpannasya chapratyayasya luk

original: atrānne kāṭhinyasāmānyāt khādyaṃ pāne ca dravatvasāmānyāllehyam avaruddhaṃ jñeyam // 3
analyzed: atra anne kāṭhinya sāmānyāt khādyam pāne ca drava tva sāmānyāt lehyam avaruddham jñeyam

original: annapānaṃ vidhīyate viśiṣṭaguṇakarmayogitayā pratipādyate 'nenetyannapānavidhiḥ dravyāṇāṃ guṇakarmakathanam eva cānnapānavidhiḥ yatastaddhi  #
analyzed: anna pānam vidhīyate viśiṣṭa guṇa karma yogitayā pratipādyate anena iti anna pāna vidhiḥ dravyāṇām guṇa karma kathanam eva ca anna pāna vidhiḥ yatas tat hi
jñātvā anna pānam vidhīyate
iṣṭa varṇa gandha rasa sparśam vidhi vihitam anna pānam prāṇinām prāṇi saṃjñakānām prāṇam ācakṣate

original: kuśalāḥ pratyakṣaphaladarśanāt tadindhanā hy antaragneḥ sthitiḥ tat sattvam ūrjayati
analyzed: kuśalāḥ pratyakṣa phala darśanāt tad indhanā hi antaragneḥ sthitiḥ tat sattvam ūrjayati
tat śarīra dhātu vyūha bala varṇa indriya prasāda karam yathoktam upasevyamānam viparītam ahitāya
sampadyate
kim tat anna pānam karoti iti āha iṣṭa ityādi

original: iṣṭamiti abhimataṃ hitaṃ ca kiṃvā iṣṭaṃ priyaṃ hitaṃ tu vidhivihitaśabdenaiva prāpyate // 2
analyzed: iṣṭam iti abhimatam hitam ca kiṃvā iṣṭam priyam hitam tu vidhi vihita śabdena eva prāpyate

original: vidhir vakṣyamāṇarasavimāne tadetadāhāravidhānam ityādigranthavācyaḥ tathendriyopakramaṇīye nāratnapāṇiḥ ityādinoktaṃ vidhānaṃ tena vidhinā  #
analyzed: vidhiḥ vakṣyamāṇa rasa vimāne tat etat āhāra vidhānam ityādi grantha vācyaḥ tathā indriya upakramaṇīye ityādinā uktam vidhānam tena vidhinā
vihitam vidhi vihitam
atra varṇa ādiṣu śabda agrahaṇam anna pāne prāyas śabdasya a vidyamāna tvāt

original: varṇādiṣu yadyat prathamam annapāne gṛhyate tattat pūrvam uktam // 5
analyzed: varṇa ādiṣu yat yat prathamam anna pāne gṛhyate tat tat pūrvam uktam

original: rasastu sparśasya paścādgṛhyamāṇo'pi prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ sparśasyāgre kṛtaḥ // 6
analyzed: rasaḥ tu sparśasya paścāt gṛhyamāṇaḥ api prādhānya khyāpana artham sparśasya agre kṛtaḥ

original: prāṇinām ityanenaiva labdhe'pi prāṇisaṃjñakānām iti vacanaṃ sthāvaraprāṇipratiṣedhārthaṃ
analyzed: prāṇinām iti anena eva labdhe api prāṇi saṃjñakānām iti vacanam sthāvara prāṇi pratiṣedha artham

original: vṛkṣādayo hi vanaspatisattvānukāropadeśācchastre prāṇina uktāḥ na tu loke prāṇisaṃjñakāḥ
analyzed: vṛkṣa ādayaḥ hi vanaspati sattva anukāra upadeśāt śastre prāṇinaḥ uktāḥ na tu loke prāṇi saṃjñakāḥ
kiṃtarhi jaṅgamāḥ eva

original: iha ca manuṣyasyaivādhikṛtatve'pi sāmānyena sakalaprāṇiprāṇahetutayāhārakathanaṃ manuṣavyatirikte'pi prāṇinyāhārasya prāṇajanakatvopadarśanārtham
analyzed: iha ca manuṣyasya eva adhikṛta tve api sāmānyena sakala prāṇi prāṇa hetutayā āhāra kathanam manuṣa vyatirikte api prāṇini āhārasya prāṇa janaka tva upadarśana artham
prāṇam iti prāṇa hetu tvāt yathāyus ghṛtam

original: atha kathaṃ tat prāṇamācakṣata ityāha pratyakṣaphaladarśanāditi // 10
analyzed: atha katham tat prāṇam ācakṣate iti āha pratyakṣa phala darśanāt iti

original: pratyakṣeṇaiva hy āhāraṃ vidhinā kurvatāṃ prāṇā anuvartanta iti tathā nirāhārāṇāṃ prāṇā nahy avatiṣṭhanta iti dṛśyata ityarthaḥ // 11
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa eva hi āhāram vidhinā kurvatām prāṇāḥ anuvartante iti tathā nirāhārāṇām prāṇāḥ nahi avatiṣṭhante iti dṛśyate iti arthaḥ

original: pratyakṣaśabdaś ceha sphuṭapramāṇe vartate yataḥ prāṇānām annakāryatvam anumānagamyameva // 12
analyzed: pratyakṣa śabdaḥ ca iha sphuṭa pramāṇe vartate yatas prāṇānām anna kāryatvam anumāna gamyam eva

original: ānnakāryatva eva prāṇānāṃ hetumāha tadindhanā hītyādinā // 13
analyzed: ānna kārya tve eva prāṇānām hetum āha tad indhanā hi ityādinā

original: yasmād antaragnisthitiś cānnapānahetunā agnisthitiśca prāṇahetuḥ tato'nnaṃ prāṇā iti bhāvaḥ uktaṃ hi balam ārogyamāyuśca prāṇāścāgnau pratiṣṭhitāḥ
analyzed: yasmāt antaragni sthitiḥ ca anna pāna hetunā agni sthitiḥ ca prāṇa hetuḥ tatas annam prāṇāḥ iti bhāvaḥ uktam hi balam ārogyam āyuḥ ca prāṇāḥ ca agnau pratiṣṭhitāḥ

original: kiṃvā pūrvamannapānasya prāṇahetutvamuktaṃ tadindhanā hītyādināgnihetutvaṃ varṇyate // 15
analyzed: kiṃvā pūrvam anna pānasya prāṇa hetu tvam uktam tad indhanā hi ityādinā agni hetu tvam varṇyate
sattvam ūrjayati iti manaḥ balam karoti
dhātu vyūhaḥ dhātu saṃghātaḥ
viparītam avidhi sevitam
tasmāt hita ahita avabodhana artham anna pāna vidhim akhile nā upadekṣyāmaḥ agniveśa

original: tat svabhāvād udaktaṃ kledayati lavaṇaṃ viṣyandayati kṣāraḥ pācayati madhu saṃdadhāti
analyzed: tat svabhāvāt udaktam kledayati lavaṇam viṣyandayati kṣāraḥ pācayati madhu saṃdadhāti

original: sarpiḥ snehayati kṣīraṃ jīvayati māṃsaṃ bṛṃhayati rasaḥ prīṇayati surā jarjarīkaroti
analyzed: sarpiḥ snehayati kṣīram jīvayati māṃsam bṛṃhayati rasaḥ prīṇayati surā jarjarīkaroti

original: sīdhur avadhamati drākṣāsavo dīpayati phāṇitamācinoti dadhi śophaṃ janayati piṇyākaśākaṃ
analyzed: sīdhuḥ avadhamati drākṣā āsavaḥ dīpayati phāṇitam ācinoti dadhi śopham janayati piṇyāka śākam

original: glapayati prabhūtāntarmalo māṣasūpaḥ dṛṣṭiśukraghnaḥ kṣāraḥ prāyaḥ pittalam amlam
analyzed: glapayati prabhūta antarmalaḥ māṣa sūpaḥ dṛṣṭi śukra ghnaḥ kṣāraḥ prāyas pittalam amlam

original: anyatra dāḍimāmalakāt prāyaḥ śleṣmalaṃ madhuram anyatra madhunaḥ purāṇācca śāliṣaṣṭikayavagodhūmāt
analyzed: anyatra dāḍima āmalakāt prāyas śleṣmalam madhuram anyatra madhunaḥ purāṇāt ca śāli ṣaṣṭika yava godhūmāt

original: prāyastikaṃ vātalamavṛṣyaṃ cānyatra vegāgrāmṛtāpaṭolapattrāt prāyaḥ kaṭukaṃ vātalam
analyzed: prāyastikam vātalam avṛṣyam ca anyatra vegāgra amṛtā paṭola pattrāt prāyas kaṭukam vātalam
avṛṣyam ca anyatra pippalī viśvabheṣajāt

original: annapānaṃ vidhīyate yena taṃ vidhiṃ dravyaguṇakarmarūpaṃ tathā caraśarīrāvayavādirūpaṃ cākhilena kārtsnyenopadekṣyāmaḥ // 1
analyzed: anna pānam vidhīyate yena tam vidhim dravya guṇa karma rūpam tathā cara śarīra avayava ādi rūpam ca akhilena kārtsnyena upadekṣyāmaḥ

original: yadyapi ceha dravyaṃ prati prati guṇakarmabhyāṃ na nirdekṣyati vakṣyati hi annapānaikadeśo'yamuktaḥ
analyzed: yadi api ca iha dravyam prati prati guṇa karmabhyām na nirdekṣyati vakṣyati hi anna pāna eka deśaḥ ayam uktaḥ

original: prāyopayogikaḥ iti tathāpyanuktānām api dravyāṇāṃ caraśarīrāvayavādyupadeśena tathā
analyzed: prāyopayogikaḥ iti tathā api anuktānām api dravyāṇām cara śarīra avayava ādi upadeśena tathā
pūrva adhyāya ukta pārthiva ādi dravya guṇa karma kathanena ca tad vidhānam api uktam bhavati iti atas

original: uktamakhileneti vakṣyati hi yathā nānauṣadhaṃ kiṃcid deśajānāṃ vaco yathā // 2
analyzed: uktam akhilena iti vakṣyati hi yathā na anauṣadham kiṃcid deśajānām vacaḥ yathā

original: dravyaṃ tu tattathā vācyamanuktamiha yad bhavet tathā caraḥ śarīrāvayavāḥ ityādi
analyzed: dravyam tu tat tathā vācyam anuktam iha yat bhavet tathā caraḥ śarīra avayavāḥ ityādi

original: kiṃvā vidhiśabdo 'śitapītalīḍhakhāditaprakāravācī tena cāśitādayaḥ sarva evākhilena
analyzed: kiṃvā vidhi śabdaḥ aśita pīta līḍha khādita prakāra vācī tena ca aśita ādayaḥ sarve eva akhilena

original: vācyaḥ tatkāraṇabhūtāni tu dravyāṇi raktaśālyādīnyekadeśenoktāni ato vakṣyati annapānaikadeśo'yamuktaḥ iti // 3
analyzed: vācyaḥ tad kāraṇa bhūtāni tu dravyāṇi raktaśāli ādīni ekadeśena uktāni atas vakṣyati anna pāna ekadeśaḥ ayam uktaḥ iti

original: annapāne ca vaktavye yaddravyaṃ prāya upayujyate tasya sāmānyaguṇamabhidhāya vargasaṃgraheṇa guṇamupadekṣyati // 4
analyzed: anna pāne ca vaktavye yat dravyam prāyas upayujyate tasya sāmānya guṇam abhidhāya varga saṃgraheṇa guṇam upadekṣyati
