original: na hi sarvāṇyapathyāni tulyadoṣāṇi na ca sarve doṣāstulyabalā na ca sarvāṇi śarīrāṇi vyādhikṣamatve samarthāni bhavanti /
analyzed: na hi sarvāṇi apathyāni tulya doṣāṇi na ca sarve doṣāḥ tulya balāḥ na ca sarvāṇi śarīrāṇi vyādhi kṣama tve samarthāni bhavanti

original: tadeva hy apathyaṃ deśakālasaṃyogavīryapramāṇātiyogād bhūyastaram apathyaṃ sampadyate /
analyzed: tat eva hi apathyam deśa kāla saṃyoga vīrya pramāṇa atiyogāt bhūyastaram apathyam sampadyate

original: sa eva doṣa saṃsṛṣṭayonirviruddhopakramo gambhīrānugataś cirasthitaḥ prāṇāyatanasamuttho marmopaghātī kaṣṭatamaḥ kṣiprakāritamaśca sampadyate
analyzed: saḥ eva doṣa saṃsṛṣṭa yoniḥ viruddha upakramaḥ gambhīra anugataḥ cira sthitaḥ prāṇa āyatana samutthaḥ marma upaghātī kaṣṭatamaḥ kṣiprakāritamaḥ ca sampadyate

original: śarīrāṇi cātisthūlānyatikṛśāny aniviṣṭamāṃsaśoṇitāsthīni durbalāny asātmyāhāropacitāny alpāhārāṇy alpasattvāni ca bhavantyavyādhisahāni viparītāni  #
analyzed: śarīrāṇi ca ati sthūlāni ati kṛśāni a niviṣṭa māṃsa śoṇita asthīni durbalāni asātmya āhāra upacitāni alpa āhārāṇi alpa sattvāni ca bhavanti avyādhi sahāni viparītāni
punar vyādhi sahāni

original: ebhyaś caivāpathyāhāradoṣaśarīraviśeṣebhyo vyādhayo mṛdavo dāruṇāḥ kṣiprasamutthāścirakāriṇaśca bhavanti /
analyzed: ebhyaḥ ca eva apathya āhāra doṣa śarīra viśeṣebhyaḥ vyādhayaḥ mṛdavaḥ dāruṇāḥ kṣipra samutthāḥ cirakāriṇaḥ ca bhavanti

original: eva vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ sthānaviśeṣe prakupitā vyādhiviśeṣān abhinivartayantyagniveśa // Car_1,28.7
analyzed: eva vāta pitta śleṣmāṇaḥ sthāna viśeṣe prakupitāḥ vyādhi viśeṣān abhinivartayanti agniveśa
tad nimittāḥ iti hita āhāra nimittāḥ
na kevalam iti param
roga prakṛtayaḥ iti roga kāraṇāni
ahita āhāra upayoginaḥ ityādi

original: kāraṇata iti nimittāntarāt pratibandhāt tacca kāraṇaṃ tadeva hy apathyam ityādivakṣyamāṇagranthaviparītaṃ boddhavyam // 5
analyzed: kāraṇataḥ iti nimitta antarāt pratibandhāt tat ca kāraṇam tat eva hi apathyam ityādi vakṣyamāṇa grantha viparītam boddhavyam
sadyas iti tad kālam

original: anenāpathyasya rogajananaṃ prati kālāntaravikārakartṛtvaṃ prāyo bhavatīti darśayati anyathā sadya ityanarthakaṃ syāt kālāntare 'pi doṣākartṛtvāt
analyzed: anena apathyasya roga jananam prati kāla antara vikāra kartṛ tvam prāyas bhavati iti darśayati anyathā sadyas iti anarthakam syāt kāla antare api doṣa akartṛ tvāt
doṣavān iti vyādhi janakaḥ

original: apacāra iti ahitāhāropayogaḥ ukte kāraṇamāha nahītyādi /
analyzed: apacāraḥ iti ahita āhāra upayogaḥ ukte kāraṇam āha nahi ityādi
tulya doṣāṇi iti tulya doṣa karāṇi
tat eva apathya tulya doṣa tā ādi vivṛṇoti tat eva ityādi

original: atra yadyapi prastutatvād apathyapratibandhakāni kāraṇāni vaktavyāni tathāpi samānanyāyatayāpathyaśaktivardhakānyucyante // 12
analyzed: atra yadi api prastuta tvāt apathya pratibandhakāni kāraṇāni vaktavyāni tathā api samāna nyāyatayā apathya śakti vardhakāni ucyante

original: tatra deśādīnāṃ yogāditi anuguṇadeśādiyogāt yathā vrīhiḥ pittakartṛtvenāpathyaḥ sa
analyzed: tatra deśa ādīnām yogāt iti anuguṇa deśa ādi yogāt yathā vrīhiḥ pitta kartṛ tvena apathyaḥ sa

original: cānūpadeśayogādbhūyastaram apathyo bhavati dhanvadeśe tu hīnabalo bhavati tathā śaratkālasyānuguṇasya
analyzed: ca anūpa deśa yogāt bhūyastaram apathyaḥ bhavati dhanva deśe tu hīna balaḥ bhavati tathā śarad kālasya anuguṇasya

original: yogādbalavānbhavati hemante durbalaḥ saṃyogād yathā sa vrīhir dadhiphāṇitādiyukto
analyzed: yogāt balavān bhavati hemante durbalaḥ saṃyogāt yathā sa vrīhiḥ dadhi phāṇita ādi yuktaḥ

original: balavān madhvādiyuktaśca durbalaḥ vīryād yathā sa evoṣṇīkṛto balavān śītastu durbalaḥ
analyzed: balavān madhu ādi yuktaḥ ca durbalaḥ vīryāt yathā saḥ eva uṣṇīkṛtaḥ balavān śītaḥ tu durbalaḥ

original: sa eva ca pramāṇātiyogād balī hīnamātrastvabalaḥ ityādyanusartavyam // 13
analyzed: saḥ eva ca pramāṇa atiyogāt balī hīna mātraḥ tu abalaḥ ityādi anusartavyam
doṣa tulya balatām āha saḥ eva doṣaḥ ityādi

original: saṃsṛṣṭā militā bahavo yonayaḥ kāraṇāni yasya sa tathā kiṃvā saṃsṛṣṭayonir iti anuguṇadūṣyaḥ yathā pittasya raktaṃ dūṣyam āsādya kaṣṭatvaṃ  #
analyzed: saṃsṛṣṭāḥ militāḥ bahavaḥ yonayaḥ kāraṇāni yasya sa tathā kiṃvā saṃsṛṣṭa yoniḥ iti anuguṇa dūṣyaḥ yathā pittasya raktam dūṣyam āsādya kaṣṭa tvam
kṣiprakāri tvam ca bhavati

original: viruddhopakramo yathā pittaṃ mehārambhakaṃ vacanaṃ hi pittamehāḥ sarva eva yāpyāḥ
analyzed: viruddha upakramaḥ yathā pittam meha ārambhakam vacanam hi pitta mehāḥ sarve eva yāpyāḥ

original: viruddhopakramatvāt iti viruddhatā copakramasyātra yat pittaharaṃ madhurādi tanmehapradhānadūṣyamedaso
analyzed: viruddha upakrama tvāt iti viruddha tā ca upakramasya atra yat pitta haram madhura ādi tat meha pradhāna dūṣya medasaḥ

original: viruddhaṃ medo'nuguṇaṃ tu kaṭvādi pitte viruddham iti // 16
analyzed: viruddham medaḥ anuguṇam tu kaṭu ādi pitte viruddham iti

original: gambhīrānugata iti gambhīramajjādidhātugataḥ vacanaṃ hi tvaṅmāṃsāśrayamuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ tv antarāśrayam iti // 17
analyzed: gambhīra anugataḥ iti gambhīra majja ādi dhātu gataḥ vacanam hi tvak māṃsa āśrayam uttānam gambhīram tu antara āśrayam iti

original: cirasthita iti dehe cirakālāvasthānena kṛtamūlatvāt kaṣṭasādhyaḥ // 18
analyzed: cira sthitaḥ iti dehe cira kāla avasthānena kṛta mūla tvāt kaṣṭa sādhyaḥ
prāṇa āyatana samutthaḥ iti agre adhyāye vakṣyamāṇa śaṅkha ādi daśa prāṇāyatana āśrayī
marma upaghātī iti prāṇāyatana vyatirikta kṣipra talahṛdaya ādi marma upaghāta kārī

original: marmaghātitvenaiva marmaviśeṣaprāṇāyatanasamutthatve labdhe punastadvacanaṃ prāṇāyatanamarmāśrayiṇo viśeṣeṇa kaṣṭatvapratipādanārtham // 21
analyzed: marma ghāti tvena eva marma viśeṣa prāṇāyatana samuttha tve labdhe punar tat vacanam prāṇāyatana marma āśrayiṇaḥ viśeṣeṇa kaṣṭa tva pratipādana artham
kaṣṭatamaḥ iti bahu duḥkha kartṛ tvena asādhya tvena ca
kṣiprakāritamaḥ iti āśu vikāra kāritamaḥ
cakārāt saṃsṛṣṭa yoni tva ādi hetūnām alpatvena kaṣṭa kaṣṭatara kṣiprakāri kṣiprakāritara ādi viśeṣāḥ

original: ca bhavantīti darśayati yathoktasarvahetumelake kaṣṭatamaḥ kṣiprakāritamaś ca bhavatīti
analyzed: ca bhavanti iti darśayati yathā ukta sarva hetu melake kaṣṭatamaḥ kṣiprakāritamaḥ ca bhavati iti

original: jñeyaṃ kaṣṭatamatvādi ca yathāyogyatayā jñeyaṃ viruddhopakramo doṣaḥ kaṣṭa eva bhavati na kṣiprakārī // 24
analyzed: jñeyam kaṣṭatama tva ādi ca yathā yogyatayā jñeyam viruddha upakramaḥ doṣaḥ kaṣṭaḥ eva bhavati na kṣiprakārī
vyādhi akṣamaśarīrāṇi āha śarīrāṇi ca ityādi

original: aniviṣṭāni ślathāni māṃsādīni yeṣāṃ śarīriṇāṃ tāni tathā kiṃvā aniviṣṭānīti viṣamāṇi // 26
analyzed: aniviṣṭāni ślathāni māṃsa ādīni yeṣām śarīriṇām tāni tathā kiṃvā aniviṣṭāni iti viṣamāṇi

original: upacitānīti saṃvardhitāni asātmyapuṣṭaṃ hi śarīraṃ bhūridoṣabhāvitameva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ // 27
analyzed: upacitāni iti saṃvardhitāni asātmya puṣṭam hi śarīram bhūri doṣa bhāvitam eva bhavati iti bhāvaḥ
viparītāni iti anatisthūla tva ādi yuktāni
vyādhi sahāni iti vyādhi utpādaka pratibandhakāni

original: etacca śarīramadhikṛtya vaiparītyaṃ vyādhisahatve udāharaṇārtham upanyastaṃ tena
analyzed: etat ca śarīram adhikṛtya vaiparītyam vyādhi saha tve udāharaṇa artham upanyastam tena

original: yathoktāpathyabalavaiparītyaṃ doṣabalavaiparītyaṃ ca na sadyo vyādhikārakaṃ bhavatītyetad
analyzed: yathā ukta apathya bala vaiparītyam doṣa bala vaiparītyam ca na sadyas vyādhi kārakam bhavati iti etat
api uktam boddhavyam

original: etad evāpathyāhāradoṣaśarīrāṇām evābalavattvabalavattvābhyāṃ lakṣaṇaviśeṣaṃ yathāyogyatayā mṛdvādivyādhikāraṇatvenopasaṃharann āha ebhyaś caivetyādi
analyzed: etat eva apathya āhāra doṣa śarīrāṇām eva abalavat tva balavat tvābhyām lakṣaṇa viśeṣam yathāyogyatayā mṛdu ādi vyādhi kāraṇa tvena upasaṃharan āha ebhyaḥ ca eva ityādi

original: viśeṣā yathoktā uktaviparītāśca tatroktaviparītaviśeṣān mṛdavastathā cirakāriṇaśca bhavanti yathoktāpathyādiviśeṣāttu dāruṇāḥ kṣiprakāriṇaśca  #
analyzed: viśeṣāḥ yathā uktāḥ ukta viparītāḥ ca tatra ukta viparīta viśeṣāt mṛdavaḥ tathā cirakāriṇaḥ ca bhavanti yathā ukta apathya ādi viśeṣāt tu dāruṇāḥ kṣiprakāriṇaḥ ca
bhavanti iti mantavyam

original: anena prasaṅgena vātādīnāṃ rasādisthānaviśeṣeṣu kupitānāṃ ye vyādhayo bhavanti tān darśayitum āha ta evetyādi // 33]
analyzed: anena prasaṅgena vāta ādīnām rasa ādi sthāna viśeṣeṣu kupitānām ye vyādhayaḥ bhavanti tān darśayitum āha te eva ityādi

original: tatra rasādiṣu sthāneṣu prakupitānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ yasmin sthāne ye ye vyādhayaḥ sambhavanti tāṃs tān yathāvad anuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ // Car_1,28.8
analyzed: tatra rasa ādiṣu sthāneṣu prakupitānām doṣāṇām yasmin sthāne ye ye vyādhayaḥ sambhavanti tān tān yathāvat anuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ

original: tatra rasetyādau prakupitānāṃ doṣāṇāmiti aniyamena rase kupito vāyur vā pittaṃ vā śleṣmā vā saṃsṛṣṭā vā aśraddhādīni kurvanti // 1
analyzed: tatra rasa ityādau prakupitānām doṣāṇām iti aniyamena rase kupitaḥ vāyuḥ vā pittam vā śleṣmā vā saṃsṛṣṭāḥ vā aśraddhā ādīni kurvanti

original: satyapi doṣabhede 'trāśrayasyābhedād āśrayaprabhāveṇaivāśraddhādayo bhavanti paraṃ doṣabhede aśraddhādāv eva vātādiliṅgaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ bhavati
analyzed: sati api doṣa bhede atra āśrayasya abhedāt āśraya prabhāveṇa eva aśraddhā ādayaḥ bhavanti param doṣa bhede aśraddhā ādau eva vāta ādi liṅgam viśiṣṭam bhavati

original: kiṃvā yathāyogyatayā rasāśrayiṇā vātādinā aśraddhādikaraṇaṃ boddhavyaṃ yato na gauravaṃ vātaduṣṭarase bhavitumarhati etacca nātisundaraṃ tena  #
analyzed: kiṃvā yathāyogyatayā rasa āśrayiṇā vāta ādinā aśraddhā ādi karaṇam boddhavyam yatas na gauravam vāta duṣṭa rase bhavitum arhati etat ca na ati sundaram tena
pūrvaḥ eva pakṣaḥ jyāyān
aśraddhā ca aruciḥ ca āsya vairasyam a rasa jña tā

original: hṛllāso gauravaṃ tandrā sāṅgamardo jvaras tamaḥ // Car_1,28.9
analyzed: hṛllāsaḥ gauravam tandrā sa aṅgamardaḥ jvaraḥ tamaḥ

original: pāṇḍutvaṃ srotasāṃ rodhaḥ klaibyaṃ sādaḥ kṛśāṅgatā /
analyzed: pāṇḍu tvam srotasām rodhaḥ klaibyam sādaḥ kṛśa aṅgatā
nāśaḥ agneḥ ayathā kālam valayaḥ palitāni ca

original: aśraddhāyāṃ mukhapraviṣṭasyāhārasyābhyavaharaṇaṃ bhavatyeva paraṃ tv anicchā arucau tu mukhapraviṣṭaṃ nābhyavaharatīti bhedaḥ // 1
analyzed: aśraddhāyām mukha praviṣṭasya āhārasya abhyavaharaṇam bhavati eva param tu anicchā arucau tu mukha praviṣṭam na abhyavaharati iti bhedaḥ
āsya vairasyam ucitāt āsya rasāt anyathātvam
arasajña tā rasa apratipattiḥ
sādaḥ aṅga avasādaḥ
rasa pradoṣa jāḥ rogāḥ vakṣyante rakta doṣa jāḥ
kuṣṭha vīsarpa piḍakāḥ raktapittam asṛgdaraḥ
guda meḍhra āsya pākaḥ ca plīhā gulmaḥ atha vidradhiḥ

original: nīlikā kāmalā vyaṅgaḥ pipplavas tilakālakāḥ // Car_1,28.12

analyzed: dadruḥ carmadalam śvitram pāmā koṭha asra maṇḍalam

original: raktapradoṣajeṣu kuṣṭhagrahaṇādeva dadrvādilābhe siddhe punastadvacanaṃ viśeṣaprādurbhāvapradarśanārtham // 1
analyzed: rakta pradoṣa jeṣu kuṣṭha grahaṇāt eva dadru ādi lābhe siddhe punar tat vacanam viśeṣa prādurbhāva pradarśana artham
tilakālakāḥ tila ākṛtayaḥ
asra maṇḍalam lohita maṇḍalam
rakta pradoṣāt jāyante śṛṇu māṃsa pradoṣa jān
adhimāṃsa arbudam kalim galaśālūka śuṇḍike
pūti māṃsa alajī gaṇḍa gaṇḍamāla upajihvikāḥ
kīla śabdena atra arśaḥ ucyate
vedyān māṃsa āśrayān medaḥ saṃśrayān tu pracakṣmahe

original: ninditāni pramehāṇāṃ pūrvarūpāṇi yāni ca // Car_1,28.15
analyzed: ninditāni pramehāṇām pūrvarūpāṇi yāni ca

original: ninditāni pramehapūrvarūpāṇīti keśajaṭilatvādīni teṣāmeva ninditatvāt na tv āsyavairasyamadhuratvādīni // 1
analyzed: ninditāni prameha pūrvarūpāṇi iti keśa jaṭila tva ādīni teṣām eva nindita tvāt na tu āsya vairasya madhura tva ādīni

original: kiṃvā ninditānīti atisthūlagatāny āyurhrāsādīny aṣṭauninditīyoktāni teṣāṃ ca ninditatvaṃ ninditātisthūlasambaddhatvena // 2
analyzed: kiṃvā ninditāni iti ati sthūla gatāni āyuḥ hrāsa ādīni aṣṭauninditīya uktāni teṣām ca nindita tvam nindita ati sthūla sambaddha tvena

original: evaṃ pūrvasminvyākhyāne yāni ca iti cakāro niyame uttaravyākhyāne tu samuccaye // 3]
analyzed: evam pūrvasmin vyākhyāne yāni ca iti cakāraḥ niyame uttara vyākhyāne tu samuccaye
adhi asthi dantau danta asthi bheda śūlam vivarṇa tā
keśa loma nakha śmaśru doṣāḥ ca asthi pradoṣa jāḥ
adhi asthi danta śabdena adhyasthi adhidantayoḥ grahaṇam
śūlam iti asthi śūlam eva boddhavyam

original: ruk parvaṇāṃ bhramo mūrchā darśanaṃ tamasastathā /
analyzed: ruj parvaṇām bhramaḥ mūrchā darśanam tamasaḥ tathā

original: aruṣāṃ sthūlamūlānāṃ parvajānāṃ ca darśanam // Car_1,28.17
analyzed: aruṣām sthūlamūlānām parva jānām ca darśanam
ruj ityādi majja doṣāt jñeyam
arūṃṣi iti vraṇāni
majja pradoṣāt śukrasya doṣāt klaibyam aharṣaṇam

original: rogi vā klībamalpāyur virūpaṃ vā prajāyate // Car_1,28.18
analyzed: rogi vā klībam alpa āyuḥ virūpam vā prajāyate

original: na cāsya jāyate garbhaḥ patati prasravatyapi /
analyzed: na ca asya jāyate garbhaḥ patati prasravati api

original: śukraṃ hi duṣṭaṃ sāpatyaṃ sadāraṃ bādhate naram // Car_1,28.19
analyzed: śukram hi duṣṭam sa apatyam sa dāram bādhate naram
klaibyam iti dhvaja anucchrāyaḥ
aharṣaṇam ca sati api dhvaja utthāne maithuna aśaktiḥ

original: śukraṃ hi duṣṭaṃ sāpatyaṃ sadāraṃ bādhate naramiti atrāpatyabādhā rogiklībādyapatyajanakatvena dārabādhā tu srāvigarbhādijanakatvena // 3]
analyzed: śukram hi duṣṭam sa apatyam sa dāram bādhate naram iti atra apatya bādhā rogi klība ādi apatya janaka tvena dāra bādhā tu srāvi garbha ādi janaka tvena
indriyāṇi samāśritya prakupyanti yadā malāḥ
upaghāta upatāpābhyām yojayanti indriyāṇi te

original: upaghātetyādau upaghāto vināśaḥ upatāpastu kiṃcid vaikalyam // 1]
analyzed: upaghāta ityādau upaghātaḥ vināśaḥ upatāpaḥ tu kiṃcid vaikalyam
snāyau sirā kaṇḍarābhyaḥ duṣṭāḥ kliśnanti mānavam
stambha saṃkoca khallībhiḥ granthi sphuraṇa suptibhiḥ
kaṇḍarābhyaḥ iti saptamī arthe pañcamī
khallī kara pada avamoṭanam
granthiḥ snāyu ādi granthiḥ eva
malān āśritya kupitāḥ bheda śoṣa pradūṣaṇam

original: doṣā malānāṃ kurvanti saṅgotsargāv atīva ca // Car_1,28.22
analyzed: doṣāḥ malānām kurvanti saṅga utsargau atīva ca

original: malānityādau bhedaśoṣapradūṣaṇam iti yathāsambhavaṃ jñeyaṃ tatra bhedaḥ purīṣasya
analyzed: malān ityādau bheda śoṣa pradūṣaṇam iti yathāsambhavam jñeyam tatra bhedaḥ purīṣasya

original: śoṣastu viśeṣeṇa sarvamaleṣu sambhavati pradūṣaṇaṃ tu praduṣṭavarṇādiyuktatvena prākṛtavarṇādyupaghātaḥ // 1
analyzed: śoṣaḥ tu viśeṣeṇa sarva maleṣu sambhavati pradūṣaṇam tu praduṣṭa varṇa ādi yukta tvena prākṛta varṇa ādi upaghātaḥ

original: etadvyavasthāhetoḥ ṣaṭtvam upadiśyate rasānāṃ paraspareṇāsaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ tritvaṃ ca doṣāṇām // Car_3,1.7
analyzed: etad vyavasthā hetoḥ ṣaṭtvam upadiśyate rasānām paraspareṇa asaṃsṛṣṭānām tritvam ca doṣāṇām

original: atha kayā yuktyā rasā doṣāñjanayanti śamayanti cetyāha rasadoṣetyādi // 1
analyzed: atha kayā yuktyā rasāḥ doṣān janayanti śamayanti ca iti āha rasa doṣa ityādi
saṃnipāte iti antar śarīra melake

original: tuśabdo viśeṣe tena viparītaguṇā eva viśeṣeṇa viparītaguṇabhūyiṣṭhāpekṣayā śamayantīti darśayati // 3
analyzed: tuśabdaḥ viśeṣe tena viparīta guṇāḥ eva viśeṣeṇa viparīta guṇa bhūyiṣṭha apekṣayā śamayanti iti darśayati

original: rasānāṃ tu yathā upācārādguṇā bhavanti tadabhihitaṃ guṇāguṇāśrayā noktāḥ ityādinā sūtre // 4
analyzed: rasānām tu yathā upācārāt guṇāḥ bhavanti tat abhihitam guṇa aguṇa āśrayāḥ na uktāḥ ityādinā sūtre
abhyasyamānāḥ iti na sakṛt upayujyamānāḥ

original: atha kasmādrasadoṣasaṃsargabhūyastvaṃ parityajya rasaṣaṭtvaṃ doṣatritvaṃ cocyate ityāha ityetadityādi // 6
analyzed: atha kasmāt rasa doṣa saṃsarga bhūyastvam parityajya rasa ṣaṭtvam doṣa tritvam ca ucyate iti āha iti etat ityādi
vyavasthā iti rasa doṣa saṃsarga prapañca saṃkṣepaḥ
paraspareṇa asaṃsṛṣṭānām iti padam doṣāṇām iti anena api yojyam

original: saṃsargavikalpavistaro hy eṣām aparisaṃkhyeyo bhavati vikalpabhedāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt // Car_3,1.8
analyzed: saṃsarga vikalpa vistaraḥ hi eṣām aparisaṃkhyeyaḥ bhavati vikalpa bheda aparisaṃkhyeya tvāt
rasa doṣa saṃsarga prapañcān abhidhāne hetum āha saṃsarga ityādi

original: yasmāt saṃsargabhedavistaro 'parisaṃkhyeyas tasmāt ṣaṭtvaṃ tritvaṃ cocyate // 2
analyzed: yasmāt saṃsarga bheda vistaraḥ aparisaṃkhyeyaḥ tasmāt ṣaṭtvam tritvam ca ucyate

original: vikalpabhedāparisaṃkhyeyatvād iti saṃsargavikalpasya bhedo vijātīyaprakāraḥ tasyāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt // 3
analyzed: vikalpa bheda aparisaṃkhyeya tvāt iti saṃsarga vikalpasya bhedaḥ vijātīya prakāraḥ tasya aparisaṃkhyeya tvāt

original: etena yathā rasānām avāntaravyaktibhede 'pi madhuratvādisāmānyayogān madhurādivyapadeśena
analyzed: etena yathā rasānām avāntara vyakti bhede api madhura tva ādi sāmānya yogāt madhura ādi vyapadeśena
ṣaṭtvam ucyate tathā madhura amla madhura lavaṇa ādi saṃsargāṇām api sati api avāntarabhede

original: sāmānyopasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā triṣaṣṭitvasaṃkhyāniyamo bhaviṣyatīti nirasyate yato madhurāmlādisaṃsarge
analyzed: sāmānya upasaṃgraham kṛtvā triṣaṣṭi tva saṃkhyā niyamaḥ bhaviṣyati iti nirasyate yatas madhura amla ādi saṃsarge
api vijātīyaḥ madhuratara madhuratama ādi bheda kṛtaḥ bhedaḥ aparisaṃkhyeyaḥ bhavati

original: vacanaṃ hi rasās taratamābhyāṃ tāṃ saṃkhyām atipatanti hi iti // 5]
analyzed: vacanam hi rasāḥ taratamābhyām tām saṃkhyām atipatanti hi iti

original: tatra khalvanekaraseṣu dravyeṣvanekadoṣātmakeṣu ca vikāreṣu rasadoṣaprabhāvam ekaikaśyenābhisamīkṣya tato dravyavikārayoḥ prabhāvatattvaṃ vyavasyet
analyzed: tatra khalu aneka raseṣu dravyeṣu aneka doṣa ātmakeṣu ca vikāreṣu rasa doṣa prabhāvam ekaikaśyena abhisamīkṣya tatas dravya vikārayoḥ prabhāva tattvam vyavasyet

original: atha kathaṃ tarhi saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ rasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ ca prabhāvo jñeya ityāha tatra khalvityādi // 1
analyzed: atha katham tarhi saṃsṛṣṭānām rasānām doṣāṇām ca prabhāvaḥ jñeyaḥ iti āha tatra khalu ityādi
tatra ca aneka rasa dravyasya aneka doṣa vikārasya ca pratyeka rasa doṣa prabhāva melakena prabhāvam

original: kathayan rasasaṃsargadoṣasaṃsargayor api tādṛśameva prabhāvaṃ kathayati yato rasadoṣasaṃsargaprabhāvāv
analyzed: kathayan rasa saṃsarga doṣa saṃsargayoḥ api tādṛśam eva prabhāvam kathayati yatas rasa doṣa saṃsarga prabhāvau
atra dravya vikāra āśrayi tvāt rasa doṣayoḥ dravya vikāra prabhāva tvena ucyete

original: anena nyāyena sākṣādanukte'pi ekarasadravyaikadoṣavikārayor api prabhāvo 'saṃsṛṣṭarasadoṣaprabhāvakathanād ukta eva jñeyaḥ // 3
analyzed: anena nyāyena sākṣāt anukte api ekarasa dravya eka doṣa vikārayoḥ api prabhāvaḥ asaṃsṛṣṭa rasa doṣa prabhāva kathanāt uktaḥ eva jñeyaḥ  /

original: ekaikaśyenābhisamīkṣyeti pratyekam uktarasādiprabhāveṇānekarasaṃ dravyam anekadoṣaṃ ca vikāraṃ samuditaprabhāvam abhisamīkṣya // 4]
analyzed: ekaikaśyena abhisamīkṣya iti pratyekam ukta rasa ādi prabhāveṇa aneka rasam dravyam aneka doṣam ca vikāram samudita prabhāvam abhisamīkṣya
na tu evam khalu sarvatra

original: na hi vikṛtiviṣamasamavetānāṃ nānātmakānāṃ paraspareṇa copahatānāmanyaiśca vikalpanair
analyzed: na hi vikṛti viṣama samavetānām nānā ātmakānām paraspareṇa ca upahatānām anyaiḥ ca vikalpanaiḥ

original: vikalpitānām avayavaprabhāvānumānenaiva samudāyaprabhāvatattvam adhyavasātuṃ śakyam // Car_3,1.10
analyzed: vikalpitānām avayava prabhāva anumānena eva samudāya prabhāva tattvam adhyavasātum śakyam

original: ayaṃ ca rasadoṣaprabhāvadvārā dravyavikāraprabhāvaniścayo na sarvatra dravye vikāre cetyāha na tv evaṃ khalu sarvatreti // 1
analyzed: ayam ca rasa doṣa prabhāva dvārā dravya vikāra prabhāva niścayaḥ na sarvatra dravye vikāre ca iti āha na tu evam khalu sarvatra iti

original: atraiva hetum āha na hītyādinādhyavasātuṃ śakyamityantena // 2
analyzed: atra eva hetum āha na hi ityādinā adhyavasātum śakyam iti antena

original: vikṛtiviṣamasamavetānām iti vikṛtisamavetānāṃ tathā viṣamasamavetānāṃ ceti vikṛtiviṣamasamavetānām // 3
analyzed: vikṛti viṣama samavetānām iti vikṛti samavetānām tathā viṣama samavetānām ca iti vikṛti viṣama samavetānām
samavetānām iti militānām rasānām doṣāṇām ca

original: tatra rasasya vikṛtisamavāyo yathā madhure taṇḍulīyake madhuro hi prakṛtyā snehavṛṣyatvādikaraḥ taṇḍulīyake tu vikṛtisamavetatvena tanna karoti
analyzed: tatra rasasya vikṛti samavāyaḥ yathā madhure taṇḍulīyake madhuraḥ hi prakṛtyā sneha vṛṣya tva ādi karaḥ taṇḍulīyake tu vikṛti samaveta tvena tat na karoti

original: viṣamasamavetāstu tile kaṣāyakaṭutiktamadhurāḥ yadi hīme rasāḥ samayā mātrayā samavetāḥ
analyzed: viṣama samavetāḥ tu tile kaṣāya kaṭu tikta madhurāḥ yadi hi ime rasāḥ samayā mātrayā samavetāḥ

original: syustatastilo'pi pittaśleṣmaharastridoṣaharo vā syāt pittakaphakarastvayaṃ tenātra
analyzed: syuḥ tatas tilaḥ api pitta śleṣma haraḥ tridoṣa haraḥ vā syāt pitta kapha karaḥ tu ayam tena atra

original: rasānāṃ kvacit kartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca kvaciditi vaiṣamyam unnīyate // 6
analyzed: rasānām kvacid kartṛ tvam akartṛ tvam ca kvacid iti vaiṣamyam unnīyate
nānā ātmakānām ityādi hetu trayam tu vikṛti samavāya viṣama samavāyayoḥ eva upalambhakam
tena nānā ātmaka tvāt ityādibhiḥ vikṛti samavāya viṣama samavāyau bhavataḥ

original: nānātmakānāmiti nānārūpahetujanitānāṃ tena hetubhedabalādeva rasadoṣayor vikṛto viṣamo vā melako bhavatītyarthaḥ // 9
analyzed: nānā ātmakānām iti nānā rūpa hetu janitānām tena hetu bheda balāt eva rasa doṣayoḥ vikṛtaḥ viṣamaḥ vā melakaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
kiṃvā nānā ātmakānām iti nānā pramāṇānām
evam ca nānā pramāṇa tvam viṣama samavāye hetuḥ
paraspareṇa ca upahatānām iti anyonyam upaghātita guṇānām

original: parasparaguṇopaghātastu yadyapi doṣāṇāṃ prāyo nāstyeva tathāpyadṛṣṭavaśāt kvacid bhavatīti jñeyaṃ rasānāṃ tu prabalenānyopaghāto bhavatyeva
analyzed: paraspara guṇa upaghātaḥ tu yadi api doṣāṇām prāyas na asti eva tathā api adṛṣṭa vaśāt kvacid bhavati iti jñeyam rasānām tu prabalena anya upaghātaḥ bhavati eva

original: anyaiśca vikalpanairiti anyaiśca bhedakaiḥ tatra rasasya bhedakāḥ svarasakalkādayaḥ ekasyaiva hi dravyasya kalpanāviśeṣeṇa guṇāntarāṇi bhavanti
analyzed: anyaiḥ ca vikalpanaiḥ iti anyaiḥ ca bhedakaiḥ tatra rasasya bhedakāḥ svarasa kalka ādayaḥ ekasya eva hi dravyasya kalpanā viśeṣeṇa guṇa antarāṇi bhavanti
doṣasya tu dūṣya antarāṇi eva guṇa antara yogāt bhedakāni bhavanti

original: yaduktaṃ sa eva kupito doṣaḥ samutthānaviśeṣataḥ // 16
analyzed: yat uktam saḥ eva kupitaḥ doṣaḥ samutthāna viśeṣataḥ
sthāna antara gataḥ ca eva vikārān kurute bahūn iti

original: asminvyākhyāne rasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ ca ya utkarṣāpakarṣakṛto viṣamasamavāyaḥ pṛthagucyate
analyzed: asmin vyākhyāne rasānām doṣāṇām ca yaḥ utkarṣa apakarṣa kṛtaḥ viṣama samavāyaḥ pṛthak ucyate

original: sa na yujyate yato viṣamasamavāye 'pyutkṛṣṭasya rasasya tathā doṣasya cotkṛṣṭā guṇā
analyzed: sa na yujyate yatas viṣama samavāye api utkṛṣṭasya rasasya tathā doṣasya ca utkṛṣṭāḥ guṇāḥ

original: apakṛṣṭasya cāpakṛṣṭā guṇā bhavantīti kṛtvāvayavaprabhāvān anumānenaiva samudāyaprabhāvānumānaṃ śakyam // 18
analyzed: apakṛṣṭasya ca apakṛṣṭāḥ guṇāḥ bhavanti iti kṛtvā avayava prabhāvān anumānena eva samudāya prabhāva anumānam śakyam  /

original: athocyate viṣamamelake rasasya doṣasya ca na ta eva guṇā utkṛṣṭā apakṛṣṭā vā bhavanti kiṃtu guṇāntarameva bhavati hanta tarhi vikṛta evāyaṃ  #
analyzed: atha ucyate viṣama melake rasasya doṣasya ca na te eva guṇāḥ utkṛṣṭāḥ apakṛṣṭāḥ vā bhavanti kiṃtu guṇa antaram eva bhavati hanta tarhi vikṛtaḥ eva ayam
samavāyaḥ visadṛśa kāryakāraṇa tvāt

original: tadevaṃ dūṣaṇadarśanād anyathā vyākhyāyate yad dvividho melako bhavati rasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ
analyzed: tat evam dūṣaṇa darśanāt anyathā vyākhyāyate yat dvividhaḥ melakaḥ bhavati rasānām doṣāṇām

original: ca prakṛtyanuguṇaḥ prakṛtyananuguṇaśca tatra yo militānāṃ prākṛtaguṇānupamardena
analyzed: ca prakṛti anuguṇaḥ prakṛti ananuguṇaḥ ca tatra yaḥ militānām prākṛta guṇa an upamardena

original: melako bhavati sa prakṛtisamasamavāyaśabdenocyate yastu prākṛtaguṇopamardena bhavati
analyzed: melakaḥ bhavati sa prakṛti sama samavāya śabdena ucyate yaḥ tu prākṛta guṇa upamardena bhavati

original: sa vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyo 'bhidhīyate vikṛtyā hetubhūtayā viṣamaḥ prakṛtyananuguṇaḥ
analyzed: sa vikṛti viṣama samavāyaḥ abhidhīyate vikṛtyā hetu bhūtayā viṣamaḥ prakṛti ananuguṇaḥ
samavāyaḥ vikṛti viṣama samavāyaḥ iti arthaḥ
atra eva vikṛti viṣama samavāye nānā ātmaka tva ādi hetu trayam yathā vivṛtam eva yojanīyam

original: ye tu vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyau pṛthag eva kurvanti viṣamasamavāyasya vaiṣamyatāratamyenātibahuprapañcitatvād
analyzed: ye tu vikṛti viṣama samavāyau pṛthak eva kurvanti viṣama samavāyasya vaiṣamya tāratamyena atibahu prapañcita tvāt

original: viṣamāvayavaguṇānumānaṃ duḥśakam iti kṛtvā tadapi dravyavikāraprabhāveṇaiva vyapadiśanti // 22]
analyzed: viṣama avayava guṇa anumānam duḥśakam iti kṛtvā tat api dravya vikāra prabhāveṇa eva vyapadiśanti

original: tathāyukte hi samudaye samudāyaprabhāvatattvamevam evopalabhya tato dravyavikāraprabhāvatattvaṃ vyavasyet // Car_3,1.11
analyzed: tathā yukte hi samudaye samudāya prabhāva tattvam evam eva upalabhya tatas dravya vikāra prabhāva tattvam vyavasyet

original: atha kathaṃ tarhi vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyaprabhāvajñānam ityāha tathāyukte hītyādi // 1
analyzed: atha katham tarhi vikṛti viṣama samavāya prabhāva jñānam iti āha tathā yukte hi ityādi
tathā yukte samudaye iti vikṛti viṣama samavāye

original: samadhṛte hi madhusarpiṣi sūryāvartākhye vā doṣasamudaye na saṃyujyamānamadhughṛtaguṇakramāgataṃ
analyzed: sama dhṛte hi madhu sarpiṣi sūryāvarta ākhye vā doṣa samudaye na saṃyujyamāna madhu ghṛta guṇa krama āgatam

original: mārakatvaṃ na ca vātādidoṣaprabhāvagataṃ sūryavṛddhyā vardhiṣṇutvaṃ sūryāvartasya
analyzed: māraka tvam na ca vāta ādi doṣa prabhāva gatam sūrya vṛddhyā vardhiṣṇu tvam sūryāvartasya
kim tu saṃyoga mahima kṛtam eva iti arthaḥ

original: yacca gatidvayaṃ doṣarasamelakasya tena prakṛtisamasamavāyarūpaṃ saṃnipātaṃ jvaranidāne doṣaliṅgamelakenaivoktavān // 5
analyzed: yat ca gati dvayam doṣa rasa melakasya tena prakṛti sama samavāya rūpam saṃnipātam jvara nidāne doṣa liṅga melakena eva uktavān

original: yaduktaṃ pṛthaguktalakṣaṇasaṃsargād dvāṃdvikam anyatamaṃ sāṃnipātikaṃ vā jvaraṃ vidyād iti // 6
analyzed: yat uktam pṛthak ukta lakṣaṇa saṃsargāt dvāṃdvikam anyatamam sāṃnipātikam vā jvaram vidyāt iti

original: yastu vikṛtiviṣamasamavetastridoṣakṛto jvaras tasya cikitsite kṣaṇe dāhaḥ kṣaṇe śītam ityādinā lakṣaṇam uktam // 7
analyzed: yaḥ tu vikṛti viṣama samavetaḥ tridoṣa kṛtaḥ jvaraḥ tasya cikitsite kṣaṇe dāhaḥ kṣaṇe śītam ityādinā lakṣaṇam uktam

original: na hi śyāvaraktakoṭhotpattyādi tatroktaṃ vātādijvare kvacid asti // 8
analyzed: na hi śyāva rakta koṭha utpatti ādi tatra uktam vāta ādi jvare kvacid asti

original: evaṃ rase'pi yatrāmrāte madhuratvaṃ prakṛtisamasamavetaṃ tatrāmrātaṃ madhuram etanmātram evoktaṃ tena madhurasāmānyaguṇāgataṃ tasya vātapittaharatvamapi  #
analyzed: evam rase api yatra āmrāte madhura tvam prakṛti sama samavetam tatra āmrātam madhuram etad mātram eva uktam tena madhura sāmānya guṇa āgatam tasya vāta pitta hara tvam api
labhyate eva

original: yatra vārtāke kaṭutiktatvena vātakaratvaṃ prāptamapi ca vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyāttanna bhavati tatrācāryeṇa vārtākaṃ vātaghnam ityuktam eva //
analyzed: yatra vārtāke kaṭu tikta tvena vāta kara tvam prāptam api ca vikṛti viṣama samavāyāt tat na bhavati tatra ācāryeṇa vārtākam vāta ghnam iti uktam eva
evam ityādi tat tat udāharaṇam śāstra prasṛtam anusaraṇīyam

original: yattu prakṛtisamasamavāyakṛtarasadoṣaguṇadvārā prāptamapi dravyaguṇaṃ vikāralakṣaṇaṃ ca brūte tat prakarṣārthaṃ spaṣṭārthaṃ ceti jñeyam //
analyzed: yat tu prakṛti sama samavāya kṛta rasa doṣa guṇa dvārā prāptam api dravya guṇam vikāra lakṣaṇam ca brūte tat prakarṣa artham spaṣṭa artham ca iti jñeyam

original: tasmād rasaprabhāvataś ca dravyaprabhāvataś ca doṣaprabhāvataś ca vikāraprabhāvataś ca tattvamupadekṣyāmaḥ // Car_3,1.12
analyzed: tasmāt rasa prabhāvataḥ ca dravya prabhāvataḥ ca doṣa prabhāvataḥ ca vikāra prabhāvataḥ ca tattvam upadekṣyāmaḥ
upasaṃharati tasmāt ityādi
tattvam iti rasa ādi prabhāva tattvam

original: yattu pūrvaṃ tatrādau rasadravyadoṣavikāraprabhāvān upadekṣyāmaḥ ityanena rasādiprabhāvavyākhyānapratijñānaṃ
analyzed: yat tu pūrvam tatra ādau rasa dravya doṣa vikāra prabhāvān upadekṣyāmaḥ iti anena rasa ādi prabhāva vyākhyāna pratijñānam

original: kṛtaṃ tattu rasaprabhāvānumānenaiva dravyaprabhāvakathanāt tathā doṣaprabhāveṇa ca
analyzed: kṛtam tat tu rasa prabhāva anumānena eva dravya prabhāva kathanāt tathā doṣa prabhāveṇa ca
vikāra prabhāva kathanāt caritārtham syāt

original: iha tu vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyātmake dravye vikāre vā rasadoṣaprabhāvānumānena na dravyavikāraprabhāvānumānam
analyzed: iha tu vikṛti viṣama samavāya ātmake dravye vikāre vā rasa doṣa prabhāva anumānena na dravya vikāra prabhāva anumānam

original: astīti kṛtvā pṛthak pṛthagrasādiprabhāvatattvābhidhānapratijñānam iti na paunaruktyam // 4
analyzed: asti iti kṛtvā pṛthak pṛthak rasa ādi prabhāva tattva abhidhāna pratijñānam iti na paunaruktyam

original: iha dravyāṇāṃ vīryaprabhāvavipākaprabhāvau ca dravyaprabhāve rasaprabhāve vāntarbhāvanīyau // 5
analyzed: iha dravyāṇām vīrya prabhāva vipāka prabhāvau ca dravya prabhāve rasa prabhāve vā antar bhāvanīyau

original: tatra yau rasānuguṇau vīryavipākaprabhāvau tau rase yau tu rasakramoktavīryavipākaviparītau vīryavipākau tau dravyaprabhāve boddhavyau // 6
analyzed: tatra yau rasa anuguṇau vīrya vipāka prabhāvau tau rase yau tu rasa krama ukta vīrya vipāka viparītau vīrya vipākau tau dravya prabhāve boddhavyau  /

original: upadekṣyāma iti nikhilena tantreṇa rasādiprabhāvatattvaṃ pṛthag upadekṣyāma ityarthaḥ rasādiprabhāvaḥ prapañcena nikhile tantra eva vaktavyaḥ
analyzed: upadekṣyāmaḥ iti nikhilena tantreṇa rasa ādi prabhāva tattvam pṛthak upadekṣyāmaḥ iti arthaḥ rasa ādi prabhāvaḥ prapañcena nikhile tantre eva vaktavyaḥ
tatra eṣa rasa prabhāvaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati
dravya prabhāvam punar upadekṣyāmaḥ
taila sarpiḥ madhūni vāta pitta śleṣma praśamana arthāni dravyāṇi bhavanti
saṃkṣepa abhidhānam etat eva iti darśayan āha tatra eṣaḥ ityādi

original: eṣa iti rasāḥ ṣaḍ ityādinā tattvamupadekṣyāmaḥ ityantena granthenokta ityarthaḥ // 2
analyzed: eṣaḥ iti rasāḥ ṣaṭ ityādinā tattvam upadekṣyāmaḥ iti antena granthena uktaḥ iti arthaḥ
upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati iti saṃkṣepeṇa kathitaḥ bhavati

original: anye tu tatraiṣa rasaprabhāva uddiṣṭo bhavati iti paṭhanti // 4
analyzed: anye tu tatra eṣa rasa prabhāvaḥ uddiṣṭaḥ bhavati iti paṭhanti

original: asmin pakṣe dravyadoṣavikāraprabhāvo 'pi 'tra uddiṣṭaḥ so 'pi rasadvārā tena rasasyaiva
analyzed: asmin pakṣe dravya doṣa vikāra prabhāvaḥ api atra uddiṣṭaḥ saḥ api rasa dvārā tena rasasya eva

original: prapañcābhihitatvāt tasyaivābhidhānam upasaṃharati na dravyādīnāmiti jñeyam dravyaprabhāvamityādau
analyzed: prapañca abhihita tvāt tasya eva abhidhānam upasaṃharati na dravya ādīnām iti jñeyam dravya prabhāvam ityādau

original: punariti sāmānyena dravyaprabhāvakathanāt punaḥ śṛṅgagrāhikayā tailādidravyaprabhāvaṃ
analyzed: punar iti sāmānyena dravya prabhāva kathanāt punar śṛṅgagrāhikayā taila ādi dravya prabhāvam
kathayiṣyāmaḥ iti arthaḥ
praśamana arthāni iti praśamana prayojanāni

original: tatra tailaṃ snehauṣṇyagauravopapannatvād vātaṃ jayati satatamabhyasyamānaṃ vāto
analyzed: tatra tailam sneha auṣṇya gaurava upapanna tvāt vātam jayati satatam abhyasyamānam

original: hi raukṣyaśaityalāghavopapanno viruddhaguṇo bhavati viruddhaguṇasaṃnipāte hi bhūyasālpam
analyzed: hi raukṣya śaitya lāghava upapannaḥ viruddha guṇaḥ bhavati viruddha guṇa saṃnipāte hi bhūyasā alpam

original: avajīyate tasmāttailaṃ vātaṃ jayati satatam abhyasyamānam /
analyzed: avajīyate tasmāt tailam vātam jayati satatam abhyasyamānam

original: sarpiḥ khalvevameva pittaṃ jayati mādhuryācchaityānmandatvācca pittaṃ hy amadhuram uṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca /
analyzed: sarpiḥ khalu evam eva pittam jayati mādhuryāt śaityāt manda tvāt ca pittam hi amadhuram uṣṇam tīkṣṇam ca

original: madhu ca śleṣmāṇaṃ jayati raukṣyāt taikṣṇyāt kaṣāyatvāc ca śleṣmā hi snigdho mando madhuraśca /
analyzed: madhu ca śleṣmāṇam jayati raukṣyāt taikṣṇyāt kaṣāya tvāt ca śleṣmā hi snigdhaḥ mandaḥ madhuraḥ ca

original: yac cānyadapi kiṃcid dravyamevaṃ vātapittakaphebhyo guṇato viparītaṃ syāt tac caitāñjayaty abhyasyamānam // Car_3,1.14
analyzed: yat ca anyat api kiṃcid dravyam evam vāta pitta kaphebhyaḥ guṇataḥ viparītam syāt tat ca etān jayati abhyasyamānam
satatam abhyasyamānam iti avicchedena upayujyamānam
viruddha guṇaḥ iti taila guṇebhyaḥ viparīta guṇaḥ
viruddha guṇa saṃnipāte iti viruddha guṇayoḥ melake

original: nanu viruddhaguṇayor madhye bhūyasālpaṃ jīyate tat kathaṃ tailaṃ vātaṃ jayati na hy asya vātaṃ prati bhūyastvaṃ yuktamityāha satatam abhyasyamānam  #
analyzed: nanu viruddha guṇayoḥ madhye bhūyasā alpam jīyate tat katham tailam vātam jayati na hi asya vātam prati bhūyastvam yuktam iti āha satatam abhyasyamānam
iti

original: satatopayogena hi tailaṃ vātād adhikaṃ bhavati tena vātaṃ jayatītyarthaḥ // 5
analyzed: satata upayogena hi tailam vātāt adhikam bhavati tena vātam jayati iti arthaḥ

original: sarpiḥ khalvevameveti sarpirapi satatam abhyasyamānam ityarthaḥ // 6
analyzed: sarpiḥ khalu evam eva iti sarpiḥ api satatam abhyasyamānam iti arthaḥ
amadhuram iti raukṣya lāghava avṛṣya tva ādinā madhura viparītam kaṭu rasam iti arthaḥ

original: iha ca prabhāvaśabdena sāmānyena dravyaśaktir ucyate nācintyaśaktiḥ tena tailādīnāṃ snehauṣṇyādiguṇādapi vātādiśamanaṃ dravyaprabhāvādeva bhavati
analyzed: iha ca prabhāva śabdena sāmānyena dravya śaktiḥ ucyate na acintya śaktiḥ tena taila ādīnām sneha auṣṇya ādi guṇāt api vāta ādi śamanam dravya prabhāvāt eva bhavati

original: sarpiṣi ca yadyapi madhuro rasaḥ pittapraśame vyāpriyate tathāpi mādhuryaśaityamandatvaiḥ pittaśamanaṃ sarpiḥkāryameva tena dravyaprabhāva  #
analyzed: sarpiṣi ca yadi api madhuraḥ rasaḥ pitta praśame vyāpriyate tathā api mādhurya śaitya mandatvaiḥ pitta śamanam sarpiḥ kāryam eva tena dravya prabhāva
eva vācyaḥ

original: yadā tu rasadvārā kāryaṃ dravyasya cintyate tadā rasaprabhāva iti vyapadeśo bhavati // 10
analyzed: yadā tu rasa dvārā kāryam dravyasya cintyate tadā rasa prabhāvaḥ iti vyapadeśaḥ bhavati

original: evaṃ kaṣāyānurase madhuni ca samādhānaṃ vācyam // 11
analyzed: evam kaṣāya anurase madhuni ca samādhānam vācyam

original: anye tu bruvate yattailādīnāṃ vātādiśamanatvaṃ pratyacintya eva prabhāvo 'yamucyate
analyzed: anye tu bruvate yat taila ādīnām vāta ādi śamana tvam prati acintyaḥ eva prabhāvaḥ ayam ucyate

original: tatra ca tailavātayor viruddhaguṇayor melake tailameva vātaṃ jayati na tu vātas tailam
analyzed: tatra ca taila vātayoḥ viruddha guṇayoḥ melake tailam eva vātam jayati na tu vātaḥ tailam

original: iti tailasyācintyaprabhāvaḥ evaṃ sarpirmadhunor api pittaśleṣmaharaṇe prabhāvājjñeye // 12
analyzed: iti tailasya acintya prabhāvaḥ evam sarpiḥ madhunoḥ api pitta śleṣma haraṇe prabhāvāt jñeye

original: etaccānye necchanti yatas tailādīnāṃ satatam abhyasyamānamiti padenādhikyameva vātādijayakāraṇamuktaṃ
analyzed: etat ca anye na icchanti yatas taila ādīnām satatam abhyasyamānam iti padena ādhikyam eva vāta ādi jaya kāraṇam uktam

original: tathā yaccānyad api kiṃcid dravyam ityādigranthena dravyācintyaprabhāvaṃ parityajya
analyzed: tathā yat ca anyat api kiṃcid dravyam iti ādi granthena dravya acintya prabhāvam parityajya
sāmānyena guṇa vaiparītyam eva abhyāsāt vāta ādi jaya hetuḥ ucyate

original: atha khalu trīṇi dravyāṇi nātyupayuñjītādhikam anyebhyo dravyebhyaḥ tadyathāpippalī kṣāraḥ lavaṇamiti // Car_3,1.15
analyzed: atha khalu trīṇi dravyāṇi na atyupayuñjīta adhikam anyebhyaḥ dravyebhyaḥ tat yathā pippalī kṣāraḥ lavaṇam iti
abhyasya dravyam prabhāva udāharaṇa artham abhidhāya anabhyasyān āha atha ityādi

original: adhikamanyebhya iti vacanādanyadapi citrakabhallātakādyevaṃjātīyaṃ nātyupayoktavyaṃ pippalyādidravyaṃ tv anyebhyo 'pyadhikam atyupayoge varjanīyamiti  #
analyzed: adhikam anyebhyaḥ iti vacanāt anyat api citraka bhallātaka ādi evaṃjātīyam na atyupayoktavyam pippalyādi dravyam tu anyebhyaḥ api adhikam atyupayoge varjanīyam iti
darśayati

original: pippalyo hi kaṭukāḥ satyo madhuravipākā gurvyo nātyarthaṃ snigdhoṣṇāḥ prakledinyo
analyzed: pippalyaḥ hi kaṭukāḥ satyaḥ madhura vipākāḥ gurvyaḥ na atyartham snigdha uṣṇāḥ prakledinyaḥ

original: bheṣajābhimatāś ca tāḥ sadyaḥ śubhāśubhakāriṇyo bhavanti āpātabhadrāḥ prayogasamasādguṇyāt
analyzed: bheṣaja abhimatāḥ ca tāḥ sadyas śubha aśubha kāriṇyaḥ bhavanti āpāta bhadrāḥ prayoga sama sādguṇyāt

original: doṣasaṃcayānubandhāḥ satatam upayujyamānā hi guruprakleditvācchleṣmāṇam utkleśayanti
analyzed: doṣa saṃcaya anubandhāḥ satatam upayujyamānāḥ hi guru prakledi tvāt śleṣmāṇam utkleśayanti

original: auṣṇyāt pittaṃ na ca vātapraśamanāyopakalpante 'lpasnehoṣṇabhāvāt yogavāhinyastu
analyzed: auṣṇyāt pittam na ca vāta praśamanāya upakalpante alpa sneha uṣṇa bhāvāt yogavāhinyaḥ tu
khalu bhavanti tasmāt pippalīḥ na atyupayuñjīta

original: kaṭukāḥ satyo madhuravipākāḥ ityādi pippalīguṇakathanam anabhyāsaprayoge doṣavaiparītyena
analyzed: kaṭukāḥ satyaḥ madhura vipākāḥ ityādi pippalī guṇa kathanam anabhyāsa prayoge doṣa vaiparītyena
doṣa praśamana upadarśana artham tathā atyabhyāse guru prakledi tvāt śleṣmāṇam utkleśayanti
ityādi grantha vaktavya doṣa karaṇa yogyatā upadarśana artham ca
bheṣaja abhimatāḥ ca sadyas iti chedaḥ
sadyas iti anabhyāse

original: śubhāśubhakāriṇyo bhavantīti sadyaḥ śubhakāriṇyaḥ atyabhyāsaprayoge tv aśubhakāriṇyaḥ // 4
analyzed: śubha aśubha kāriṇyaḥ bhavanti iti sadyas śubha kāriṇyaḥ atyabhyāsa prayoge tu aśubha kāriṇyaḥ
etat eva śubha aśubha kāri tvam darśayati āpāta bhadrāḥ ityādinā

original: prayogasamasādguṇyād iti samasya prayogasya sadguṇatvāt same 'lpakāle alpamātre ca pippalyādiprayoge sadguṇā bhavantītyarthaḥ // 6
analyzed: prayoga sama sādguṇyāt iti samasya prayogasya sat guṇa tvāt same alpa kāle alpa mātre ca pippalī ādi prayoge sat guṇāḥ bhavanti iti arthaḥ
doṣa saṃcaya anubandhaḥ atyupayogaḥ yāsām tāḥ doṣa saṃcaya anubandhāḥ
etat eva doṣa saṃcaya anubandha tvam vivṛṇoti satatam ityādi

original: pippalīdharmakathanaprastāvād guṇāntaram āha yogavāhinyas tv ityādi // 9
yogavāhitvena kaṭukānāmapi pippalīnāṃ vṛṣyaprayogeṣu yogaḥ tathā jvaragulmakuṣṭhaharādiprayogeṣu jvarādīn hanti pippalī // 10
analyzed: yogavāhi tvena kaṭukānām api pippalīnām vṛṣya prayogeṣu yogaḥ tathā jvara gulma kuṣṭha hara ādi prayogeṣu jvara ādīn hanti pippalī
ayam ca pippalī atiyoga niṣedhaḥ apavādam parityajya jñeyaḥ

original: tena pippalīrasāyanaprayogas tathā gulmādiṣu ca pippalīvardhamānakaprayogo na virodham āvahati // 12
analyzed: tena pippalī rasāyana prayogaḥ tathā gulma ādiṣu ca pippalī vardhamānaka prayogaḥ na virodham āvahati

original: ukte hi viṣaye yathoktavidhānena nirdoṣā eva pippalya iti ṛṣivacanād unnīyate /
analyzed: ukte hi viṣaye yathā ukta vidhānena nirdoṣāḥ eva pippalyaḥ iti ṛṣi vacanāt unnīyate

original: anye tu annasaṃskaraṇe pippalyādīnām atiprayogo na tu svātantryeṇeti bruvate /
analyzed: anye tu anna saṃskaraṇe pippalī ādīnām atiprayogaḥ na tu svātantryeṇa iti bruvate

original: satatamupayujyamānā iti atimātratvena tathā satataprayogeṇa ceti jñeyam // 13]
analyzed: satatam upayujyamānāḥ iti atimātra tvena tathā satata prayogeṇa ca iti jñeyam

original: kṣāraḥ punar auṣṇyataikṣṇyalāghavopapannaḥ kledayatyādau paścādviśoṣayati sa pacanadahanabhedanārtham upayujyate so 'tiprayujyamānaḥ keśākṣihṛdayapuṃstvopaghātakaraḥ  #
analyzed: kṣāraḥ punar auṣṇya taikṣṇya lāghava upapannaḥ kledayati ādau paścāt viśoṣayati sa pacana dahana bhedana artham upayujyate saḥ ati prayujyamānaḥ keśa akṣi hṛdaya puṃstva upaghāta karaḥ  /
saṃpadyate

original: ye hy enaṃ grāmanagaranigamajanapadāḥ satatam upayuñjate ta āndhyaṣāṇḍhyakhālityapālityabhājo
analyzed: ye hi enam grāma nagara nigama janapadāḥ satatam upayuñjate te āndhya ṣāṇḍhya khālitya pālitya bhājaḥ

original: hṛdayāpakartinaśca bhavanti tadyathā prācyāś cīnāśca tasmātkṣāraṃ nātyupayuñjīta // Car_3,1.17
analyzed: hṛdaya apakartinaḥ ca bhavanti tat yathā prācyāḥ cīnāḥ ca tasmāt kṣāram na atyupayuñjīta
hṛdaya apakartinaḥ iti hṛdaya parikartana rūpa vedanā yuktāḥ

original: lavaṇaṃ punarauṣṇyataikṣṇyopapannam anatiguru anatisnigdham upakledi visraṃsanasamartham
analyzed: lavaṇam punar auṣṇya taikṣṇya upapannam anatiguru anatisnigdham upakledi visraṃsana samartham

original: annadravyarucikaram āpātabhadraṃ prayogasamasādguṇyāt doṣasaṃcayānubandhaṃ tad rocanapācanopakledanavisraṃsanārtham upayujyate /
analyzed: anna dravya ruci karam āpāta bhadram prayoga sama sādguṇyāt doṣa saṃcaya anubandham tat rocana pācana upakledana visraṃsana artham upayujyate

original: tad atyartham upayujyamānaṃ glāniśaithilyadaurbalyābhinirvṛttikaraṃ śarīrasya bhavati /
analyzed: tat atyartham upayujyamānam glāni śaithilya daurbalya abhinirvṛtti karam śarīrasya bhavati

original: ye hy enad grāmanagaranigamajanapadāḥ satatamupayuñjate te bhūyiṣṭhaṃ glāsnavaḥ śithilamāṃsaśoṇitā aparikleśasahāś ca bhavanti /
analyzed: ye hi enat grāma nagara nigama janapadāḥ satatam upayuñjate te bhūyiṣṭham glāsnavaḥ śithila māṃsa śoṇitāḥ aparikleśa sahāḥ ca bhavanti

original: tadyathā vāhlīkasaurāṣṭrikasaindhavasauvīrakāḥ te hi payasāpi saha lavaṇam aśnanti /
analyzed: tat yathā vāhlīka saurāṣṭrika saindhava sauvīrakāḥ te hi payasā api saha lavaṇam aśnanti

original: ye 'pīha bhūmer atyūṣarā deśāsteṣvoṣadhivīrudvanaspativānaspatyā na jāyante'lpatejaso vā bhavanti lavaṇopahatatvāt /
analyzed: ye api iha bhūmeḥ atyūṣarāḥ deśāḥ teṣu oṣadhi vīrudh vanaspati vānaspatyāḥ na jāyante alpa tejasaḥ vā bhavanti lavaṇa upahata tvāt
tasmāt lavaṇam na atyupayuñjīta

original: ye hy atilavaṇasātmyāḥ puruṣāsteṣāmapi khālityapālityāni valayaścākāle bhavanti // Car_3,1.18
analyzed: ye hi ati lavaṇa sātmyāḥ puruṣāḥ teṣām api khālitya pālityāni valayaḥ ca akāle bhavanti
glāniḥ māṃsa apacayaḥ harṣa kṣayaḥ vā

original: na kevalaṃ lavaṇātiyogaḥ śarīropaghātakaraḥ kiṃtu bhūmer apyupaghātakara ityāha ye 'pīhetyādi // 2
analyzed: na kevalam lavaṇa atiyogaḥ śarīra upaghāta karaḥ kiṃtu bhūmeḥ api upaghāta karaḥ iti āha ye api iha ityādi
ūṣarāḥ iti lavaṇa pradhānāḥ

original: lavaṇaṃ nātyupayuñjīteti nātimātraṃ lavaṇaṃ satatam upayuñjīta annadravyasaṃskārakaṃ tu stokamātram abhyāsenāpyupayojanīyam eva // 4
analyzed: lavaṇam na atyupayuñjīta iti na atimātram lavaṇam satatam upayuñjīta anna dravya saṃskārakam tu stoka mātram abhyāsena api upayojanīyam eva

original: vāhlīkādivyatirikte 'pi deśe ye 'tilavaṇam aśnanti teṣāmapi doṣānāha ye hītyādi // 5
analyzed: vāhlīka ādi vyatirikte api deśe ye ati lavaṇam aśnanti teṣām api doṣān āha ye hi ityādi

original: etena cānyatrāpi deśe 'timātralavaṇasātmyānāṃ lavaṇātyupayogakṛta eva śaithilyādidoṣa unnīyate na deśasvabhāvakṛtaḥ // 6]
analyzed: etena ca anyatra api deśe atimātra lavaṇa sātmyānām lavaṇa atyupayoga kṛtaḥ eva śaithilya ādi doṣaḥ unnīyate na deśa svabhāva kṛtaḥ
tasmāt teṣām tad sātmyataḥ krameṇa apagamanam śreyaḥ

original: sātmyamapi hi krameṇopanivartyamānam adoṣam alpadoṣaṃ vā bhavati // Car_3,1.19
analyzed: sātmyam api hi krameṇa upanivartyamānam adoṣam alpa doṣam vā bhavati
teṣām iti ati kṣāra lavaṇa sātmyānām

original: tatsātmyata iti atimātrakṣārād atimātralavaṇāc ca sātmyāt // 2
analyzed: tad sātmyataḥ iti atimātra kṣārāt atimātra lavaṇāt ca sātmyāt
krameṇa iti na vegān dhāraṇīya ukta sātmya parityāga krameṇa
iha ca sātmya śabdena oka sātmyam abhipretam

original: alpadoṣam adoṣaṃ veti pakṣadvaye 'tyarthasātmyam alpadoṣaṃ bhavati anyattvadoṣam iti vyavasthā // 5]
analyzed: alpa doṣam adoṣam vā iti pakṣa dvaye atyartha sātmyam alpa doṣam bhavati anyattva doṣam iti vyavasthā

original: sātmyaṃ nāma tad yad ātmanyupaśete sātmyārtho hy upaśayārthaḥ /
analyzed: sātmyam nāma tat yat ātmani upaśete sātmya arthaḥ hi upaśaya arthaḥ

original: tattrividhaṃ pravarāvaramadhyavibhāgena saptavidhaṃ tu rasaikaikatvena sarvarasopayogācca /
analyzed: tat trividham pravara avara madhya vibhāgena saptavidham tu rasa eka ekatvena sarva rasa upayogāt ca

original: tatra sarvarasaṃ pravaram avaramekarasaṃ madhyaṃ tu pravarāvaramadhyastham /
analyzed: tatra sarva rasam pravaram avaram ekarasam madhyam tu pravara avara madhya stham

original: tatrāvaramadhyābhyāṃ sātmyābhyāṃ krameṇaiva pravaram upapādayet sātmyam /
analyzed: tatra avara madhyābhyām sātmyābhyām krameṇa eva pravaram upapādayet sātmyam

original: sarvarasamapi ca sātmyam upapannaḥ prakṛtyādyupayoktraṣṭamāni sarvāṇyāhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanānyabhisamīkṣya hitam evānurudhyeta // Car_3,1.20

original: āhārasya vidhiḥ prakāro vidhānaṃ vā ityāhāravidhiḥ tasya viśeṣo hitatvamahitatvaṃ ca tasyāyatanāni hetūn ity āhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanāni // 1

original: tatrotpattyā himavati jātaṃ guṇavadbhavati marau jātaṃ laghu bhavati ityādi // 4

original: deśasāmyena ca deśaviparītaguṇaṃ sātmyaṃ gṛhyate yathānūpe uṣṇarūkṣādi dhanvani ca śītasnigdhādi // 6

āvasthikaḥ iti rogi tva bālya ādi avasthā viśeṣitaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: vikāramapekṣata iti bālyādikṛtaṃ tu śleṣmavikāraṃ jvarādikaṃ cāhāraniyamārthamapekṣata ityarthaḥ // 3

original: yadāyattam okasātmyam iti bhoktṛpuruṣāpekṣaṃ hy abhyāsasātmyaṃ bhavati kasyaciddhi kiṃcid evābhyāsāt pathyamapathyaṃ vā sātmyaṃ bhavati //

original: eṣāmityādau śubhaphalā viśeṣā aśubhaphalāśca parasparopakārakā bhavantīti jñeyam // 1

original: tatra prakṛtyā lāghavādiḥ śubhaphalaḥ gurvādiś cāśubhaphalaḥ // 2
analyzed: tatra prakṛtyāḥ lāghava ādiḥ śubha phalaḥ guru ādiḥ ca aśubha phalaḥ

original: evaṃ kālāsātmyamaśubhaphalaṃ cājīrṇabhojanādi tathā okāsātmyaṃ cāśubhamaśubhaphalamiti jñeyaṃ viparītaṃ tu śubhaphalam // 5

tṛṣṇā cikitsita
atha atas tṛṣṇā cikitsitam vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
iti ha sma āha bhagavān ātreyaḥ

original: visarpe prāyeṇa tṛṣṇā upadravarūpā bhavatīti visarpānantaraṃ tṛṣṇācikitsitam ucyate // 1]
analyzed: visarpe prāyeṇa tṛṣṇā upadrava rūpā bhavati iti visarpa anantaram tṛṣṇā cikitsitam ucyate
jñāna praśama tapobhiḥ khyātaḥ atri sutaḥ jagat hite abhirataḥ

original: tṛṣṇānāṃ praśamārthaṃ cikitsitaṃ prāha pañcānām // Car_6,22.3
analyzed: tṛṣṇānām praśama artham cikitsitam prāha pañcānām

original: jñānetyādau jñānaṃ tattvajñānaṃ praśamaḥ śāntiḥ tapaḥ cāndrāyaṇādi // 1
cikitsitaṃ cikitsāvidhāyako granthaḥ nidānādyabhidhānaṃ ca cikitsārthameva nidānādijñānapūrvakatvāc cikitsāyāḥ // 2
analyzed: cikitsitam cikitsā vidhāyakaḥ granthaḥ nidāna ādi abhidhānam ca cikitsā artham eva nidāna ādi jñāna pūrvaka tvāt cikitsāyāḥ

original: pañcānāmiti vacanena pañcānāmapi cikitsāviṣayatvaṃ darśayati nahi kāsaśvāsavadasyāsādhyatvaṃ
analyzed: pañcānām iti vacanena pañcānām api cikitsā viṣaya tvam darśayati nahi kāsa śvāsa vat asya asādhya tvam

original: kasyāścid atretyarthaḥ tathā suśrutoktātiriktatṛṣṇādvayāntarbhāvaṃ pañcasveva sūcayati // 3
analyzed: kasyāścid atra iti arthaḥ tathā suśruta ukta atirikta tṛṣṇā dvaya antarbhāvam pañcasu eva sūcayati

original: uktaṃ hi suśrute tisraḥ smṛtāstāḥ kṣatajā caturthī kṣayāttathā hy āmasamudbhavā ca // 4
analyzed: uktam hi suśrute tisraḥ smṛtāḥ tāḥ kṣata jā caturthī kṣayāt tathā hi āma samudbhavā ca
syāt saptamī bhakta nimitta jā ca iti
kṣobhāt bhayāt śramāt api śokāt krodhāt vilaṅghanāt madyāt
kṣāra amla lavaṇa kaṭuka uṣṇa rūkṣa śuṣka anna sevābhiḥ
dhātu kṣaya gada karṣaṇa vamana ādi atiyoga sūrya saṃtāpaiḥ

original: pittānilau pravṛddhau saumyān dhātūṃś ca śoṣayataḥ // Car_6,22.5
analyzed: pitta anilau pravṛddhau saumyān dhātūn ca śoṣayataḥ
rasa vāhinīḥ ca nāḍīḥ jihvā mūla gala tāluka klomnaḥ

original: saṃśoṣya nṛṇāṃ dehe kurutastṛṣṇāṃ mahābalāvetau // Car_6,22.6
analyzed: saṃśoṣya nṛṇām dehe kurutaḥ tṛṣṇām mahā bala avetau

original: pītaṃ pītaṃ hi jalaṃ śoṣayatastāvato na yāti śamam /
analyzed: pītam pītam hi jalam śoṣayataḥ tāvataḥ na yāti śamam
ghora vyādhi kṛśānām prabhavati upasarga bhūtā sā

original: kṣobhād ityādyuktanidānasya yathāyogyatayā vātakartṛtvaṃ vātapittakartṛtvaṃ conneyam // 1
analyzed: kṣobhāt ityādi ukta nidānasya yathāyogyatayā vāta kartṛ tvam vāta pitta kartṛ tvam ca unneyam
pitta anilau iti ādiḥ sarva tṛṣṇā samprāpti granthaḥ
saumyān dhātūn iti kapha rasa udakāni soma guṇa atiriktāni
pradūṣayataḥ iti śoṣaṇena dūṣayataḥ
klomnaḥ iti dvitīyā bahuvacana antam

original: dehe ityanena etāsāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ śarīratvaṃ darśayati // 6
analyzed: dehe iti anena etāsām tṛṣṇānām śarīra tvam darśayati

original: yā hi mānasī tṛṣṇā sā śarīre icchādveṣātmikā tṛṣṇā sukhaduḥkhāt pravartate ityādāv uktā iyaṃ tu dehāśrayadoṣakāraṇā satī dehajaiveti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: yā hi mānasī tṛṣṇā sā śarīre icchā dveṣa ātmikā tṛṣṇā sukha duḥkhāt pravartate iti ādau uktā iyam tu deha āśraya doṣa kāraṇā satī deha jā eva iti bhāvaḥ

original: svābhāvikatṛṣṇāyām api vātapitte ārambhake eva tat kiṃ sāpyatra na gṛhyate // 8
analyzed: svābhāvika tṛṣṇāyām api vāta pitte ārambhake eva tat kim sā api atra na gṛhyate

original: maivaṃ tasyā ucitadravapānenaivābhipretena praśamād iha asvābhāvikavyādhiprakaraṇe nādhikāra iti hṛdi kṛtvā // 9
analyzed: mā evam tasyāḥ ucita drava pānena eva abhipretena praśamāt iha asvābhāvika vyādhi prakaraṇe na adhikāraḥ iti hṛdi kṛtvā

original: svābhāvikatṛṣṇākaravātapittābhyāṃ vakṣyamāṇatṛṣṇārambhakavātapittayor viśeṣamāha pītaṃ pītam ityādi // 10
analyzed: svābhāvika tṛṣṇā kara vāta pittābhyām vakṣyamāṇa tṛṣṇā ārambhaka vāta pittayoḥ viśeṣam āha pītam pītam ityādi

original: prakṛtatṛṣṇārambhakau pittavātau pītaṃ pītaṃ jalaṃ śoṣayataḥ ato jalaśoṣaṇatvāddhetor na śamaṃ yāti puruṣaḥ svābhāvikyāṃ jalaṃ pītvā śāntimadhigacchatīti  #
analyzed: prakṛta tṛṣṇā ārambhakau pitta vātau pītam pītam jalam śoṣayataḥ atas jala śoṣaṇa tvāt hetoḥ na śamam yāti puruṣaḥ svābhāvikyām jalam pītvā śāntim adhigacchati iti
bhāvaḥ
upadrava rūpa tṛṣṇā utpādam āha ghora ityādi
upasarga bhūtā iti upadrava rūpā
prāgrūpam mukha śoṣaḥ sva lakṣaṇam sarvadā ambu kāmi tvam
tṛṣṇānām sarvāsām liṅgānām lāghavam apāyaḥ
tṛṣṇā prāgrūpam āha prāgrūpam ityādi

original: prāgrūpakathane eva madhye tṛṣṇānāmavyabhicārilakṣaṇam āha svalakṣaṇam ityādi // 2
analyzed: prāgrūpa kathane eva madhye tṛṣṇānām avyabhicāri lakṣaṇam āha sva lakṣaṇam ityādi

original: svalakṣaṇam iti avyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ yathā jvarasya saṃtāpaḥ śvayathor utsedhaḥ // 3
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇam iti avyabhicāri lakṣaṇam yathā jvarasya saṃtāpaḥ śvayathoḥ utsedhaḥ

original: punaḥ prakṛtaṃ prāgrūpam āha liṅgānāṃ lāghavamapāya iti // 4
analyzed: punar prakṛtam prāgrūpam āha liṅgānām lāghavam apāyaḥ iti

original: liṅgānāṃ vakṣyamāṇavātādijatṛṣṇāliṅgānāṃ lāghavam alpatvaṃ keṣāṃcic cābhāvaḥ pūrvarūpaṃ tṛṣṇānām ityarthaḥ // 5
analyzed: liṅgānām vakṣyamāṇa vāta ādi ja tṛṣṇā liṅgānām lāghavam alpatvam keṣāṃcid ca abhāvaḥ pūrvarūpam tṛṣṇānām iti arthaḥ

original: tena pūrvarūpāvasthāyāṃ vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāni kānicin na bhavantyeva yāni ca bhavanti tānyalpatayāsphuṭāni bhavanti // 6
analyzed: tena pūrvarūpa avasthāyām vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇāni kānicid na bhavanti eva yāni ca bhavanti tāni alpatayā asphuṭāni bhavanti

original: uktaṃ ca avyaktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tasya pūrvarūpam iti smṛtam iti // 7
analyzed: uktam ca avyaktam lakṣaṇam tasya pūrvarūpam iti smṛtam iti

original: kiṃvā yadetat prāgrūpaṃ mukhaśoṣaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ sarvadāmbukāmitvam etat prāgrūpaṃ
analyzed: kiṃvā yat etat prāgrūpam mukha śoṣaḥ sva lakṣaṇam sarvadā ambu kāmi tvam etat prāgrūpam

original: svalakṣaṇaṃ ca tṛṣṇānāṃ tena mukhaśoṣāmbukāmitve svalakṣaṇe tathā pūrvarūpe ca bhavataḥ
analyzed: sva lakṣaṇam ca tṛṣṇānām tena mukha śoṣa ambu kāmi tve sva lakṣaṇe tathā pūrvarūpe ca bhavataḥ
pūrvarūpa avasthāyām tu aprabale mukha śoṣa ambu kāmi tve jñeye  /

original: ye tu prāgrūpaṃ mukhaśoṣaḥ svarakṣayaḥ sarvadāmbukāmitvam iti paṭhanti teṣāṃ mate tṛṣṇāyāḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ noktaṃ syāt // 9
analyzed: ye tu prāgrūpam mukha śoṣaḥ svara kṣayaḥ sarvadā ambu kāmi tvam iti paṭhanti teṣām mate tṛṣṇāyāḥ sva lakṣaṇam na uktam syāt

original: uktaṃ ca hārīte'pi tṛṣṇāsvalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ tu tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvadāmbupipāsitā iti // 10
analyzed: uktam ca hārīte api tṛṣṇā svalakṣaṇam sva lakṣaṇam tu tṛṣṇānām sarvadā ambu pipāsi tā iti

original: kiṃvā mukhaśoṣasvarakṣaye eva pūrvarūpaṃ sarvadāmbukāmitvaṃ ca svalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgānāṃ
analyzed: kiṃvā mukha śoṣa svara kṣaye eva pūrvarūpam sarvadā ambu kāmi tvam ca sva lakṣaṇam liṅgānām

original: ca lāghavaṃ rogarūpāyās tṛṣṇāyā apāyo gamanamityarthaḥ ayameva tṛṣṇāvyuparamo yad
analyzed: ca lāghavam roga rūpāyāḥ tṛṣṇāyāḥ apāyaḥ gamanam iti arthaḥ ayam eva tṛṣṇā vyuparamaḥ yat

original: vakṣyamāṇaliṅgānām alpatvaṃ sarvathocchedo hi tṛṣṇālakṣaṇānāṃ na bhavatyeva sahajatṛṣṇāgrastatvenaitallakṣaṇānām
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇa liṅgānām alpatvam sarvathā ucchedaḥ hi tṛṣṇā lakṣaṇānām na bhavati eva sahaja tṛṣṇā grastatvena etad lakṣaṇānām
alpa mātra tayā avasthānāt

original: kaiścit tu liṅgānāṃ lāghavam āśūtpādaḥ sa ca apāyo maraṇam iti kṛtvā tṛṣṇānāmasādhyatālakṣaṇamidamucyate tannātimanoharam // 12]
analyzed: kaiścid tu liṅgānām lāghavam āśu utpādaḥ sa ca apāyaḥ maraṇam iti kṛtvā tṛṣṇānām asādhya tā lakṣaṇam idam ucyate tat na ati manoharam
mukha śoṣa svarabheda bhrama saṃtāpa pralāpa saṃstambhān
tālu oṣṭha kaṇṭha jihvā karkaśa tām citta nāśam ca
jihvā nirgamam arucim bādhiryam marma dūyanam sādam

original: tṛṣṇodbhūtā kurute pañcavidhāṃ liṅgataḥ śṛṇu tām // Car_6,22.10
analyzed: tṛṣṇā udbhūtā kurute pañcavidhām liṅgataḥ śṛṇu tām
sarva tṛṣṇānām upadravān āha mukha śoṣa ityādi
udbhūtā iti vṛddhā

original: ye tu mukhaśoṣādīni lakṣaṇānyāhustanmate tṛṣṇopadravānām abhidhānaṃ na syāt upadravāścādhyāyasaṃgrahe
analyzed: ye tu mukha śoṣa ādīni lakṣaṇāni āhuḥ tad mate tṛṣṇā upadravānām abhidhānam na syāt upadravāḥ ca adhyāya saṃgrahe

original: saṃgṛhītāḥ tenātiśayavṛddhā mukhaśoṣādaya upadravāḥ vṛddhāstu liṅgam iti vyavasthā // 3]
analyzed: saṃgṛhītāḥ tena atiśaya vṛddhāḥ mukha śoṣa ādayaḥ upadravāḥ vṛddhāḥ tu liṅgam iti vyavasthā

original: abdhātuṃ dehasthaṃ kupitaḥ pavano yadā viśoṣayati /
analyzed: ap dhātum deha stham kupitaḥ pavanaḥ yadā viśoṣayati
tasmin śuṣke śuṣyati abalaḥ tṛṣyati atha viśuṣyan
ap dhātum ityādinā pañcānām samprāpti ādi āha
deha stham iti dehe nānā rasa ādi rūpatayā sthitam
śuṣke ap dhātau śuṣyati iti yojyam

original: nidrānāśaḥ śiraso bhramastathā śuṣkavirasamukhatā ca sroto'varodha iti ca syālliṅgaṃ vātatṛṣṇāyāḥ // Car_6,22.12
analyzed: nidrā nāśaḥ śirasaḥ bhramaḥ tathā śuṣka virasa mukhatā ca srotaḥ avarodhaḥ iti ca syāt liṅgam vāta tṛṣṇāyāḥ
srotaḥ avarodhaḥ iti ati upaghātaḥ

original: pittaṃ matamāgneyaṃ kupitaṃ cet tāpayaty apāṃ dhātum /
analyzed: pittam matam āgneyam kupitam ced tāpayati apām dhātum

original: saṃtaptaḥ sa hi janayettṛṣṇāṃ dāholbaṇāṃ nṛṇām // Car_6,22.13
analyzed: saṃtaptaḥ sa hi janayet tṛṣṇām dāha ulbaṇām nṛṇām
tikta āsya tvam śirasaḥ dāhaḥ śīta abhinanda tā mūrchā
pīta akṣi mūtra varcaḥ tvam ākṛtiḥ pitta tṛṣṇāyāḥ
pittam ityādinā pitta jām āha

original: śarīrasaṃkhyāśarīre pittamāpyam uktaṃ yad dravasarasnigdhamandamṛdupicchilaṃ rasarudhiravasākaphapittasvedādi
analyzed: śarīra saṃkhyā śarīre pittam āpyam uktam yat drava sara snigdha manda mṛdu picchilam rasa rudhira vasā kapha pitta sveda ādi

original: tad āpyaṃ raso rasanaṃ ca ityanena tathā tatraiva yat pittasya yo yā ca śarīre bhāḥ
analyzed: tat āpyam rasaḥ rasanam ca iti anena tathā tatra eva yat pittasya yaḥ yā ca śarīre bhās

original: tat sarvam āgneyam ityanena dvayātmakatvaṃ pittasya yadyapyuktaṃ tathāpyāgneyākāratvād
analyzed: tat sarvam āgneyam iti anena dvaya ātmaka tvam pittasya yadi api uktam tathā api āgneya ākāra tvāt

original: bāhulyāt pittam āgneyam eveti darśayannāha pittaṃ matam āgneyam iti dvayātmakatve
analyzed: bāhulyāt pittam āgneyam eva iti darśayan āha pittam matam āgneyam iti dvaya ātmaka tve
api ca pittasya āgneya aṃśa prādhānyāt anyatra api saumya āgneya vāyavya vikāra bhede paittika vikārā
āgneya tvena gṛhītāḥ eva
saṃtaptaḥ sa hi iti ap dhātuḥ saṃtaptaḥ

original: saṃtaptaṃ hi iti pāṭhapakṣe pittameva janayediti yojyam // 4
analyzed: saṃtaptam hi iti pāṭha pakṣe pittam eva janayet iti yojyam

original: yadābdhātur janayati tadā pittasaṃtapta eva janayatīti pittasyaiva kartṛtvam // 5]
analyzed: yadā ap dhātuḥ janayati tadā pitta saṃtaptaḥ eva janayati iti pittasya eva kartṛ tvam
tṛṣṇā yā āma prabhavā sā api āgneya āma pitta janita tvāt

original: liṅgaṃ tasyāś cārucir ādhmānakaphaprasekau ca // Car_6,22.15
analyzed: liṅgam tasyāḥ ca aruciḥ ādhmāna kapha prasekau ca
tṛṣṇā ityādi nāma jām āha

original: āmaśabdena ceha lakṣaṇayā āmasamānacikitsita āmasamānalakṣaṇaś ca kapho 'pi gṛhyate // 2
analyzed: āma śabdena ca iha lakṣaṇayā āma samāna cikitsitaḥ āma samāna lakṣaṇaḥ ca kaphaḥ api gṛhyate

original: tenāmaprabhavāyā vyutpādanena kaphajāpi suśrutoktā gṛhītaiveha sāpyāgneyetyanena pūrvaparijñātaṃ sarvāsāṃ vātapittajanyatvaṃ samunnayati //
analyzed: tena āma prabhavāyāḥ vyutpādanena kapha jā api suśruta uktā gṛhītā evā iha sā api āgneyā iti anena pūrva parijñātam sarvāsām vāta pitta janya tvam samunnayati

original: vātaśca tṛṣṇākāraṇatvenokto'pyatrāpradhānaṃ pittameva ye pradhānam itīha vātākathanād unnīyate // 4
analyzed: vātaḥ ca tṛṣṇā kāraṇa tvena uktaḥ api atra apradhānam pittam eva ye pradhānam iti iha vāta a kathanāt unnīyate
anyatra api uktam darśana paktiḥ ūṣmā ca kṣudh tṛṣṇā deha mārdavam
prabhā prasādau medhā ca pitta karma avikāra jam iti
āma pitta janita tvāt iti āma avarodha vṛddha pitta janita tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: deho rasajo'mbubhavo rasaśca tasya kṣayācca tṛṣyeddhi /
analyzed: dehaḥ rasa jaḥ ambu bhavaḥ rasaḥ ca tasya kṣayāt ca tṛṣyet hi
dīna svaraḥ pratāmyan saṃśuṣka hṛdaya gala tāluḥ
dehaḥ rasa jaḥ ityādinā kṣaya jām āha

original: āhārarasāt sarvadhātupoṣako dhāturasa utpadyate sa ca raso dehapoṣako 'mbubhava iti āpya ityarthaḥ // 2
analyzed: āhāra rasāt sarva dhātu poṣakaḥ dhātu rasaḥ utpadyate sa ca rasaḥ deha poṣakaḥ ambu bhavaḥ iti āpyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tasya kṣayāditi rasakṣayāt tṛṣyate rasakṣayād ambukṣayo bhavati tena cāmbukṣayeṇa puruṣaḥ pānīyaprārthanārūpatṛṣṇayā yukto bhavatīti yuktam  #
analyzed: tasya kṣayāt iti rasa kṣayāt tṛṣyate rasa kṣayāt ambu kṣayaḥ bhavati tena ca ambu kṣayeṇa puruṣaḥ pānīya prārthanā rūpa tṛṣṇayā yuktaḥ bhavati iti yuktam
iti darśayati

original: uktaṃ hi suśrute doṣadhātumalakṣīṇo balakṣīṇo'pi mānavaḥ // 4
analyzed: uktam hi suśrute doṣa dhātu mala kṣīṇaḥ bala kṣīṇaḥ api mānavaḥ

original: svayonivardhanaṃ yat tad annapānaṃ prakāṅkṣati iti ihāpi coktaṃ tasya kṣayācca tṛṣyeddhi iti // 5]
analyzed: sva yoni vardhanam yat tat anna pānam prakāṅkṣati iti iha api ca uktam tasya kṣayāt ca tṛṣyet hi iti

original: bhavati khalu yopasargāttṛṣṇā sā śoṣiṇī kaṣṭā /
analyzed: bhavati khalu yā upasargāt tṛṣṇā sā śoṣiṇī kaṣṭā
jvara meha kṣaya śoṣa śvāsa ādi upasṛṣṭa dehānām
bhavati ityādinā upasarga jām āha
upasargāt iti jvara ādi upadravāt jvara ādi upadrava rūpatayā iti yāvat
kaṣṭā iti kaṣṭa sādhyā

original: evaṃ prāksūtritavātapittāmāmbukṣayopasargātmikāḥ pañca tṛṣṇā vyāhṛtāḥ atraiva suśrutoktā
analyzed: evam prāc sūtrita vāta pitta āma ambu kṣaya upasarga ātmikāḥ pañca tṛṣṇāḥ vyāhṛtāḥ atra eva suśruta uktā

original: kaphajā āmajāyām avaruddhā kṣatajā upasargātmikāyām avaruddhā annajā cāmajāyām evāntarbhāvanīyā // 4]
analyzed: kapha jā āma jāyām avaruddhā kṣata jā upasarga ātmikāyām avaruddhā anna jā ca āma jāyām eva antar bhāvanīyā  /
sarvāḥ tu ati prasaktāḥ roga kṛśānām vami prasaktānām
ghora upadrava yuktāḥ tṛṣṇāḥ maraṇāya vijñeyāḥ
idānīm tṛṣṇānām asādhya tā lakṣaṇam āha sarvāḥ tu ityādi
ghora upadrava yuktā iti pīḍākara upadravavatī
